summary: Head back to the Arctic with your favorite Polar pals in four side-splitting games that include Polar Bowler and Polar Golfer. Plunge into exotic waters from Iceland to the Amazon in Polar Tubing, then dodge the zany zookeeper to find missing penguin Ace in Penguins! Polar Sports Volume 1 present found of your favorite games from the makers of Polar Games.

name: PongBall
summary: Do you remember one of the first game in the world ever made? We (re)made it in modern way! Use skills, open cases, get new skins, beat your opponents, play with your friends and much more in PongBall!

name: Polar Pool
summary: Chalk up your cue and play some pool - just watch out for airborne penguins! Play classic games like 8 and 9-ball, or use power-ups, bonus pockets, and special characters to master the game.

name: Pop Corny
summary: His name is Corny... Pop Corny, and he loves popcorn! He has one dream, one goal, one vision... Can you feed him enough to progress to the next level? But be careful as hunger takes over and Corny starts to black out!

name: Pongmatic 2300
summary: A recreation of classic Pong machines from the 70s for the Playdate

name: Pocket Farmery: Idle Pop Farm
summary: Welcome to the country side where you start your own farm. Harvest your crops and animal, eventually finding and raising the magical plants and animals that no other farms have. Build up support building to help your harvest grows and get income even when you are offline.Get help from experienced (and strange) farmers to help you develop your farm to its fullest extent.

name: Police Car SUV Simulator
summary: Police Car SUV Simulator is a police car simulation with realistic graphics. Catch criminals, take them to the police station, and customize your vehicle with the rewards you earn.

name: Powerstar Golf: City Park
summary: This item expands your Powerstar Golf experience with a new course, 3 new characters, new career events, and more!

name: Powerstar Golf: Burning Sands
summary: This item expands your Powerstar Golf experience with a new course, a new character, new career events, and more!

name: Police Cop Hot Pursuit
summary: The Chase is On: Police Hot Pursuit!

name: Port of Mars
summary:
Port of Mars is an online, game-based, social science experiment set on the first human community on the Red Planet. You are 1 of 5 residents at the Port of Mars, the first long-term habitat on the planet. Each game consists of 8—12 rounds, each with phases of investing, trading, purchasing, discarding, and reacting to Mars events. Chance and player actions impact system health. If system health falls to zero all players die.

Your mission is to stay alive and achieve the most Victory Points. In each round you will usually receive 10 time blocks that you can invest in System Health or Influence resources. System Health keeps your team alive. Influence resources are used to purchase Accomplishments that earn you Victory Points.

name: Power & Revolution: 2023 Edition
summary: The latest edition of the ultrarealistic world simulator where you play as the Head of State or as the opposition! New Additions: dive deeper into the war in the Ukraine with artillery, trenches, mines, troop morale, etc; detailed immigration management; the justice system; and children.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Furries 2
summary: Poly Jigsaw: Furries 2 is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute furry.

name: Po-Go-No!
summary: Po-Go-No! is a colorful and psychedelic arcade game where, on a pogo stick, you have to bounce between different floor tiles - each with different effects on your run and score points!

name: Pokémon Supernova Sun
summary: Pokémon Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon are mods for Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon. Like my Rutile Ruby & Star Sapphire hacks and my Nova Sun & Umbra Moon hacks, their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that the player levels up very quickly. Every Pokémon in Trainers’ teams has a a proper moveset and many are holding items. The Elite Four and Champion are Level 100, and the player doesn’t need to grind to equal that!

name: Portal: Prelude RTX
summary:
In partnership with NVIDIA and powered by RTX Remix, Portal: Prelude RTX is a remaster of the 2008 ModDB Mod of the Year Top 3 Winner, Portal: Prelude, with stunning full ray tracing and high-fidelity assets, the groundbreaking AI-accelerated performance of DLSS 3, and the lowest texture load times with RTX IO. Step into the boots of Abby, the newest testing associate in Aperture Science, as you solve nineteen mind-bending chambers putting your Portal skills to the ultimate test. Make use of momentum, perform narrow escapes through deadly particle fields, and learn to work with manipulated gravity while heartless but dedicated observers watch and berate your every move.

When you finally come face to face with the minds behind Aperture Science, witness the scientific hubris marking the downfall of the facility as the activation of GlaDOS sets the scene for the rest of the Portal series to follow.

name: Pokémblem
summary:
Fire Emblem is a tactics RPG that has been described as "anime chess".
This hack turns FE8 into a Pokémon game.

Re-live your journey through Kanto in this reimagining of Pokémon. Battle with your whole party at once, and devise strategies to take down the toughest foes. Catch and evolve the original 151 Pokémon as you train up your favorites. Enjoy balanced gameplay where grinding has little effect and swapping out team members may be the key if you’re struggling. You play your way in this fun, fast-paced game.

name: Pocket Slaughter
summary:
The wad is divided into 5-map episodes, each with a different visual theme. There is some semblance of a difficulty curve, both within each episode and for the megawad in general. Certainly map 30 is a bit harder than map 1.

All difficulty settings are supported. UV is the primary difficulty for those who want a challenge, and HNTR was designed to be a more casual experience. HMP is somewhere in between and may not be as well balanced as the other two.

Pistol starts are enforced through MBF21 death exits. There are no secrets besides the exits on maps 15/31.

name: Pocket Family: My Dream House
summary:
Design your home and create a dream house in Pocket Family! Create a virtual family filled with adorable animated characters and help build the house of their dreams through match 3 collapse games and puzzles.
Build a family with an amazingly cute and fun cast of characters that are ready to move in and live in your new house! Play puzzle games to complete their requests for household items and keep your home happy and growing!
Play match 3 collapse games to design and build each room any way you please. Decorate your room and watch the furnishings grow, or help your new virtual family with their requests.

name: Police Car Escape Simulator
summary: Are you ready for the multi-directional chase of the cops? Experience an adrenaline-filled police game with Police Car Escape Simulator. Escape, crash and beat the cops in fast vehicles!

name: Pot of Gold
summary:
Pot of Gold is a standalone release of the Pot of Gold pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

The table was designed by Terry Cumming.

name: Portal Fantasy
summary:
Portal Fantasy is a creature-collecting adventure RPG. Journey through an epic storyline, collecting creatures, avoiding traps, and solving thrilling quests in this RPG with a unique take on a beloved genre.

Collect unique creatures and gather ingredients to fuse and enhance your team. Discover hundreds of combinations, which can augment your creatures, teach them new skills, and even change their appearances.

Unlock Wilderness areas to battle and collect Porbles from 6 different elements with over 50 skills and 60 passive abilities. Conquer Baddies, fuse potent ingredients, and transform your Porbles into ultimate powerhouses. The battle is on!

Journey through beautiful pixelated worlds, navigating perils, solving quests, and meeting with countless quirky characters. A captivating story, tons of side content, and a charming soundtrack await you on your adventures.

Prove your mettle by tackling traps, puzzles, and obstacles. The Wilderness is a dangerous place, as you jump and maneuver across moving platforms, voids, spikes, saws, turrets, teleporters, and more.

name: Polyroll Pocket
summary: An all new, Pocket-Sized adventure starring Polyroll! Kaiser Kiwi has landed on the moon with a diabolical plan to wipe out the Polyrolls. You'll need to uncover secrets, reclaim the stolen batteries from Kiwi's goons, and power up your rocket ship to blast off for the final confrontation!

name: Power Fantasy
summary: Survive hordes of blood hungry enemies and hope for the best upgrades while you level up! Power Fantasy is a fresh rogue-survivors-like with unique heroes and tons of customization.

name: PoligonVR
summary: Imagine a virtual world where you can create or be anything you ever wanted. PoligonVR is a powerful community driven sandbox where we give you the necessary tools to turn your dreams into virtual reality.

name: Power Network Tycoon
summary: Manage a power network on a growing island. Use industry simulation methods to handle electricity demands, weather challenges and ensure safety. Developed by a Power Engineer, it offers realistic electricity management gameplay, combining strategy and real-world engineering challenges.

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 3 - Deep Sleep
summary: A decrepit orphanage known as Playcare sits beneath the once magical toy factory. You must make your way through this haunted place, solving new puzzles and avoiding the nightmares that lurk within the dark. Answers lie between the blood-stained bedsheets and screaming echoes... If you can survive.

name: Pocket Family: Happy Family Plan
summary: A Strategy game, developed and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Ponk's Jam: The Tulip Thief
summary: Guess who’s back, dudes and gally?! In an all new universe, Ponk is here to save the world of Obal from the threat of The Tulip Thief! Embark on a huge journey through 6 crazy environments to retrieve the Artefacts from the 5 Kingpins; and also meet hilarious characters along the way.

name: Pogo3D
summary: Tough-as-nails 3D platforming using only your mouse! Bounce off platforms and even the walls to reach the next checkpoint. Go on a linear adventure through an interconnected world, or quickly test your skills in challenge mode.

name: Politon
summary: Politon is an easy to learn turn-based strategy game where you challenge the minds of your opponents with your cunning and wits.

name: Pocket Waifu: Rekindled
summary: Pocket Waifu: Rekindled is a unique Visual Novel experience with a complex story hiding behind a simple facade. Make a pact with a Succubus, through which a whole bunch of beautiful, sexy ladies will show up at your door! Can you satisfy them all?

name: Portal: Bagley
summary:
Portal BAGLEY is a fan-made, free modification for Portal 2 which plays in an unknown time period.

Set in an unknown time period, Portal: BAGLEY tells a new story using new characters including the test subject, you!
You play as a test subject who is awakened by a scientist named Bagley. Bagley wants to help you escape the facility... But what will you discover?

name: Pokémon Volt White 2 Redux
summary:
Pokémon Blaze Black 2 & Pokémon Volt White 2 are essentially the sequels to my Black & White hacks known as Blaze Black and Volt White. The usual rules with my hacks apply; the main feature is that all 649 Pokémon are available for capture somewhere in the game, and the trainers have all had their rosters changed in order to maintain a much harder challenge than the original game, as well as having an increased variety of opponents to fight. There's also a large amount of alternative features these hacks offer, which range from differences to the Pokémon themselves to the presence of a couple new TMs. If I'm not mistaken, these are also the first Black 2 and White 2 hacks on offer.

Additionally, the two versions only differ in terms of their aesthetic differences, such as the appearance of Opelucid City, the title screen, etcetera. So basically, just pick whichever colour takes your fancy!

name: Point 236
summary: Your task is to capture back a curative spring. Many enemies attack you, all in full 3D environment.

name: PonyGuessr
summary: Guess the episode each My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic frame is from.

name: Pocket BMX
summary:
Pocket BMX is a free-roaming 2D bike riding game that’s packed full of challenges that will see you pulling all kinds of air tricks and grinds with combos that will blow your mind.
Play through the story mode where all the BMX parks are in danger of being closed and its up to you to save the parks. With the help of your mentor the BMX Ninja, who will set various challenges for you throughout the levels, you will soon learn all the skills required to become an expert rider.

name: Pokémon Pinball Generations
summary: This is an expansion upon the original Pokémon Pinball, which adds a Johto experience.

name: Ponyvania: Order of Equestria
summary: Ponyvania: Order of Equestria is a fanmade 2D action-platformer based on the My Little Pony series and the Castlevania games.

name: Pokémon Castaway
summary: Welcome to Pokémon Castaway! The player is the (not-so) fortunate winner of a trip to Alola. On the flight there, however, the plane is struck down. Landing on the mysterious Bermada Island, the player is tasked with exploring their environment while searching for fellow survivors and a way off of the island. As the player traverses further inland, it becomes evident that the island is anything but deserted. Will the player find a way off the island? And, more importantly, will they get to go on an Alolan vacation?

name: Porta-Tower
summary: Porta-Tower is a roguelike tower defense game where you can pick up and move your towers when their position becomes suboptimal. Relocate, upgrade, and unlock towers to defend your portal until the very end.

name: Poda Wants a Statue
summary:
Play with your mouse!

Drag and drop bunnies and resources.
Click on upgrades to buy them.

name: Poly Ego
summary: Do you have what it takes to become the next test subject to pass my tests? I've crafted them with care! I'm looking for robots willing to be part of the...good robots! Use your logic to pass the laser experience tests and become a legitimate robot!

name: Pombero: The Lord of the Night - Reborn
summary: Explore the Paraguayan countryside in search of clues to your late mother and survive in a hostile environment filled with myths, rituals, Nazis and black magic.

name: Pocket Pix
summary: A pixel art animation tool in your pocket

name: Power Slap
summary:
Power Slap is a thrilling turn-based fighting game that brings all the fun and satisfaction of a virtual slap contest to your pocket. This game is designed to test your timing, precision, and strategy skills with playful humor.
Step into the arena, rise through the ranks, and become the undisputed PowerSlap Champion!

name: Pony Metal U-Gaim
summary: A cancelled MSX2 game based on the Fan-made series Pony Metal.

name: Pocket Jump Game
summary: Jump, jump, jump!

name: Portal 64
summary: This unofficial, fan-made, demake of Valve's Portal makes it possible to play the classic on original Nintendo 64 hardware!

name: Poor Man's Adventure: Narco Sub Simulator
summary: Join a small community of rejects, try to survive in hospitable world of peak capitalism. As a modern pirate you will scavenge wrecks of rich peoples' yachts for resources, grow weed and manage automated factories.

name: Pokémon Elite Redux
summary: Pokemon Elite Redux has a strong focus on increased difficulty and variety in teambuilding. It features up to 4 abilities at the same time while every single Pokemon & Trainer has been rebalanced manually. There are tons of QoL enhancements and zero grinding. It features over 100 new abilities and some new moves for more variety. It's inspired by hacks like Inclement Emerald, Radical Red, but it's unique in the sense of 4 abilities, tons of QoL mixed with manually-created Trainers.

name: Port Glacia
summary: Originally a map for Jimmy's Joy Of Mapping 5, I ended up pulling it as it had gotten too large and ambitious, and its size & length would have really bogged down what was already a hefty community project. This allowed me the chance to polish the map up to a higher standard.

name: Pokémon Stadium Fusion
summary: A mod that implements fusions for every 1st gen pokemon

name: Poly Backrooms
summary: Welcome to Poly Backrooms, an unique multiplayer co-op horror game that combines the infamous backrooms creepypasta with a fun, low-poly aesthetic. With up to 4 players, you and your friends will navigate through the backrooms, solving intricate puzzles and avoiding dangerous entities.

name: Polygon Race
summary: Polygon Race is an arcade car game with minimalist graphics. Your task is not touching the cones, get to the finish line or collect the flags for a certain time. Be careful not to crash the car.

name: Pocoman: Green Machine Level Pack
summary: To all PocoManiacs around the world, in space, on the sea bottoms, and working mining contracts in the asteroid belt; Our new add-on PocoMan level-pack is ready!

name: Political Mastery
summary: Have you ever been angry with a politician? Have you ever said to yourselves that you would have done better if you were in their shoes? Political Mastery gives you the opportunity to take on this role. Prove yourself and become the best politician you can be.

name: PolyCity Stories: The Affair
summary: The first short story from PolyCity. A point and click adventure delving into the dark and dirty polygonated corners of the City of angles... mostly right angles. The Affair follows a soft boiled/over easy private detective as he unpicks an organised crime syndicate operating across the city.

name: Ponon! Deluxe
summary: If you think you’ve played Tetris before, think again! Ponon brings new challenges (and advantages) to one of the world’s most famous games. Fit the glowing pieces to make full horizontal lines in order to disappear. Use the ghost guide on the bottom to fit certain pieces, and swipe it down to lock it in. Act quickly, because if you don’t do your job fast enough, extra curveballs will be thrown your way as you try to avoid letting your lines reach the top!

name: Pong Legends
summary: A free-to-play, real-time beer pong battler. Play instantly, anywhere. No app download required.

name: Possessions
summary: Welcome to Possessions, a ghoulish game of programs, puzzles, and poltergeists. In Possessions, you play as a restless spirit, wandering from neighborhood to neighborhood and home to home, possessing the residents therein, and messing with their relationships however suits your fancy. Why? Gotta pass time in the afterlife somehow.

name: Pokémon Little Cup Red
summary: Pokémon Little Cup Red is a Pokémon Red ROM hack that reduces all Pokémon’s levels to 5 and brings them down to the lowest evolution. Any Pokémon that do not evolve have been changed.

name: Pokemon Daycare
summary:
Pokémon Daycare was a submission for Relic Castle's Game Jam. Now that the Jam has officially ended, it gets posted to PokeCommunity!
Basically, you own a daycare, where trainers can drop off and pick up their Pokémon. Use the money you get to buy food for the checked in Pokémon or even upgrade the daycare itself. Sometimes you find eggs, which Trainers can adopt, but you never do find out where they come from.
Not really much of a plot to be honest. Trainers are random though, that's cool.

name: Portals: Escape the Infinity
summary: A transcendent point-and-click puzzle adventure. Can you escape 50 Portals?

name: Pool Lounge
summary: Welcome to Pool Lounge! Play the game mode you want. Traditional 8-Ball, Blackball and 9-Ball!

name: Popil
summary: Popil is an obscure platform game that was in development by Sunsoft for the Super Nintendo / Super Famicom.

name: PowerWash Simulator: The Muckingham Files 2
summary: Three new filthy maps have arrived in PowerWash Simulator in the latest instalment of The Muckingham Files; a series of free content updates expanding the game’s original universe. Whilst residents dish the dirt on your favourite town’s antics, you’ll be busy cleaning up their messes as you're tasked with de-dirtying an Excavator, a Spanish Villa and a Paintball Arena.

name: Posthaste
summary: An arcade rally game.

name: Polymino
summary: A fast-paced puzzle game for 1-4 players. Match blocks by color, build up combos and cause huge amounts of destruction!

name: Potions & Emotions
summary: Potions and Emotions is a creative game where you play the conscience of the villain. Join Thalia—a fae with big ambitions—who intends to take over a town hidden in a magical forest. Whether her shoulder angel or devil, you get to guide her actions and witness the consequences of your choices.

name: Pop Off 2
summary: Unleash fizzy chaos in "Pop Off 2"! Ascend the crater by flying between obstacles in this physics based platformer. Discover what mysteries this foreign landscape holds as you team up with friends, customize your character, and conquer the precarious unknown in this thrilling multiplayer adventure.

name: Possibly Endless Golf
summary: Embark on a cozy golfing journey with Possibly Endless Golf. Enjoy this minimalist game in bite-sized chunks or endless rounds. No pressure, no scores, just you and the fairways. Perfect for a quick escape or a relaxing retreat. Your tranquil golfing experience awaits. Tee off today!

name: Pokémon Mino
summary: At the beginning of their journey, the trainer and sailor go to the Hishout Dungeon to see the very rare Pokémon, Graykid. When Team Digital arrives has a plan to steal the Pokémon, Graykid. Even though who's gonna stop Team Digital? Their good friends Damian and Skyla are the adventurous trainers in a whole wide world.

name: Pokémon: Burning Lotus
summary: The game takes place in a new region called Lotus, a region that is filled with Pokémon from every previous generation, including new species as well. You take control as either a male or female protagonist, and the region has eight gym leaders who are all returning leaders from previous games.

name: Power Inc
summary: Power Inc is an idle simulation game about managing a power plant from the 1890s. Use the power you generate to build a city, research new technologies, and advance through the eras to modern times and beyond!

name: Pocket Plants
summary:
Magical evolution game with a healthy twist.
Merge your plants to unlock dozens of cute new ones as you revitalize several different worlds. Charming characters will aid you in your adventure by giving you different tasks to complete for great rewards. You can even connect your phone or Fitbit to help generate more energy as you exercise!

name: Porterminus
summary:
Porterminus is a spooky RPG.

It follows the story of a girl named Julie, her boyfriend Donnie, and a mysterious cat.

Warning: Although the graphics are all pixel art, it has rather intense body horror, please keep that in mind before deciding to play.

name: Pokémon Ancestral X
summary: Ancestral X is a difficulty hack of Pokémon X, built primarily for Nuzlocking, and otherwise inspired by popular hacks from Drayano, Buffel, and NotSuicuu. This is intended to be a truly challenging experience, but you’ll also find features common to enhancement hacks throughout. All 721 Pokémon are available, the leveling curve has been revamped, quality of life improvements are in place, and trainer battles are custom built and significantly harder. Best of all, Ancestral X introduces a number of features never before seen in Gen 6 hacks, including the ORAS Megas, Mobile PC, Trainer Natures, and Custom AI!

name: Pokemon Black 2: DE
summary: Pokemon Black 2: DE offers an authentic Unova experience with a region almost exclusively filled with double-battles, a "challenging-but-not-kaizo" difficulty level, balance changes to improve viability and variety, postgame and all-new content within the main adventure, and a bunch of quality-of-life improvements!

name: Pokemon Sour Crystal
summary:
This 'improvement hack' of Pokemon Crystal has been 5 years in the making.
It was created with the mindset of updating Crystal to 'current-gen' standards but without losing the nostalgic feel of the original.

The hack has many features that may make playing it more comfortable for newer players such as the "PPS" system (pokeride).

name: Popucom
summary: Venture together with your friends on an unknown planet. Use color switching, match-3 shooting, and artifact powers to overcome challenges and keep advancing. What lies ahead of you is an adventure filled with wonder, hope, and much more to discover!

name: Pokémon Myth
summary: Embark on an epic adventure in Pokémon Myth, where you'll rise from a 15-year-old villager to a legendary Champion. Unravel the sinister plot of Team Corrupt, an enigmatic organization seeking to harness the power of Arceus and Mew, the region's legendary Pokémon. Discover the groundbreaking "Infusion Types," a new mechanic that empowers your Pokémon with type-specific DNA, boosting their attacks and adding a strategic layer to battles. Encounter intriguing factions like the research-driven Team Rose/Infusion Inc. and the formidable Team Astra, hailing from the Serene region. Explore two vast regions, plus Sinnoh and Unova, teeming with new Mega Evolutions, regional forms, and a plethora of Fakemon, including unique Star-Face shiny variants. With player-controlled gyms, custom mechanics, new moves, items, types, and even new Eeveelutions, Pokémon Myth offers a fresh and captivating Pokémon experience.

name: Possess Quest
summary: Possess Quest is a puzzle platformer where you play as the enemies.

name: Poly Match
summary: Challenge yourself inside a polysphere world! It is the best choice to spend your time. Playstyles and moves are rendered in-game with meticulous attention to detail. Simple and fun for all ages. Get a completely new experience and relax your mind with 3d puzzle!

name: Pocoyo and the Mystery of Hidden Objects
summary: Lately Detective Pocoyo is getting many mysterious cases involving objects that have disappeared. Will you be able to help Pocoyo in this fun adventure and find all the hidden objects?

name: Polygons Tower Defense
summary: Defend this colorful world with a brilliant strategy! Strengthen your battlefield and don't let enemies reach their destination. Make amazing combinations, and choose the most powerful elements wisely!

name: PopStealth
summary:
Introducing a stealth action game that anyone can easily play and enjoy! !
Control a pop and cute stealth character and aim for the goal without being detected by the enemy!

name: Pokémon Academy Life
summary:
Pokémon Academy Life is a visual novel that takes you into an alternate Pokémon world that doesn't send 10-year-olds off to fend for themselves. Familiar characters from the core series games are placed in an academy setting, where you take on the role of a student.

The majority of your time will be spent in the Kobukan (koh-BU-kahn) region, located fairly equidistant from the six regions. As Red (or custom player name), you are the dynamic protagonist who will interact with a plethora of characters. The story will progress in different branches depending on who you choose to talk to, who you try to befriend, pursue as a romantic interest, who you choose to help, and much more throughout your three years at the academy.

name: Pokémon
summary: Pokémon is a browser based mobile game by McDonald's made as a part of their Pokémon TCG 2023 Happy Meal promotion.

name: Popeye
summary: The object of the game is to collect hearts and deliver them to Olive Oyle to keep her 'lovemeter' topped up. Points are scored for hearts delivered. Bluto, UFO's, witches etc try to stop you. Some hearts are behind locked doors so you've got to find the right key to open the door and get them while others can be grabbed simply by jumping up to get them. Somewhere there's a fruit machine for which you need to collect 'spin' items.

name: Pokémon: Close Combat
summary: A Fast Paced, 2D Pokémon Fighting Fangame, where you duke it out in local or online matches as your favorite fighting type Pokémon from across the series!

name: Pop'n Pop
summary: Pop'n Pop is a puzzle video game released in arcades by Taito in February 1998. It features characters from Taito games Rainbow Islands, Kiki Kaikai, Don Doko Don, and The NewZealand Story.

name: Pokémon Emerald Crest
summary: Vanilla Emerald's Story with lots of new features from the later gen and a few extra quests.

name: Police Pursuit
summary: Patrol the town and pursue the criminals before the time's up.

name: Pocket Frogs Splash
summary: The Pocket Frogs are out of their habitats and making a splash! Play four fun mini games and collect all the Pocket Frogs by earning achievements!

name: Poppy Birds
summary: A mobile puzzle game.

name: Portal Panic
summary: Pbot has gone on a rampage thanks to Blockheads lack of mental processing. You must venture forth and rescue your comrades who have been thrown into corrupt versions of their own domain.

name: Pokémon Blue Kaizo
summary: Pokémon Blue Kaizo is a ridiculously difficult ROM hack of Pokémon Blue which, as the title implies, was inspired by the like of Platform Hell hacks such as Kaizo Mario World. Everything about the game, including the wild Pokémon, the teams of trainers and gym leaders, and even the layouts, has been changed to make the game a much more difficult experience.

name: Poon Puzzle
summary: Poon Puzzle is a relaxing anime puzzle with cute horny girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality animated artworks!

name: Popstars
summary: Become popstar has never been so easy! Take the microphone in your hand and charm the jury with your voice, so they can not help but choose you in the new band. In over 30 pop songs, it is necessary to show stunning performances! Create your own style! Create your age-ego according to your ideas and steal your competition with the show! Meet on your way to the Popstar from Popstars-Casting and the Recall, through the workshops to the grand finale on varied and atmospheric locations. Feel the exhausting nerve kitzel on your own body, if the critical jury judges about success or failure!

name: Portals of Phereon
summary: Portals of Phereon is a turn-based tactical role-playing roguelike monster-girl creature-collector by erotic artist Syvaron. Select from one of three distinct protagonists, each with unique skill trees and specialties, and embark on expeditions through the Portals of Phereon to accrue enough strength to tackle the final mission before time runs out.

name: Pokémon Snap: Basement
summary: A custom level for Pokémon Snap.

name: Pokémon Snap: Rith Essa
summary: A custom level for Pokémon Snap

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Urban Terrain Vehicle
summary: Make Brighton even safer, officer! Preorder Police Simulator now and get the UTV (Urban Terrain Vehicle) as your new police SUV - allowing you to arrest up to four suspects at the same time.

name: Pond Scum
summary:
At the edge of the Deep Swamp stands Snappy and his gang.
Anxious to proceed, they press on as a rite of passage for all young pond dwellers.
What will they find ahead?
Uncover the secrets of the swamp in this Diorama-based VR Platformer.

name: Polygon Arena
summary: Polygon Arena is a PvP Third Person Shooter game with 6 Weapon types and 2 game modes. Host or Join matches and aim for the highest score!

name: PowerWash Adventure
summary: In PowerWash Adventure, you are a magical janitor on a whimsical rinsing journey across different themes. Upgrade your water gun to flash away dirts and restores items to their original states. Enjoy varied scenarios in dream mode, clean graffiti or design your own unique stage to share with others.

name: Pokecolo
summary: Pokecolo is a japanese free-to-play social mobile game released by Cocone on September 2011 for iOS and Android. The game features a gacha system, used to obtain clothing for your "mini" and decorations for the planet and its interior to customize however you like. You can raise pets, trade items, cook food for your mini, and chat with others.

name: Polygon Survival
summary: Polygon Survival is a low-poly zombie survival shooter with simple building and crafting. You find yourself in a mini world of zombie apocalypse and your only goal here is survival.

name: Pokemon Pyrite Version
summary: Relive the adventure of the second generation Pokemon games in a more challenging and complete way! A hack of crystal with added trainers, updated maps, and the balancing of learnsets and wild pokemon and trainer scaling.

name: Potty Racers
summary: You are waiting for an action game? But so exciting game like car – racing makes you scared? Or you are waiting for a simple game that is not so colorful? Or the game you want is not a flexible game? If your answer is yes, the best choice is Potty Racers.

name: Pokedoku
summary: Pokedoku is a daily guessing game where players must input a set of 9 unique Pokémon which agree with a given set of characteristics for each row and column in a 3x3 grid.

name: Popeye Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves
summary: A GBA video with pauses for 6 quiz questions. Intended to be paired with Retroachievements.

name: Pokémon Crystal Legacy
summary: A Pokemon Crystal ROM hack that provides a fresh and balanced adventure while maintaining the original spirit.

name: Possessions
summary: You're trapped in a house cursed by a Kitsune and forced to play his game. Now you have to compete with other souls for control of a burglar's body in order to gain your freedom! As a stray soul try to ambush the burglar by possessing household objects! As the burglar finish tasks and find an exit!

name: Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator
summary: Welcome to Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator, the most colorful medieval fantasy battle simulator in existence! Throw tens of thousands of soldiers into battle, enjoy the show, or take direct control of one of them to prove your valor!

name: Portal Puzzle
summary: Sand flows and portals glow in this one-of-a-kind puzzle adventure

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Future of Hope
Power Line Rider
summary: Power Line Rider is an Action-Packed Endless Runner with retro 8-bit inspired graphics & sounds! Dodge Birds, Squirrels, Monkeys and Fight Bosses as you race across a post-apocalyptic world where the fastest means of travel is riding on old Power Lines!

name: Pokémon Re:Union
summary:
Red, now a legend with many trainers and recognized worldwide, returns to his native region after his journey to become a Pokémon Master.
A journey that ends with a merciless battle on the summit of Mont Argenté against a certain trainer...
But his return was not to be as he had hoped.
A strange phenomenon seems to be appearing in the Kanto region.
Numerous ultra-breaks have begun to appear all over the region.
It is said that a certain policeman by the name of Beladonis is seeking to speak to this legendary trainer as soon as possible, to ask for his help in this matter.
What new adventures await Red alongside Beladonids?

name: Porno Empire
summary: Welcome to a world of bold decisions and sweet temptations! Porno Empire [18+] is an adult visual novel that will transport you into a captivating realm of luxurious opportunities and enticing choices.

name: Poly Survivor
summary: Hordes of monsters are threatening the Poly Village! Raise your weapons, choose your equipments and enjoy the battles……But be aware of those powerful monsters! Make full use of the environment and collect items continuously. Keep getting stronger until finally you defeat your enemies.

name: Poly Kingdom: Siege
summary: "Poly Kingdom: Siege" is a dynamic RTS taking you from a Native tribe to Roman Empire to Medieval kingdom! Engage in intense battles with siege weapons, traverse dangerous terrains, witness your empire evolve, and enjoy thrilling building destruction in this unique strategy game!

name: Polybius Invaders 2
summary: Earth's fate hangs in the balance in this breathtaking retro inspired, Super Scaler Arcade Shoot-Em-Up.

name: Pokémon Unbreakable Ties
summary: In the vibrant Akebia region, your childhood dream of becoming a Pokémon Master is reignited. But this isn't your typical journey. Uncover the secrets of the Royal Family's grip on the region, unravel Professor Alama's mysterious past, and protect the legendary Eon Pokémon from their grasp. With stunning visuals, engaging characters, and a gripping story, Pokémon Unbreakable Ties offers a fresh take on the classic Pokémon experience. Explore the region, challenge Gym Leaders, and forge unbreakable bonds with your team as you unravel a conspiracy that threatens to shatter the peace.

name: Power Structure
summary: Large sci-fi base map with Makkon textures, made for Alkaline v1.1+ (Not included). Custom music is "Flow" by Anna Centauri.

name: Popper Lands Colony
summary: A new colony is appearing in popper lands! Skilled works are needed to harvest precious resources and build a friendly and prosperous village!

name: Pogo Arc
summary: Bounce around a circular arena.

name: Powerful Dabl
summary: Powerful Dabl is an action roguelike, find yourself in a snowy location, go through corridors filled with enemies, and only by destroying all the monsters can you move forward!

name: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe
summary: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe is a reimagining of the original Pokémon Gadir fan-made game. Embark on a new adventure in the Gadir Region, where you'll challenge gyms and ultimately face the Pokémon League.

name: Polaris Outpost
summary: A space station map of the same quality as the original E2 maps

name: Pokémon Sweet Version
summary: Welcome to Pokémon Sweet Version, where battles are carried out with the power of dessert! Travel through a confectionate wonderland that resembles Kanto but is quite different, as those who explore will soon discover! Capture 151 candified Pokémon and fill up the pages of your Cookbook! We've spared no expense in making the experience unique, which is why there is a brand-new type chart consisting of twelve flavors of ice cream. (Apple is totally a flavor of ice cream.) And if you're sick of Kanto, you'll be pleased to know this is totally not Kanto, no matter how much it seems to be. As the world is designed to reward exploration, there's something waiting in every map that may not have been there before, whether it's a cleverly hidden item or a dreadfully bad pun. (We have plenty of those.) The PokéSweets themselves are as delicious as they look, and they look good enough to eat!

name: Pokémon Fairies
summary:
A short, sweet and simple game,1 hour of playtime. No battles or Pokémon capturing, only story and puzzles. An enchanting world in the clouds, in an alternate universe!
Fairies, friendship and magic! More fluff than a Wigglytuff! More cheese than an Aromatisse! More pink than a mutated Carbink!

name: PortalSnake
summary: Puzzle game about portals and snakes.

name: Pokemon Saiph 2
summary: Pokemon FireRed Rom Hack made by Vytron, sequel to Pokemon Saiph.

name: Poly
summary: Simplistic roguelike shooter, Blast your way through countless enemies while earning powerful upgrades which turn you into a shape obliterating machine! 50+ upgrades with countless synergies and stacking effects!, Unique enemies which have unique abilities.

name: Powerstation 64
summary: A moonbase map that was originally only for DM but has SP added retroactively.

name: Pony Arcadia
summary:
Several pony kingdoms compete for territory, but never battle each other - they live in peace after all.

However, each player also controls an evil villain that will happily cause trouble...

name: Poor Mouse
summary: It's a fast paced action platformer with a cute mouse that has to explore dangerous and fantastical worlds.

name: Pocket Race: Driver
summary: Pocket Race: Manager is a miniature race driving game with simple controls, but demanding driving and some strategic elements and lots of different car parts. Push other miniature cars off the track into the void! Don't fall yourself...

name: Políticos Memes Kombat
summary: Fight an epic battle for votes, it's anything that goes for power. Fighting game with fictional characters based on the Brazilian electoral war. Select one of the characters from Brazilian politics and embark on this fight full of fun and laughter.

name: Polygon Base
summary: A totally non-linear level, other than needing all three keys to exit, you're free to go anywhere you want. Play on HMP for a Doom-like experience, UV adds the Doom 2 monsters, NTR is real easy. Clear all otherworldly mutants, secure the base, and live to tell another tale.

name: Post
summary: Post is a Doom II episode replacement mod of eleven levels, created by Tony Sideris in 1996. It was a sequel to his Doom episode replacement Debut from earlier in 1996.

name: Potter About
summary: This side scrolling platformer lets you explore a beautiful, cozy home as a well-worn flower pot. Navigate through the clustered rooms and wield peculiar, plant-inspired powers on this comfy, meditative adventure.

name: Potato Sack Racing Simulator 2024
summary: I know what you are thinking, and yes, this game does feature the ability to fight grandparents, mugs, speakers and of course dirty tissues... Wait, this is a game about Potato Sack Racing? Umm.. Yeah there are like 4 levels about Potato Sack Racing out of the 17 levels... Phew, we almost forgot to make it have something to do with Potato Sack Racing! But now trust me bro, this game is the BEST Potato Sack Racing game to have ever been made! At least, from what we could find.. Yeah this is actually the first and only Potato Sack Racing game, it’s almost like it’s not a good idea to make a game about Potato Sack Racing, it’s pretty fun to say Potato Sack Racing. Potatooooo sack racingggggg!!!!

name: Pools
summary: Liminal space game with focus on eerie exploration and immersion instead of typical horror. Navigate through endless alike rooms. Explore, orient, get out.

name: Pokémon Animon
summary: Animon is a pokemon rom hack which replaced every pokemon with anime characters like Digimon, Naruto, One Piece, Dragon Ball, Attack on TItan and many more.

name: Polyturbo Drift Racing Simulator
summary: "Polyturbo Drift Racing Simulator" offers a heart-racing blend of simulation and racing, providing hours of excitement for players of all skill levels. This game promises thrilling competition and intense action. Take the wheel and prove you're the ultimate racing champion!

name: Power Punch
summary: A multiplayer online game where you can enjoy boxing and happy sports in the battle royale arena. On the way to become the boxing king! We'll not afraid of opponent! but afraid of break the TV at home!

name: Power Rangers: Lightspeed Rescue
summary: The PlayStation version is similar to the Nintendo 64 version in terms of graphics, but the gameplay differs significantly. It features the five main Rangers as playable characters, with the Titanium Ranger as an unlockable character. The game can be played in single-player or two-player mode and also includes voice clips from the Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue cast. Once chosen, the player(s) remain as the selected Ranger(s) for the entire game. During Megazord battles, the player using controller one can operate the Supertrain Megazord, which is replaced by the Omega Megazord in the final stage. Another special feature is the password system, which allows players to enter cheat codes for infinite health, lives, continues, and powered-up attacks. Players can also unlock an art and picture gallery, start the game at any of the first six levels, and access the Titanium Ranger. The final stage of the game is only accessible if the player saves their progress on a PlayStation Memory Card after completing the penultimate stage.

name: Power Rangers: Lightspeed Rescue
summary:
The Windows/Mac version of Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue was more like an activity center. The game uses interactive CD-ROMs called Datazords that provide a virtual interactive Power Rangers experience.

Originally it was released on 6 CDs, bundled in complete with Power Rangers figure toys (one CD for each figure).

name: Pocket Player: Dig Dug
summary: The Dig Dug Pocket Player is one of many collectible handheld game consoles by My Arcade. Fygars, Pookas, and falling rocks. Join Dig Dug on the ultimate adventure to vanquish underground monsters. Making his first appearance in Japan in 1982, the airpump wielding hero has since become an arcade legend. My Arcade Pocket Players are portable handheld gaming systems for kids and adults alike. They feature high quality artwork inspired by original arcade machines and are boxed in collectible packaging that can be displayed in homes and offices. Fully playable and perfect for fans of retro gaming, Pocket Players feature 2.75 inch full color displays, front facing speakers with volume controls, and headphone jacks. They are powered via micro USB or 4 AAA batteries, which are not included. These handhelds are compact and easy to take along for offline gaming sessions in long car rides, road trips, airplane flights, train rides, and more.

name: Pocket Player Pro: Mega Man
summary:
This officially licensed title includes Mega Man 1-6!

Mega Man is the iconic blue bomber who has been delighting fans for over 30 years. Mega Man is one of the most popular video game franchises of all time. The Mega Man series has sold over 38 million units worldwide. With his ability to absorb the powers of his enemies, Mega Man is a force to be reckoned with.

Battle your way through challenging levels, defeat powerful bosses, and save the world from Dr. Wily's evil plans.

name: Point Salad
summary: Build a salad of veggies and collect point cards in order to score the most points in Point Salad, a digital adaptation of a tableau-building, strategy, turn based, game for the whole family!

name: Pokémon Darkness
summary: Super Mario World hack rom where the player controls the Pokémon, Mew, in a world inspired by the pocket monsters franchise.

name: Polar Panic
summary: Stay alive in the arctic while climate change destroys your habitat! Eat fish to keep your hunger down or you will starve! Stay away from trash and don't fall into the water.

name: Polybius
summary: Fan-made playable version of the rumored game called Polybius

name: Portal Dungeon: Character Pack - Duck
summary: In the world of "Portal Dungeon", a mysterious new hero suddenly appeared, and he and his companions were ready to destroy everything.

name: Polarvoid
summary: It's nighttime and you are home alone during a rainstorm. You get bored and decide to organize your family's photo album. There are 9 polaroids missing, you go look for them. Though you feel like someone is watching you from outside the house...

name: Point Click Killer
summary: You've been driving all day and can barely keep your eyes open, when you finally see the lights to a Motel. Maybe they will have a vacancy? Maybe you will get more than you bargained for...

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game: Generations
summary: Pokemon TCG Generations is a ROM Hack of the original Pokemon Trading Card Game, where the cards, attacks, attributes, resistances, weaknesses, and various effects have been extensively altered and expanded. This ROM Hack introduces Pokemon from nearly all generations of the franchise, offering a fresh and exciting take on the traditional card game experience.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game: Kanto
summary: The game is an overhaul of Pokemon Trading Card Game for the GBC to match Pokemon Red/Blue.

name: Pokémon Procyon and Deneb
summary:
A ROM hack of Pokémon FireRed and a sequel to Pokémon Vega. It aims to be a completely original fan-made Pokémon experience, featuring the brand new region of Setoguni, over 100 new Pokémon including new evolutions of official Pokémon, new moves and mechanics, and a new storyline.

Its most recent beta was released on April 1st, 2018, and the project has been in indefinite hiatus ever since.

name: Portal: Forbidden Testing Tracks
summary: Step into the shoes of Rachel as she embarks on a journey guided by the personality core named "SAIC," through the Forbidden Testing Track, Codename: "Quebeck Seven."

name: Pokémon verde musgo
summary:
Have you ever imagined traveling across two continents and their provinces? Go by rocket to Mars? How about visiting the city of Prypiat and the famous Chernobyl plant? Fight crime and the terrible Illuminatis? Walking across a continent completely dominated by a criminal organization? Meet eccentric personalities, such as: Captain Nascimento, Elton John, Harry Potter, Hercules, Master Yoda, Al Capone, the living dead in the Pet Cemetery, etc.?

Yes, now you can! VERDE MOSS, a fantastic hack, with all available Pokémon, 135 new moves, where the player takes on the role of a police officer disguised as a trainer and investigates criminal organizations across the continents of Ruroro and Urara.

A long game, with a high level of difficulty, with several post-games, extras, missions, events from the creators (in the style of Nintendo events), completely new events and others based on films, special battle towers, with prizes, in addition to of two world tournaments.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Back to the Future Special Pack
summary: Great Scott! Crank that water pressure to 88 miles per hour and travel back in time to hose down iconic movie sets from the Back to the Future trilogy in five new maps for PowerWash Simulator!

name: Powers in the Basement
summary: A short point-and-click adventure game set in a comedic medieval fantasy world, deliberately reminiscent of the great classics from the 80s / 90s, with a specific sweet spot for LucasArts production.

name: Poozle Mania: Girls DLC #2
summary: This DLC adds new mechanics to the game, as well as 3 more girls!

name: Potential
summary: Experience everything that your senior year in college has to offer. Make decisions that shape your future. Class or fun? Work or party? Have a one-night stand or cultivate a relationship? Will you play it safe or take some chances? What if you want it all? Potential is a VERY adult visual novel.

name: Pop Stop
summary: The Mask of Magic is in your possession. The tribals are looking to steal it from you. Protect the mask at all costs while using hand-made weapons and special abilities. Shop for upgrades to improve your abilities as the tribals get stronger each wave.

name: Pocket Cuisine
summary:
A pocket-sized puzzle game that combines the joy of cooking and the satisfaction of pleasing discerning customers! Just drag, drop and cook!

With more than a hundred levels to challenge, can you become the ultimate Pocket Chef?

name: Poker Club: Gold Edition
summary: The ultimate experience of the most immersive poker simulation ever made.

name: Pop Monster
summary: The player must jump to the platform above them, similar to Nice Code's Frantic Mouse. A VT368 hack of the game was also produced (titled "Jump Mouse"). Later re-published by Waixing.

name: Poly Shooting Simulator
summary: Are you ready to dominate the leaderboard and become the ultimate Poly Shooting legend?

name: Pokémon: Too Many Types
summary: Pokémon Too Many Types is a rom hack of Pokémon Emerald that was originally created for content creator Alpharad. This hack adds multiple new types into the game bringing the total to 62 types as well as 118 new moves. Preexisting moves and Pokémon have their types altered to accommodate for the additional types and also allows Pokémon to have three types (at most) at a time instead of two.

name: Pokémon: Let's Go Lugia
summary: Pokémon: Let's Go Lugia is a rom hack of FireRed, based on the story of Soul Silver.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Guardian Police Vehicle
summary: This patrol car is the biggest Brighton police force has to offer. It's a big help fighting crime, allowing you to arrest up to six suspects at a time!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Surveillance Police Vehicle
summary: Technology equals efficiency – and the Surveillance Police Vehicle proves it! Make the lives of traffic offenders harder by patrolling the streets of Brighton in this car and using its exclusive surveillance camera to record a multitude of car-related felonies.

name: PolyZen Drive
summary: Embark on a personalized driving odyssey in PolyZen Drive. Control every aspect to match your mood, navigate serene or bustling open-world maps, and immerse yourself in a melodic journey with dynamic radio stations. Your road, your rules; take charge of the gameplay and define your drive.

name: Polyhop: The Skybound Islands
summary: Polyhop is a platforming game. Jump across the sky islands of a broken world, traverse through numerous hazards, and reactivate ancient pillars to pull the world together.

name: Pong 3DS
summary: Pong 3DS is a Homebrew version of Pong for the Nintendo 3DS which utilizes the 3DS's stereoscopic 3D feature.

name: Pokémon Mystery Universe
summary: A fan-made dungeon crawling roguelike MMO based on the Pokémon Mystery Dungeon games. Become a Pokémon and join hundreds of active players as you explore sprawling regions and treacherous labyrinths.

name: Pombo Piorado 2
summary: A Celeste-inspired game.

name: PolyPine
summary: Build your own forest! A simulation sandbox game where you grow plants and design habitats for 100s of species. Click on animals to trigger behaviors: deers poop which fertilizes the soil, bees go looking for nectar. Unlock more plants and animals as you create an increasingly diverse ecosystem.

name: Pokémon Nightmare Version: Invasion
summary:
Overnight, the world lost its connection to Azure City. It seems as if all citizens disappeared in a matter of hours. The public is scared of whatever happened. A terrorist attack? A failed experiment of the GENE Company? Or maybe aliens?

A team of policemen go to Azure City. Only 4 of them come back after realizing that they can't find their colleagues. The investigation posed more questions than answers.

After a month of silence, a young investigator named Jack heads for Azure City. His goal is to solve the case once and for all, no matter what it takes. Why is he trying to accomplish what a team of policemen failed to do? Why is he risking his life for such a feared case? Is he going to make it out alive?

name: Pool Academy
summary:
Pool Academy (aka Doukyu Re-Mix Billiard Multiple) is the sequel to Doukyu Billiard Master released for the Pal region.

Again the objective is to play the best game of pool possible while wagering high amounts of cash. But no matter how good you think you are, there's always someone better than you...or is there?

Fancy an evening of playing pool without the smoky atmosphere of a pub with walls too close to the table? Why not try Pool Academy? With 5 game modes including a very fun and addictive trick-shot section, 8 players to compete against and help available from a pro to improve your skills, Pool Academy is all you need to hone your virtual skills.

name: Poly Roam
summary: Poly Roam is a survival, driving road-trip game featuring a large, explorable environment that is procedurally generated. Loot, gather, and drive as much as you can.

name: Power Fantasy: Krampus Night
summary: It's Krampus Night and Santas little helpers got corrupted. Help Santa Claus to end the curse and save Christmas!

name: Pok The Little Artiste
summary: PC game by Living Media and Arborescence.

name: Pony Island 2: Panda Circus
summary: Pony Island 2: Panda Circus is a phantasmagorical voyage through time, myth, divinity, and video games. Escape the lordly deities of the underworld with your soul, and your sanity, intact. This is not a game about ponies.

name: Pokémon Dark Worship
summary: A Fire Red Hack with a New Region, New Story, Mega Evolution, Z Moves, Dynamax/Gigantamax, YouTubers as NPCs & Much More!

name: Pony World: Color by Numbers
summary: Colour your way through the enchanting Pony World!

name: Pocket Foosball
summary: Pocket Foosball - Table football excitement, Switch-Style!

name: Powernaut Decay
summary: A tough exploration-based platformer with souls-like elements.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Primates
summary: Poly Jigsaw: Primates is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute monkeys.

name: Pop'n Twinbee
summary: A colorized version of Pop'n Twinbee for Game Boy Color released as part of Konami GB Collection Vol. 3. The Japanese version of the corresponding collection was released on the Game Boy. Thus, it is not colored, but it features Super Game Boy palettes and borders.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Santa's Workshop - Winter 2023
summary: Merry Washmas! It's time to chill out with a systematic spray-down of Santa's workshop in this free seasonal map for PowerWash Simulator. Have the place looking good as new for the big day and you might just end up on the nice list.

name: Pokémon Reminiscencia
summary: Pokémon Reminiscence is a Pokémon fangame created by Elena Vidad and Max. All Pokémon available up to 9th generation and Roguelike and Roguelite mechanics that increase replayability!

name: Pop'n Music 3 Append Disc
summary:
Pop'n Music 3 Append Disc (ポップンミュージック3 アペンドディスク) is the sequel to Pop'n Music 2. It was released for the Sega Dreamcast and is designed to be used with the Pop'n Music Controller.
As the title may suggest, this version of Pop'n Music 3 is not a full game - it instead requires the user to boot up Pop'n' Music 2 and switch discs to access the extra content.

name: Poker Warlords
summary: Poker meets autobattler: Poker Warlords fuses the thrill of poker with the fun of an autobattler, creating a groundbreaking, genre-defying strategy game. Enter a world where each card represents an army and poker hands spring into life to battle for the pot.

name: Point Click Killer: Act Two
summary:
Detective Clarke is on the case and hunting the serial killer from the first Point Click Killer game of the series. Can you track down and catch the killer?

Point Click Killer: Act Two is a horror, point & click, gory adventure game that picks up where you left off in the first game. Good luck!

name: Pokémon Cross Stadium
summary:
This is a mod that updates some mechanics to new gens combining some of them with the first generation.
It has balanced rentals unlike the vanilla game and lots of features.

name: Pop'n Music
summary:
Pop'n Music is an arcade-exclusive game of the Pop'n Music series. It's location test initiated on March 23, 2011.

Unlike all of the original Pop'n Music series, Pop'n Music was developed into four buttons (red, blue, green, and yellow, instead of adding white), and eight buttons in two-player mode. If you hit a token Pop-kun, you will receive more tickets.

name: Pop'n Taisen Puzzle Dama Online
summary:
Pop'n Taisen Puzzle Dama Online is a block-building game. It is part of the Pop'n Music series and Taisen Puzzle-Dama series.

The gameplay is similar to the others Taisen Puzzle-Dama games, just the balls have been changed to Pop-kuns instead, in order to fit the Pop'n music theme. The game also uses an online feature to download and unlock content, such as secret characters and songs.

name: Poppy It! Playtime
summary: Complete all the Poppy Pop It toys to escape from the factory! Do them all before the time limit.

name: Pokémon: Abstract Version
summary:
Pokémon: Abstract Version is a fanmade game using rpgmaker that features a fully open world region with:
- 11 Settlements
- 28 Wild Areas
- 4 Provinces (Tranquill, Strife, Carnage, and Vigor)
- Gyms/Story Events that can be done in any order
- 18 New Pokémon
- 8 New Megas
- New tiles
- Fully Custom UI
- Level scaling
- Difficulty modes
- HM Items that open up new areas
- A full story

name: PopCap Greatest Hits
summary: PopCap Greatest Hits is a physical bundle of Peggle Deluxe, Bejeweled 2 Deluxe, and Zuma Deluxe.

name: Popmoji
summary: A casual Suika game-inspired arcade experience where you merge emojis to create even bigger emojis until the cycle is completed! You use special abilities, and battle for the biggest score on the leaderboard while enjoying the juicy visuals and sound effects.

name: Power Lords: Quest for Volcan
summary:
'Adam, Leader of the Lords, and Shaya, Queen of Power, are extra-terrestrial warriors who battle deadly aliens on the mystical Volcan Rock. Using lasers to fight the alien space serpent, the Power Lords can gain entry into the rock and search its endless chambers for the glowing touchstone that activates powerful anti-alien weapons and devices.'

Power Lords was based on the 1983 toy line of the same name. North American Phillips (NAP) must have thought that it was going to be a huge hit, because games were developed for the Atari 2600, Colecovision and Odyssey 2. Of these games only the Odyssey 2 version was released and is considered to be the rarest US released game for the system. All three versions play similarly, but the Atari 2600 and Colecovision versions have an additional stage which makes the game slightly more interesting. Like the other versions, the 2600 version of Power Lords is not all that fun to play and the overall difficulty of the game is also rather high. Had Power Lords been released, it probably would have ended up in the bargain bin faster than the action figures did.

name: Pokémon My Ass
summary: A romhack of Fire Red with juvenile humor, some quality of life updates, and mix ups throw into the main story.

name: Pony Sudoku WebGL
summary: Classical sudoku game with our favorite ponies.

name: Pony in Backrooms
summary: Pony in Backrooms is a My Little Pony fangame based on the backrooms.

name: Pokémon: Let's Go Meltan
summary: Pokémon: Let's Go Meltan is a romhack of Pokémon: Blue Version which adds in content from the Pokémon Let's Go series into the first generation game.

name: Porky's
summary: Porky's was a prototype game designed for the ColecoVision in 1983. Revenge is sweet... and you're out to get it. You've been "had" at Porky's, and you're out to blow it away. The action's hot and heavy and it's up to you to keep Pee Wee on his toes. If he succumbs to distraction, it's the pits! It's more fun than a greased pig... it's a blast!

name: Pokemon Orb Version
summary: A rom hack of Pokemon Gold released in 2018 by Hacker. It takes place in the Fornes region, which is basically just the Johto region but with city and character names swapped, and some of the maps having new tiles and minor changes to their layouts. It has some features that could make it be considered a "troll/joke hack", like entrances to buildings being different than what they say they are, those same entrances leading to new areas when you leave, purposefully poor grammar, and a higher difficulty overall. It could, however, also just be an earnest attempt at making a rom hack that was poorly done. It's hard to tell as information on this project is very hard to find.

name: Post-apocalyptic Old man
summary: Shoot away the approaching old men!

name: Police Car Driver: City Parking Simulator
summary: Brand new realistic police transport driving simulator in which you will experience many different cop vehicles in the parking!

name: Pokémon Infinite Heardle
summary:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle which can be played infinitely and with Pokémon's musics. Based on Joywave Heardle code and Pokémon Heardle musics.

Each music is randomly chosen from mainline Pokémon's game soundtrack.

name: Pokémon Modern Emerald
summary: A ROM hack of Pokémon Emerald with enhancements which modernize the game but also make it stay true to the vanilla experience. Optional features include: physical and special move split, reuseable TM's, a built-in Nuzlocke mode, and more. Made by resetes12.

name: Popeye
summary:
Popeye is a Japan-exclusive Game Boy video game based on the comic strip of the same name licensed from King Features Syndicate.

A cancelled US version was found in the 2020 Nintendo data leak, intended to be published by INTV Corporation.

The scenario is a maze and the player controls Popeye who has a time limit to collect some hearts, find Olive Oyl and save Swee'Pea which only appears somewhere to be saved after the hearts were collected and Olive found.

name: Point'n'Click Lovers: Daedalic Adventure Bundle
summary: Six classic adventures in one bundle

name: Pop'n Music 4: Append Disc
summary: Pop'n Music 4 is one of the many titles in Konami's long-running rhythm game franchise, and the second of two "Append Discs" that require either pop'n music 2 or another Key Disc in the series in order to play. This particular release includes new music from the arcade version, and also restores the Beginner mode that has been previously removed from the home releases.

name: Pokémon Shiny Gold Version
summary: A fan made remake of Pokémon Gold that was made from FireRed's engine.

name: Portal Pro
summary: Portal Pro is a set of test chambers focusing on solving puzzles locally rather than using complex fling techniques. The goal here is that the solutions are hard to come up with but easy to actually do.

name: Poker Championship
summary: Play the most authentic Texas Hold’em Poker App. Fair play guaranteed by the officially certified Random Number Generator implemented for every hand dealing. Compete with outstanding players throughout the world in real time and be the World Champion!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Compact Police Vehicle DLC
summary: Discover the brand-new Compact Police Vehicle (CPV), available from your very first shift and even on foot patrols! This compact police enforcement vehicle is authorized for driving in parks and along narrow streets, allowing you to move throughout Brighton quickly, as you ensure law and order are always respected. Due to its adorable size, it also serves as an excellent photo opportunity for the city's tourism industry!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Multipurpose Police Vehicle DLC
summary: A solid and sturdy choice – the Multipurpose Police Vehicle is the perfect next-generation police vehicle to keep Brighton safe! Not only does this car allow you to tow civilian vehicles damaged in accidents or which are violating the law, it also increases the size of your trunk inventory.

name: Pokini Kagura
summary: Parkour around an abandoned city defending cute animals from evil monsters. Style on the baddies with expressive shmovement and customizable combos. Rebuild your hometown with the help of your friends and relax in a soothing hot spring.

name: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
summary: Evil aliens led by Lothor have attacked all the ninja academies as part of his diabolical plot to take over the earth. Only three students from the Wind Ranger Ninja Academy and two students from the Thunder Ranger Ninja Academy remain. Now these students from rival ninja academies must team up with the mysterious Green Samurai Ranger to save the world.

name: Pop Up Computer
summary: An early, interactive CD-ROM title by Saru Brunei, who would later go on to develop titles such as Jungle Park and Cubivore. Was also slated for release on Apple's short-lived Pippin console, though it's not known if this version released.

name: Possibility Space
summary:
Possibility Space is a word game about exploring the possible outcomes of a conversation.

You will know you've experienced everything when the interface reads "100% explored". You can stop playing, or go back and read through the conversation.

name: Portal Returns CE
summary:
A fan made "Portal" (2007) 2D platformer game, made for the TI-84 calculator.

Portal. Enjoy blasting through space at breakneck speeds and almost being fried, crushed, and insulted all for the hope of cake at the end. With 78 total levels, the fun will probably end at some point. But that is why there is a level editor to make even more mind boggling puzzles. So, good luck, and remember that GLaDOS is always watching...

name: Polite animals
summary: This is a challenging casual relaxation game.

name: Polismos
summary: In Polismos you build and manage cities in the ancient Greek world. To ensure your city's prosperity you will need to care for your people, trade valuable resources, enact wise policies, and maybe even dominate other cities.

name: Police Force: Law and Honor
summary: Police Force: Law and Honor is a global multiplayer battle-royale game in a cartoon-style world as a police officer, soldier, or mercenary. Play in single-player mode, or show off your skills in battle royale and play with potential friends around the world in multiplayer mode.

name: Potion Permit: Complete Edition
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a brewing cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Poly Speed
summary: Poly Speed is a Low Poly racing game with an open world. You can play races against your friends or AI's. You can try to get the World Record in one of the races. Or build your own races to play with your friends.

name: Poop Prince
summary: Embark on an epic adventure as a hero blessed with the unique power of infinite pooping. Navigate through a captivating blend of action-platformer, metroidvania, and puzzles in a charming hand-drawn 2D world. Unleash your heroic prowess in this quirky and entertaining game!

name: Pomberito
summary: Survive 5 nights in the heart of northeastern Argentina as a local farmer. Discover the multiple endings and reveal the truth behind the haunting tales of the Pombero in a world where folklore meets terror.

name: Portal 2: Confinement
summary: Confinement is a Portal 2 mod featuring 28 challenging co-op puzzles based around the confinement mechanic.

name: Portal Survivors: Enchanstrider
summary: Take down numerous monsters with your colleagues to obtain resources you crossed through the portal! Portal Survivors is a casual game . By combining your colleagues' occupations, skills, and magic , you can kill a huge number of monsters in a variety of ways.

name: Pocket Fishing
summary: Dive into a Relaxing and Thrilling Fishing Adventure!

name: Polygon Bit Battle Royale
summary: Polygon Bit Battle Royale is a low-poly, massive multiplayer shooter, supporting 50 players per server. Battle on a large scale map with various vehicles combats. Land, loot and survive to win the battle!

name: Poly Puzzle: Dogs
summary: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with dogs.

name: Poki
summary: Pick up blocks and guide poki through 10 wacky puzzles!

name: Poly Memory: Dogs
summary: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with dogs.

name: Poorly Drawn but Horny
summary: Poorly drawn? Maybe! Horny? Definitely! Pack girls into tight spaces in a unique hand drawn puzzle game.

name: Powermount
summary: Seventh in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Pokémon Emerald Z
summary: A hack of Pokémon Emerald that contains, among other things, over 100 Fakemon with thoughtful designs and high-quality sprites, a carefully-curated Pokédex, shuffled Gym Leaders, buffs to weak Pokémon, some new maps, and a lot of love.

name: Pool Together 2
summary: Leave it all behind, kick back, and chill in Pool Together 2!

name: Portal Golf
summary: Portal Golf is a physics puzzle game with portals. Place portals around the level in order to get the ball to collect every gold bar. You have no control over the movement of the ball and can only place portals before you start the run. Try to use as few portals as possible to earn medals, or just fill the whole level with portals and have fun!

name: Pocket Tuner
summary: Pocket Tuner is a collection of rhythm mini games. Designed to be also used with the Pocketstation.

name: Poroto
summary: Poroto is a chaotic arcade adventure - blast red pegs in action-packed platforming! Jump and run across vibrant levels, strategically bouncing and shooting to eliminate all the red chaos. Pinball-style mechanics, bite-sized levels, and a pumping soundtrack make this an unforgettable experience.

name: Pogo Pogo
summary: I put together this game to upset a certain kind of individual.

name: Pokémon Rutile Ruby
summary:
Pokémon Rutile Ruby and Star Sapphire are ROM hacks for Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire. Their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Rutile Ruby and Star Sapphire is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that you level up very quickly. You should be hitting Level 100 by the time you get to the Elite Four.

The secondary focus of RR/SS is to function as a sort of “20XX Hack Pack” where everything obtainable is 100% legal for real online battles, and some features are designed to make preparing competitive teams much less of a hassle.

name: Poly Impulse
summary: Poly Impulse is a fast-paced FPS platform game where you will have to shoot colorful polyhedrons to impulse yourself through the level. Speedrunning is not an option, only the fastest with godlike aim will get the SS rank.

name: Pokémon Star Sapphire
summary:
Pokémon Rutile Ruby and Star Sapphire are ROM hacks for Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire. Their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Rutile Ruby and Star Sapphire is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that you level up very quickly. You should be hitting Level 100 by the time you get to the Elite Four.

The secondary focus of RR/SS is to function as a sort of “20XX Hack Pack” where everything obtainable is 100% legal for real online battles, and some features are designed to make preparing competitive teams much less of a hassle.

name: Pokémon: Breakdown Blast
summary: A flash game where the aim each time is to clear a board of like-coloured blocks.

name: Popper
summary: Popper is a Bomberman clone for the Timetop GameKing.

name: Poly Beats
summary: Poly Beats is a 5K rhythm game that never misses to have the very best features, and interesting gimmicks.

name: Pokemon Nova Sun
summary:
Pokémon Nova Sun and Umbra Moon are mods for Pokémon Sun and Moon. Like my Rutile Ruby and Star Sapphire hacks, their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Nova Sun and Umbra Moon is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that the player levels up very quickly. Every Pokémon in Trainers’ teams has a hold item and a proper moveset. The end-game of the main story features trainers with Levels in the mid-nineties.

Nova Sun and Umbra Moon’s secondary focus is inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee’s “20XX Hack Pack” which enables features for competitive players to practice and grind. In Nova Sun and Umbra Moon’s Legit Build, everything obtainable is 100% legal and legitimate for real online battles or trades. In all Builds, some features are designed to make preparing competitive teams much less of a hassle. Competitive hold items are much more available, a 6IV Ditto is available through an in-game trade (holding a Destiny Knot), Eggs hatch in one cycle, and Level 100 Memento Blissey battles are available in the Battle Buffet once the main story has been beaten.​

name: Pokemon Umbra Moon
summary:
Pokémon Nova Sun and Umbra Moon are mods for Pokémon Sun and Moon. Similar to the author's Rutile Ruby and Star Sapphire hacks, their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Nova Sun and Umbra Moon is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that the player levels up very quickly. Every Pokémon in Trainers’ teams has a hold item and a proper moveset. The end-game of the main story features trainers with Levels in the mid-nineties.

Nova Sun and Umbra Moon’s secondary focus is inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee’s “20XX Hack Pack” which enables features for competitive players to practice and grind. In Nova Sun and Umbra Moon’s Legit Build, everything obtainable is 100% legal and legitimate for real online battles or trades. In all Builds, some features are designed to make preparing competitive teams much less of a hassle. Competitive hold items are much more available, a 6IV Ditto is available through an in-game trade (holding a Destiny Knot), Eggs hatch in one cycle, and Level 100 Memento Blissey battles are available in the Battle Buffet once the main story has been beaten.​

name: Pokemon Penumbra Moon
summary:
Pokémon Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon are mods for Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon. Like my Rutile Ruby & Star Sapphire hacks and my Nova Sun & Umbra Moon hacks, their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that the player levels up very quickly. Every Pokémon in Trainers’ teams has a a proper moveset and many are holding items. The Elite Four and Champion are Level 100, and the player doesn’t need to grind to equal that!

Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon’s secondary focus is inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee’s “20XX Hack Pack” which is designed to improve competitive players’ ability to practice and grind. In Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon’s Legit Build, everything obtainable is 100% legal and legitimate for real online battles or trades. In all Builds, some features are designed to make preparing competitive teams much less of a hassle. Competitive hold items are much more available, a 6IV Ditto is available through an in-game trade (holding a Destiny Knot), Eggs hatch in one cycle, and Level 100 Memento Blissey battles are available in the Battle Buffet once the main story has been beaten.​

name: Pokemon FireRed and LeafGreen+
summary: Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen+ is intended to be the definitive FireRed and LeafGreen experience. It adds many quality of life and gameplay conveniences to make the game more bearable to play in 2022, adds more postgame activities, but also maintains the original battle mechanics and Gen 3 feel as much as possible.
