It's made with the pokefirered decompilation from pret, and I consider it to be complete.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket
summary: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket lets you easily collect Pokémon cards. Creatures Inc. has created exciting new visual effects for cards that are only possible digitally.

name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A
summary: A new adventure awaits within Lumiose City, where an urban redevelopment plan is underway to shape the city into a place that belongs to both people and Pokémon. Please look forward to seeing it for yourself.​​

name: Pokémon Sky Stacker
summary: The aim of each level is to reach the top of the screen by stacking blocks on top of each other.

name: Poka-poka Mama Koi Onsen: Mommy's Warm Hot Sprint
summary: "I'm the one who discovered the hot spring. Let's enjoy this together." Refresh your daily fatigue with a soothing hot spring!

name: Pong 4 Player Pub Table
summary: A 4-Player pub table arcade game collection mainly focused the Pong and other early Atari video games.

name: Pop Station
summary:
The original Pop Station is an LCD-based handheld with a casing which copies a PlayStation Portable. The games play like old Tiger/Game & Watch-style games, with only one game selectable at once.

Some other different handhelds were released under the name of Pop Station, but they use a different technology, the same as the Brick Games.

name: Pokémon: Tick-Tock Walk!
summary: An online flash game where the goal is for the Pokémon to move through an area to reach the key and take it to the door under a certain amount of time.

name: Pony World: Color by Numbers & Animal Golf: Battle Race Bundle
summary:
Color your way through the enchanting Pony World!
+
Cute animal golf battle race game!

name: PowerBeatsVR: Song Pack 3
summary: Dive into 12 exhilarating new tracks, each with three difficulty levels suitable for all fitness levels. Each song is a new challenge, a new adventure, ready to challenge every muscle in your body. Feel the rhythm, embrace the energy, and get closer to your fitness goal with every new beat!

name: Pokémon: A Farfetch'd Story
summary:
Farley the Galarian Farfetch'd is lost after an unexpected storm!
Will Farley solve this weather problem in the Alto region and perhaps find his way home?...

name: Potty Knight Saga
summary: Player WANTED For hazardous journey, bitter condition, long months of complete darkness, constant danger, safe return doubtful, honor and recognition in case of success. The controls are simple. But this game is the pinnacle of the challenge" "Does this game look cute?"

name: Poorzzle: Puzzle Alive
summary: Welcome to Poorzzle - Puzzle Alive, a pure speculative puzzle game. Here, simple lines outline the ultimate purity, and 12 crafted puzzles will subvert your way of thinking. Puzzle comes alive when you unlock it.

name: Potion Problem
summary: Potion Problem is a whimsical potion making puzzler about discovery, problem solving and potions! Create potions and fulfill orders, prepare bizarre ingredients and learn the deepest secrets of the alchemists world.

name: Pokémon Periwinkle Version: Special Blobbos Edition
P-O-X
summary:
Create custom POX Infectors by combining heads, bodies and tails, program combat sequences and personalize them with their own names.

Explore 17 levels of mazes, find out what your Infector can do and capture over 60 body parts.

Battle wirelessly against other players.

name: Point
summary:
You have to find shapes hidden throughout the level. All of the arrows will point at the hidden shape! When you think you found it, Left Click to make a guess.

You have a certain number of incorrect guesses allowed in each level. You can see the number remaining in the top left corner. Try not to click too many times or you'll have to restart the level!

name: Portal Shot Gun Teleport

name: Poor Artifact Maker

The only way to overcome the endless ferocious beasts in the wilderness is to keep collecting materials to refine spiritual weapons

name: Pop Up Story: Mahou no Hon to Seiju no Gakuen
summary: A mobile RPG about raising students to become adventurers in a school set in a fantasy world.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Warden Police Vehicle
summary: The Warden Police Vehicle features a light bar on top that can display messages for securing accident sites at night, as well as for setting up road blocks or signaling traffic offenders to pull over.

name: Potion Shop Simulator
summary: Master the art of alchemy in Potion Shop Simulator, a unique blend of simulation and strategy. Brew potions, manage your shop, and cater to a magical clientele in a single-player or co-op experience of the medieval fantasy world.

name: Potato Salad
summary: Play as 1 of 7 potatoes spanning generations and genres in your quest to defeat the King of Spudtown once and for all.

name: P.O.O Weekly
summary: A game about South African Political Satire and Parody based on real historical events.

name: Portal Dungeon: Character Pack - Hamster
summary: In the world of "Portal Dungeon," a mysterious new hero suddenly appears, possessing powerful intelligence and a petite figure.

name: Polda 8
summary: It´s the eight entry in the point and click adventure series Polda and the final game with Pankrác as the main character. Just like previous entries is this one focused on puzzles and crazy humor, however this time there are also action minigames and three controlable characters.

name: Polda 2 remástr
summary: A remastered version of 1999´s classic czech point and click adventure Polda 2.

name: Podnabu
summary: Podnabu is a fantasy world where villages, forests, fields, and meadows sprawl. A place shrouded in the mystery of and wondrous laws of nature. Many wanderers have become entangled in the secrets of this world. But perhaps it is you who can unravel the true essence of this world.

name: Politica: Nothing Ideological. It's Just Business
summary: Politica is a mini-game political simulator. Assuming the role of a lobbyist in republican Italy, players will have to accumulate as much money and power as possible through lobbying strategies, political relations and intrigue.

name: PolyDestroyer
summary: Engage in cosmic battles with PolyDestroyer, a riveting 2D shooter. Navigate space, customize your ship, and thwart alien foes to save the galaxy. Your spacecraft, your adventure!

name: Population Goals!
summary: Mine, discover, and build to help your newly cloned citizens avoid traps and enemies on their way to the New Earth portal. Create safe pathways through many different biomes in this lemmings-like puzzle strategy game, on your way to meeting your Population Goals!

name: Posthaste!
summary: Postbound! is an arcade-style sorting game following your journey as a novice postal worker. In this casual, light-hearted, and family-friendly game filled with humor, you must correctly sort mail into the appropriate boxes before time runs out, while dealing with the Postmaster and Post Inspector!

name: Pogo-Gogo
summary: A game about pogoing up skyscrapers.

name: Polyoshapes
summary: Polyoshapes is a captivating puzzle game where players engage in the strategic placement of various geometric shapes on a grid.

name: Potato Sack Racing Simulator 2024: Digital Deluxe Mega Chad Edition
summary: I know what you are thinking, and yes, this game does feature the ability to fight grandparents, mugs, speakers and of course dirty tissues... Wait, this is a game about Potato Sack Racing? Umm.. Yeah there are like 4 levels about Potato Sack Racing out of the 17 levels... Phew, we almost forgot to make it have something to do with Potato Sack Racing! But now trust me bro, this game is the BEST Potato Sack Racing game to have ever been made! At least, from what we could find.. Yeah this is actually the first and only Potato Sack Racing game, it’s almost like it’s not a good idea to make a game about Potato Sack Racing, it’s pretty fun to say Potato Sack Racing. Potatooooo sack racingggggg!!!!

name: Pokémath!
summary: Pokémath! is an educational math game based on the Pokémon series. The game features 5 levels, which increases the difficulty of the questions per level. After each level, you gain a new Pokémon.

name: Polyzone
summary: "Polyzone" is a dynamic war zone where strategy, skill and style collide. Enter the polygonal battlefield, customize your loadout, and join the epic multiplayer experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Get the demo for free now and become the best futuristic warrior!

name: Power of Petanque
summary:
A druidic and magical adaptation of pétanque. Compete against your friends!
Compete against your friends in the traditional sport of petanque to determine who is the master of petanque.

name: Point4Point
summary: point4point is a rather dark adventure game. Games are created using RPG maker MV and there are no major difficulties in operating the game. In the game you can meet different types of monsters. The player must escape from it by avoiding elements that aim at the main character and hinder him.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Extended Edition
summary: The Extended Edition contains the Police Simulator: Patrol Officers game and the Garage Bundle.

name: Power Tools VR
summary: Power Tools VR allows you to try out a variety of power tools in a safe environment, allowing you to learn how to use such tools without the risk of harm to yourself or others around you.

name: Power On: Energy Flow
summary: Feel the electricity in your own hands playing “Power On”. Rotate the wires to ensure proper power sources can reach the lamps.

name: Pollie
summary: In a world devastated by an apocalyptic disaster, where once-thriving cities are left in ruins, a lonely robot named Pollie finds itself in a relentless adventure.

name: Pocket Pusher
summary: Your coin-pushing and ball-dropping fix! Drop strategically, win rewards, and enjoy the classic arcade thrill from the comfort of your home. A premium coin pusher experience, minimized.

name: Portal Quest
summary: Escape from the laboratory using a portal gun.

name: Polytrack
summary: Polytrack is a low poly racing game made by the single developer, Kodub, that is inspired by Trackmania. It has a growing community of players and high skill ceiling. It also allows players to create their own tracks to share and play with the community.

name: Poe
summary: In this fast-paced difficult platformer, you assume the role of Bernard and his son Poe in an attempt to find each other. Enjoy the short, but sweet story of their paths to each other that are filled with friends, enemies and other obstacles.

name: Power Fantasy: Kaze the Samurai
summary: Kaze the Samurai, adorned in crimson armor, embodied the ancient code of the warrior with unparalleled swiftness and precision. Raised in the shadow of cherry blossoms, he honed his skills under the tutelage of masters, blending speed with deadly precision in each strike.

name: Pogo Rogue
summary: Bounce to the top in this skill based, roguelite action-platformer! Collect powerful items, pick unique weapons, and fight off a variety of enemies while navigating around with a fun, difficult, and unique movement system. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Political Punchers: 2024 Arena
summary: In a time where politics feel more like a battleground than a debate, Political Punchers transforms the intensity of the political sphere into an exhilarating 3D fighting game that’s both humorous and thrilling. As the presidential election looms on the horizon, it’s time to elect your fighter!

name: Pole Position II
summary: The Super Cassette Vision port of Pole Position II.

name: Pocket Zaurus: Party Island no Nakama-tachi 1
Pocket Zaurus: Party Island no Nakama-tachi 2
Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Gold Edition
summary: Welcome to the Brighton Police Department! Enjoy a comprehensive experience with the Gold Edition! This includes the main game, the brand-new Highway Patrol Expansion, and the Garage Bundle containing all previously published car DLCs.

name: Porn Empire
summary:
Porn Empire is a 18+ business management game where you take the roll of an amateur porn producer and work your way to the top.

Create your character, level up your attributes, pick up new models and train them, build studios, hire staff, create websites and try to run a successful business.

name: Pocketing the Ball
summary: Dive into the 3D Billiards Simulator, boasting lifelike graphics and physics for an authentic pool hall experience. Challenge your skills and strategy in a game designed for precision and adaptability, ideal for both intense practice and relaxed play.

name: Post Soviet Strike: Chernobyl Legacy
summary: Post Soviet Strike: Chernobyl Legacy immerses players in a stunning post-apocalyptic landscape reclaimed by nature. Navigate lush forests, murky swamps, and sprawling fields while battling gangs and mutants. Adapt, scavenge, and upgrade to survive and conquer the old soviet world.

name: PostLife
summary: A surreal Exploration-based RPG all about experiencing a comical, yet bizarre mansion! Follow Wade, your typical teenage cat thing who only enjoys two things. Silence and getting high!

name: Poop Spotter: The Game To Improve the Quality of Poop~
summary: Monitor the line of the poop factory and find out the defective products. This is a "spot the difference" game with poop.

name: Pokémon Sword and Shield
summary: As the name suggests, this ROM attempts to adapt the story and region from the GBA Pokémon Sword and Shield games.

name: Polar Bowler 1st Frame
summary: Send PB flying down the ice and hit as many pins as you can in this arcade-style game.

name: Posh Boutique 2
summary: After taking over her grandmother's line of fancy clothing stores, Alicia finds out she's won the lottery! With her winnings in hand, Alicia's ready to take her Posh Boutique to the next level. Help Alicia expand her business by assisting each customer in their search for the perfect outfit, adding just the right accessories, and choosing the best upgrades and enhancements for each location.

name: PopIdle
summary: A daily guessing game in which players are tasked to guess the mystery album of the day when given a highly pixelated version of the album cover. Each incorrect guess makes the album picture quality better, providing more information. Players can also play through all previous daily challenges at their leisure.

name: Pool Nation
summary:
Pool Nation is the ultimate Pool Simulator for PlayStation4. Prepare yourself for pixel perfect physics, photo-realistic graphics and super detailed visuals in this truly immersive representation of the sport.

Play live matches seamlessly online, compete in Leagues, share, challenge and enroll in the Pool Nation Cup, explore our unique rule set customization tool and re-discover this much-loved sport.

name: Pokémon: Battle Trainer
summary: Pokémon: Battle Trainer was a series of electronic toys. It is the successor to the THINKChip Interactive System and utilized the THINKChip+ within Pokémon figures made for the game system.

name: PO'ed: Definitive Edition
summary:
It's a remaster of 1995's shooter PO’ed. It fixes bugs present in the original game and brings several QoL features to enhance the gameplay, plus a new hardcore difficulty. However, these are togglable features which means the players can also play the remastered version with the bugs and without the QoL features.

The remaster also supports widescreen modes with properly adjusted HUD. In addition, there are 15 achievements to hunt for. PO’ed: Definitive Edition can be played with enhanced controls, antialiasing and increased framerate up to 4K 144 frames per second performance.

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Skies
Polygon In
summary: A game where you can survive, fight zombies and bandits, and do it all with a friend!

name: Poon Puzzle: Hard Levels DLC
summary: 18 more levels of increased difficulty for puzzle lovers

name: PokéRogue
summary: A Pokémon fangame heavily inspired by the roguelite genre. Battle endlessly while gathering stacking items, exploring many different biomes, and reaching Pokémon stats you never thought possible.

name: Pounce and the Twin Trees
summary: Unleash your inner tiger! Pounce through a vibrant world & its mirrored corruption in this challenging metroidvania. Master agility, traverse shifting landscapes & outrun danger. Can you unlock the Twin Trees' secrets & save the day? Wishlist now! #platformer #adventure

name: Polar Pathways
summary: Embark on a heartwarming journey as a lil' penguin tryin to find his way back to his community. Explore the polar pathways and icey caves at your own pace. Find your colony of penguins you've lost after a disastrous avalanche and get back home!

name: Power Quest Survivors
summary: Power Quest Survivors is a challenging bullet hell game where players face relentless waves of enemies. Through strategic gameplay and skillful evasion, players earn experience points to unlock new abilities, enhancing their chances of survival in this unforgiving fantasy world

name: Polygon Hell 4D
summary: You've been trapped in a Non-Euclidean reality, and the only way out is to go on a brutal massacre. Gear up, and get ready to lose your sanity in this disorienting action-packed shooter!

name: Pool of Madness
summary: A retro-styled Lovecraftian pool game with roguelite elements. Shoot some balls. Unleash horrors from beyond. Go insane. Try again.

name: Police on Duty 2
summary: Prepare yourself to enforce the law and preserve tranquility in Police on Duty 2.

summary:
The Mega Edition of Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid comes with:
- Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid physical game sealed in a standard case.
- Deluxe Morpher SteelBook with inset magnet recess.
- Five power coins that magnetically attach to the SteelBook Morpher
- 18 x 24 inch poster.
- Collector's Edition Content:
- Update One Content (v1.2):
- Update Two Content (v1.3):

name: Postrok
summary: Unleash your inner warrior in this unique roguelite odyssey. Experience explosive quests, leverage the mystic powers of Bifrospheres, uncover potent Runes, and maintain your Hugr in a chaotic, post-Ragnarok realm.

name: Police Station Simulator
summary: You’re in charge of a run-down police station. Will you manage to restore it to its former glory? Arm yourself with some coffee and donuts, because there's a lot of renovation and micro-management work to do!

name: Pokémon Emerald: Double Edition
summary: A ROM hack of Pokémon Emerald, which changes almost the entire game to be exclusively double battles, modernizes several mechanics, and makes all 386 pokémon obtainable.

name: Pokémon Unova Red
summary: Unova Red is a re-imagining of Generation 1, but using the Pokedex from Generation 5. This is because the Unova Pokedex was designed to stand alone without any Pokemon from additional regions, much like the original Pokedex. The plot is effectively identical to the Generation 1 games, the only major change is in the Pokemon available. There is also a challenge mode patch which provides a more difficult version of the same hack.

name: Pookie has a Fantasy!
summary: "Pookie has a fantasy" is an adult visual novel where you, as Pookie's boyfriend, fulfill her fantasies.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Highway Patrol Expansion
summary: Discover the Police Simulator: Patrol Officers expansion and extend your patrol area! Engage in intense highway chases and use fast-paced pit maneuvers to tactically stop fleeing suspects who are in violation of the law, and enjoy a more dynamic police simulation experience.

name: PolyZ
summary: Explore a world devastated by apocalypse, teeming with the infected. Scavenge for survival amid scarcity, competing for resources. Will you trust in alliances for safety or brave the dangers alone? This is your journey in PolyZ (PVP/PVE).

name: Pokémon Africanus
summary:
Immerse yourself in the history of Ancient Europe in Pokémon Africanvs, This begins in the year 219 BC. and takes place throughout the entire 2nd Punic War.

Our protagonist is a cadet of the Sagunto guard, who is awakened by the centurion Cepressus because Carthage is besieging the city. After escaping and getting to safety, our protagonist will defeat gymnasiums, becoming stronger and ending up hitting back at Hannibal, the Carthaginian leader, but he will not do it alone, you will meet different historical figures during the game. Interact with them and earn their friendship in Pokémon Africanvs!

name: Pokémon: Golden Emerald
summary: A Pokémon Fangame made on RPG Maker XP, using the Pokémon Script Project : Evolved starter kit. Explore a brand new region and battle trainers with your Pokémon ! Resolve puzzles, save people, obtain all 8 badges, beat the Elite 4, and more !

name: Polygonal Passage
summary: A low-poly version based on the well-known puzzle game Portal! For people who are bored and just want a casual puzzle experience.

name: PortalBox
summary: This game introduces portals to the classic box-pushing game! With the addition of portals, problems that were impossible in the ordinary box-pushing game become possible. Let’s explore this wonderful box-pushing game together!

name: Poor Thief
summary: We're guiding a thief to steal diamonds on the ground, earning points as we steal diamonds, but constantly being chased by the police.

name: Pocket Pusher: The Warehouse
summary: A level for Pocket Pusher based on my experiences working in a Warehouse

name: PolarDread
summary:
PolarDread is a horror game inspired by games in the Sit And Survive Genre that takes the concept provided in the game and flips it on its head several times, throwing the trailer into tense situations where they will need to act on their feet to avoid bloodthirsty mascots in a winter-themed resort.

Hide under a desk from a massive mechanical bear, throw objects, or even the mascots themselves, close doors, vents, and keep your barring until the clock strikes six.

name: Pocket Idler: Fishing Pond
summary: Welcome, aspiring angler! Pocket Idler: Fishing Pond is the first cast in a series of relaxing and casual idle games designed to deliver bite-sized satisfaction.

name: Politician Simulator
summary: A short, 5 minute funny game about politicians

name: Por um Punhado de Trólares
summary: An elderly caregiver simulator, a game about the joint adventures of a Ninja, a Fox, an architectural designer, and the Norse god Heimdall, about my fictional folk/trollcore/hardtroll/trollwave band Trolls of the Mountain where at the end there's the final battle against the current troll king who bought the mountain for around 17 Trolls and ousted the previous leader.

name: Pocket Music
summary: Make music on the move with Pocket Music, the music creation game. Create your own music from a selection of samples, drum beats, baselines, melodies, and other musical instruments. Play them back, save them to your cartridge, or swap them with a friend. Features include more than 600 different high quality samples and instruments, custom drumbeats, baselines, melodies and sound effects, a riff editor to allow you to create your own sounds, and prearranged tracks to demonstrate the capabilities of the game.

name: Poibos Part 1: Dasshutsu
summary: Poibos (a misspelling of Phoebus) is a Japanese-made role-playing game. The small paying window displays a rather abstract map on which the player can navigate the characters. The game begins with Jorg only, but up to six characters may join the party and participate in combat afterwards. The characters' stamina bar is depleted depending on the terrain they walk on, and they need to rest regularly. Turn-based battles require balancing offensive and defensive manoeuvres, as well as actively protecting weaker party members. The game has a fairly complex weapon system, with several weapon types, all of which (due to the protagonist's outlaw status) can only be acquired by stealing or as battle trophies. Weapon energy deteriorates over time, having major impact on battle performance.

name: Poltergeist Watcher
summary: Can you survive the night watching the cursed house?

name: Postal F: The Thursday Expansion - A Mod for Friday Night Funkin'.
summary:
After the events of the first week, the dude sees himself encountering a familiar face: Krotchy! Go up against Krotchy in a new nutsack wrenchin' week, along with another song we can't seem to figure out!

Boyfriend seems to have found himself in a sticky situation when he enters the wrong side of town...

Postal F: Apocalypse Friday is a mod based around the Postal franchise, created by Running with Scissors Studios. In this mod, you go against the infamous "Postal Dude" in a 2 song mania featuring Boyfriend and a familiar Redhead. Will you survive or regret your decision? On behalf of the mod team, we all hope you have an enjoyable experience. This mod started out simply as only a cover but evolved into a 2 month long passion project.

name: Pooool
summary: Pooool is a small, pool-inspired physics puzzler where you combine balls of similar sizes to create even bigger ones, all while trying to save room for more. Chase your hi-score, share scores with friends, and master your flinging skills!

name: Porter
summary: In Porter, you play as Yug who may teleport and jump. If Yug teleports into a wall, Yug dies. If Yug jumps into spikes, Yug dies. The goal is to use Yugs teleportation and jump to get to the yellow coin in each level.

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Special Episode 0 - In A Dark Past
summary: This ROM hack expands the lore of Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky by diving into the emotional and ideological origins of Grovyle and Dusknoir. Originally close allies, the two Pokémon are slowly driven apart as their conflicting visions of fate and freedom emerge. Through a dramatic prequel narrative, players experience their transformation, culminating in a seamless connection to the official storyline. Designed as a character-driven and lore-enhancing mod, this episode offers an immersive adventure through rich dialogue, expressive art, and a faithful adaptation of the original mechanics.

name: Pokemomcore
summary: Travel through Pallet Town and Viridian Town after an anti-capitalist and anti-speciesist revolution! Red, Blue, Green and Yellow have fought to emancipate Kanto from the grip of the Pokémon League and its alienating power over the people. And you, you play as GAMIN Lesli who has to pick up a package for their MOM so she can make pottery this weekend with her friends! Will you arrive in time to get the package and will there be any rhubarb pie left?

name: Pome Rumble
summary: Pome Rumble is a puzzle-based RPG game where players collect and grow their characters to defeat various enemies and explore an unknown planet.

name: Pome Rumble M
summary: Pome Rumble M is a puzzle-based RPG game where players collect and grow their characters to defeat various enemies and explore an unknown planet.

name: Porntris
summary: An erotic version of the popular Tetris game developed by Image-Line.

name: Pokémon Odyssey
summary:
Embark on a perilous journey into the Yggdrasil Labyrinth, a colossal desert maze on Talrega Island rumored to hold untold treasures or lost civilizations. As Nyx, a new guild recruit, your quest to unravel its depths takes a disastrous turn, transforming exploration into a desperate fight for survival and truth within the enigmatic roots of the world tree.

This story-driven Pokémon adventure ditches gyms and evil teams for pure dungeon crawling! Experience double battles, resource gathering, FOE evasion, and naval exploration. Enjoy deep customization: all Pokémon have perfect IVs, EVs are managed via items, and natures/abilities can be changed. Explore Gen 1-3 with new Etrian Variants, side quests, and a rebalanced, grind-free experience focused on strategic depth.

name: Pokémon Crown
summary:
Pokémon Crown is an entirely new gameplay experience. While it is still an exploration-focused RPG, we have combined many elements from other genres to create something truly unique. In Pokémon Crown, you will rediscover each Pokémon and how they interact with one another using our new Auto Chess battle engine! Play against interesting and unique teams while strategizing on synergy, placement, and type matchups! 6v6 combat like you’ve never seen before!

Pokémon Crown is a Medieval RPG set in the vast and magical Region of Guelder. Guelder, as a rich resource bastion, was thrust into a long-lasting war. Guelder triumphed after many years, but not without a cost… While the region was rebuilding, the King’s Diviner predicted a dual prophecy for the kingdom: a future of light and a future of darkness. Based on these visions, the King realized that unless something changed, the kingdom was doomed to more war.

name: Pokkén Tournament: Update Ver.A14
summary: Version A14 is an update for the arcade version of Pokkén Tournament released on July 20th, 2016. It added four new characters and made balance changes to bring the game in line with the Wii U version as of Version 1.3, as well as including Reshiram and Cresselia as support Pokémon, adding Mission Panel mode, and expanding the Tutorial mode.

name: Pokkén Tournament: Update Ver.N01
summary: Version N01 was an update released for the arcade version of Pokkén Tournament on February 9th, 2016. Most notably, it made Chandelure available as a Battle Pokémon.

name: Pokkén Tournament: Update Ver.C07
summary: Version C07 is an update to the arcade version of Pokkén Tournament released on September 13th, 2016. It added the support sets of Victini and Dragonite and new Halloween-themed costumes, as well as Training Gym and Tellur Town (Autumn) as stages.

name: Pokémon Mega Evolution Aquamarine
summary:
What would you do if your entire childhood, your home, your world… collapsed before your eyes on a day like any other?

In this hack, we will live the story of a young man whose past was tragic.
Our protagonist will have to face a tyrannical and corrupt organization, whose radical desires for peace lead to the massacre of innocents or the destruction of entire towns due to mere suspicions.

The government receives enormous financial income from this organization, the police do not intervene or act in this situation…
The citizens live in fear, the coaches do not dare to stand up to this injustice…

Our Hero is not a rookie, He has enormous knowledge about POKéMON and is very different from other young people his age.
We will see his ability in combat shine more than once, but not only his… The protagonist will meet brave heroes who will join his cause.

name: Portal Defenders
summary: This is a kind of spiritual sequel to our mini-games Castle Crashing the Beard and Pico Blast, but taken to a new level of completeness. It's also our tribute to the site that keeps us inspired and all the people in it (35 unique NG personalities represented in this).

name: Potionomics: Masterwork Edition
summary:
Assume the role of a penniless witch named Sylvia who must transform her debt-ridden potion shop into a thriving business.

Potionomics: Masterwork Edition will offer new features, including voice-overs, Endless Mode, “Cozy” and “Capitalism” difficulty levels, and additional languages.

name: Pokémon Yellow Legacy
summary: a Pokémon Rom Hack made by TheSmithPlays with the intended purpose of fixing Pokémon Yellow into a more polished experience while staying true to the vision of Generation 1's Yellow.

name: PoeticRambling
summary: "PoeticRambling" is coded as a layered ramble in Twine. With an interactive fiction approach to a ramble that happens to rhyme.

name: Pocket Professor: Kwik Notes Volume 1
summary: Great for test preparation - (quizzes, finals, ACT/SAT preparation, military entrance exams) basically, this becomes the ultimate set of flashcards assisting students in evaluating their "own" knowledge level in several core subject areas homeschooling or medical absences adult education and GED preparation aid to those preparing to re-enter school or the job market.

name: Popping Bubble
summary: This game combines Tetris-style gameplay with a unique twist. Balls of various colors fall from the top, and you connect same-colored balls to touch both walls, earning points. Realistic physics add unpredictability. Chain reactions increase scores tenfold, encouraging strategic play.

name: Ponder
summary: A fishing simulation game set in a lush fantasy world.

name: Power Stakes
summary: Power Stakes is the first game in the horse simulation game series by Tose Software, in the game the player can only go through different stats of horses, places & jockeys. the game is heavy on japanese text, so only people that can fully understand japanese will like this game. There is no gameplay at all, since the player can only choose to view different races from different camera angles.

name: Power Stakes 2
summary: Power Stakes 2 is the third (and last) game in Tose Software game series featuring the new data of the new season over the previous game. The game again features the 3d engine to watch the race in different camera angles that the player select in the game main menu. As new features the game now features the pedigree data and other things.

name: Potty Painter
summary:
The goal of the game is to join the dotted lines around a grid of squares each different in size with each valuing different points. In the meantime the player must avoid enemies who try to capture them. Starting the game, the player has 5 lives and 3 freezes which enable the player to freeze the computer controlled characters for around 10 seconds.

Levels alternate between playing as a monkey against tribesmen and playing as a paint-roller against teddy bears. Completing a level enables the player to play a bonus game which involves guiding a teddy bear to a banana to gain an extra 1000 points.

name: Poseidon
summary: Poseidon wants to return his beloved golden sharks back to the Greek seas, go to a small island and help God find his subjects!)

name: Pokémon Emerald Cross
summary:
Pokémon Emerald Cross is a ROM Hack of Pokémon Emerald designed to bring a massive array of quality of life features to the original game.

"Play Pokémon Emerald the way you remember it instead of how old Pokémon games actually were!"

Includes many new in-game modes that affect gameplay, quality-of-life additions, and tons of customization options so you can have an experience as close to or as far from vanilla as you want.

Emerald Cross fixes a lot of bugs from Pokémon Emerald, including:

Broken RNG
Battle facility bugs
Map errors, a lot of them!

name: Polish Community Project
summary: A bunch of Polish guys made a bunch of maps and put them together to celebrate Doom,

name: Poop Fiction
summary:
A Global Game Jam 2018 entry

An apartment building. Four different homes. A most awkward crime.

As the manager, you have to listen to your neighbors to solve an enigma. Can you do it?

name: Ponolf
summary: Sad news for you. There is a fool in here. Ponolf is a multiplayer deductive game with max 12 players. Create quizzes, answer them, and discuss about the some of them to deduce who got it wrong. Is your weapon Knowledge or Strength? Well, let's start the meeting of tonight.

name: Poolrooms
summary: Welcome to Level 37, commonly known as the Poolrooms, a psychological horror experience that immerses players in an eerie, otherworldly environment.

name: Pokémon Donjon Mystère Online
summary:
PDMO is a French free 2D MMORPG based on the Pokemon Mystery Dungeon series. Embark on a unique adventure as one of 20 different pokemon starters! Missions, harvesting, crafting, tumultuous dungeons, events, pokemons and, above all, fun!

Start your adventure now!

name: Power Grid
summary: Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese.

name: Port of Jumanah
summary: 'Port of Jumanah’ is a retro pixel-style underwater adventure with rogue-lite elements. Meet quirky characters, explore unique places, and encounter unusual sea life. Treasures and troubles await in these seas! Are you ready to dive into the unknown? Lovely mermaids and menacing sharks await!

name: Potion Punch Rivals
summary: Potion Punch Rivals puts your shopkeeping, potion punching skills to the test. Race against your rival to see who can take orders first, prep fastest, and serve best.

name: Pokemon Kalos Crystal
summary: Pokemon Kalos Crystal is a sequel to Unova Red. This is a re-imagining of Generation 2, where the first generation of Pokemon was the Unova Pokedex, and the new second-generation Pokemon is the Kalos Pokedex. This game features all Pokemon from generations 5 and 6, and like in Unova Red, all Pokemon in the Pokedex is obtainable within a single playthrough.

name: Potion Permit: Complete DLC Bundle
summary:
Customise your room with:
- Animal Plushies
- Aquarium
- Capital Antique Clock
- Capital Chemist Equipment
- Christmas Tree
- Excalibur
- Giant Noxe Plush Doll
- Halloween Skull
- Jack-o'-lantern Light
- Lucky Cat Statue
- Lunar New Year Lantern
- Lunar New Year Lanterns
- Miniature Blimp
- Oriental Folding Wall
- Pirate Ship Model
- Potion Permit Poster (F)
- Potion Permit Poster (M)
- Red Flower Arrangement
- Rudolph Plush
- Santa Sled
- Seashell Lighting - Desk Lamps
- Seashell Lighting - Stand
- Seashell Lighting - Wall
- Small Fairy Spring
- Snowman Plush Toy
- Spooky Ghost
- Surfboard
- Vending Machine
- White Cat
- Witch's Broom
- Wooden Bear Statue

name: Politics The Game
summary: Become a parliamentarian, create a powerful party, and lead it to victory in this humorous RPG. Manage your popularity and dignity, use unique powers, and navigate a storyline inspired by current events.

name: Possessor(s)
summary:
Possessor(s) is a fast-paced action side scroller with combat inspired by platform fighters, a story told through dangerous characters, set in a deep interconnected world ready for exploration.

Play as Luca, the host, and Rehm, her less-than-cooperative counterpart, as they explore a quarantined city ripped apart and flooded by an interdimensional catastrophe. Their only hope of survival is by learning to co-exist.

Possessor(s) takes place across the interconnected sprawl of a destroyed mega-city, from collapsed skyscrapers to an abandoned aquarium, all riddled with secrets. Hauntingly beautiful 3D environments form a stunning backdrop over which hand-drawn and animated characters, and mysterious sci-fi horror action take center stage.

Choose multiple paths in an open-ended world structure as you look to uncover the truth behind the catastrophe. Meet a cast of engaging characters, each with their own heart-breaking story to follow in the aftermath of the devastation.

Gameplay is centered around tight, fast-paced platforming with a range of unique movement abilities that extends to its tense, precise, combat. Balance ground and air attacks, replete with combos and juggles as you encounter a variety of deadly enemies and challenging bosses. Find and unlock a wide array of powerful weapons and upgrades to bolster your arsenal and explore previously inaccessible areas.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Alice's Adventures Special Pack
summary: Take a trip down the rabbit hole to uncover a topsy-turvy, swizzy, whirly world of psychedelic colours, maximalist décor and larger-than-life locales. Clean up Wonderland in five fantastical new levels for PowerWash Simulator.

name: Pokemon Garbage Gold
summary: To begin, Garbage Gold is a trashmon hack, meaning the player will only be able to obtain and use weak Pokemon. In most cases, these Pokemon will be less than 425 BST (combined base stat total). There are some exceptions, but this is the general rule. A wide variety of encounters are available, and are significantly different from vanilla Heart Gold. Evolution levels are changed, and some Pokemon wont evolve at all if the evolutions are too good.

name: Polka Sheep
summary: A homebrew game for Game Boy starring a sheep who escalates on spiky walls by using its fur.

name: Pokepia: Pokecolo Utopia
summary:
Welcome to the world of Pokepia!
This is our utopia, where you can wear the clothes you like, talk to the people you like, and talk about what you like.
Change into 3D clothes that can be enjoyed from any angle, and go out to your friend's star!

name: Pogo Stick Champion
summary: Bounce with your pogo stick to new lands!

name: Pop Art
summary: Painting has never been easier! Just relax and enjoy! In Paint by Numbers!

name: Polaris
summary: Team up and take flight in this sci-fi co-op shooter with fully destructible environments. Soar through dynamic open levels using powerful abilities, unearth the coveted secrets of Polaris, and lay waste to the hostile cityscapes of a colonizing threat— reclaim your homeworld!

name: Pokémon R.O.W.E.
summary: Pokémon R.O.W.E. is an open-world take on Hoenn and the Sevii Islands. Every Pokémon is available from the start offering endless team possibilities without the need for breeding. With multiple gameplay modes, modern game mechanics, and many quality-of-life improvements, R.O.W.E. aims to provide a fresh and replayable Pokémon experience.

name: Pokémon Fire Red Extended
summary:
All Pokémon from the first to the eighth generation are available for capture!
This project is recommended to people who have never had the opportunity to play Pokémon before.
Some people know Pokémon anime, so this project is an excellent choice to be the first experience for this public target.
As I said before, our journey will only be in Kanto.
Unlike Pokémon Fire Red vanilla, the players don't have access to the seven islands.

name: Pokémon Voyager
summary:
You have lived your whole life in Andromeda City, the metropolitan heart of Keplara. Your father works for the Andromeda PD; your mother is the local Antares League, gym leader. Someday you’ll get a Trainer’s License of your own and become a well-regarded Pokémon trainer yourself.

But today is not that day. Instead, today is an exciting day for Andromeda City: your mother’s Antares League gym is moving into the snazziest new digs, all the way up to the top floors of the recently-completed Pokémon community skyscraper! There are still a few things left to move and unpack before the grand opening, but it’s nothing that you and your father can’t handle. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Potato Escape: One Touch Runner
summary: Dodge obstacles as a potato.

name: Poultry Princess
summary:
What a day for Princess Guinevere! Knight Arthur arrives tomorrow for their wedding, but she was cursed during the night and she woke up as a cute little chicken!

Will Guinevere manage to find the culprit and restore herself to her human form...or will she fall in love with one of Poultry Princess' 3 love interests on her way?!

name: Pokémon Eclesia
summary: Pokémon Ecclesia is a Pokémon fangame created by pingupollas. This game combines humorous elements with a serious main plot and innovative mechanics. It is heavily influenced by OT, as well as the games Fear and Hunger and Bloodborne.

name: Polynya
summary: Polynya is an atmospheric puzzle-adventure set on a drifting ice floe. Guide a small crew as they explore shifting ice, solve environmental puzzles, and manage limited resources to survive harsh, minimalist arctic landscapes. The game emphasizes mood, quiet exploration, and clever interactions with ice, water, and weather to progress.

name: Pokémon Shiny Gold Sigma
summary:
Hack of Pokémon: FireRed Version.

A new revolutionary game. Improvements at Johto Region, adding Kanto, plus a special section with Orange Archipelago, Battle Frontier and now Hoenn finished.

name: Potion Quest
summary:
A puzzle game where the player must complete recipes by knocking potions into the recipe area as they drop from above.

You have limited time so must act fast and get the recipes completed.

name: Portal: The Flash Version MapPack
summary: Portal: The Flash Version MapPack is a remake of the namesake Flash fan game for Portal. Some of its chambers were included in Portal: Still Alive.

name: Popgoes Arcade: Fighting Chance
summary: "Fighting Chance" is an upcoming FREE major update for POPGOES Arcade on Steam. My final attempt at perfecting the original vision for the game, giving those who enjoyed the game a reason to play it again, and those who didn't enjoy it a reason to give it another try.

name: Polis 2: Någon ljuger
summary: Polis 2 is a Swedish game where you play as a leader of the murder investigation unit of the police force and the task is to solve a murder case which starts with the finding of a dismembered arm in a lake. The gameplay consists of you assigning team members tasks, interrogation, and collect evidence whereof lamps will indicate progress of how much has been collected. Once enough evidence is collected the player can eventually put together who the murderer is. The game was released with its own localization in Denmark under the title 'Mistænkt'. It also changed the case introduction a bit where instead it is a woman who washed ashore on the beach.

name: Polis
summary:
Polis is a Swedish game where you play as a leader of the homicide investigation unit and the task is to solve a 3 different murder cases.

The gameplay consists of assigning team members to find evidence as well as conduct interrogations. Eventually you will have enough to put together who the murderer is.

After the initial release the game was re-released in three separate acts representing the 3 cases:
- Polis: Det röda fallet
- Polis: Det gula fallet
- Polis: Det blåa fallet

name: Poly Plaza
summary: An open world game where you need to invest to become the richest man in town.

name: Pokemon Auto Chess
summary: Pokémon Auto Chess is an auto battler fan game based on Pokémon Mystery Dungeon world!

name: Polyaris
summary: Polyaris is a single-player, first-person survival skiing game set in a post-nuclear, procedurally generated Arctic world. Survive the cold, ski through icy wastelands, find essential resources, fight enemies, and uncover the mystery of why you are the last one alive.

name: Pokémon Ashen Frost
summary: Pokémon Ashen Frost, formerly Pokémon Present, revolves around Sylvester, a kind, albeit surly, officer-turned-detective in Riverview City. Sylvester works alongside his not-quite-canine unit, Swinub, to solve minor cases. Tracking down missing cheques and ice sculpture vandals doesn't come without risks, however; the frigid metropolis is home to ordinary people and criminals alike. To uncover the truth, Sylvester steps on the toes of some of the city's most important figureheads... as well as the mafia's.

name: Poorgirl
summary:
A rhythm tap game to play with a poor girl, Kokeshi, who is goot at dancing!
A bonus game will occur if normal play is successful! You can get a lot of money.
Play a lot and aim for a millionaire!

name: Popmundo
summary:
Popmundo is an online role-playing game and community where the players strive for fame in a virtual music industry.

You start the game as a complete nobody with nothing but your hopes and dreams. You can practice your music, play a few gigs, and begin to build a fanbase. Play your cards right and you'll soon be touring the world, cutting chart-topping records, and leaving a wake of tantalizing scandals behind you!

name: Post Ghost
summary:
It's time to deliver some spooky letters to the ghosts in the neighborhood.

They've been waiting for a long time to hear from their friends and family. Avoid obstacles and angry ghost doggies to make sure they get the right letters.

name: Pokémon: Cuerpo de Cristal
summary: Pokemon Crystal fan remake with next-gen improvements

name: Pokémon Weird Type Fun
summary: Weird Type Fun is a simple rom hack with an even simpler concept: to have even series veterans be confused about type matchups. With 18 all new types and a completely reimagined pokédex to match, WTF makes the ever familiar Kanto a little bit less so.

name: Pokémon Hidden Place
summary: A Pokémon fangame.

name: Poison Heart
summary: Poison Heart is a snowy city / Xmas-themed / hi-tech level that should last you about 50 mins on your first playthrough.

name: Popcorn Fever
summary:
Popcorn Fever is a “suika game” featuring popcorns, developed by Yunicorn Studio !

Need a coffee break, stuck in a long commute, or just want to pass the time? Start a game and merge as many popcorns as you can!

Aim, drop, and merge the popcorns to score points. Customize your game by unlocking unique and surprising powers. Find your own style and climb the leaderboard !

Will you reach the top of the best player pantheon?!

name: Pokémon Emerald Rogue V2
summary:
Ever wondered what Pokemon might look like as a Roguelike?
Pokemon Emerald Rogue is my take on it!

name: Pokémon Recharged Yellow
summary: Pokemon Recharged Yellow is a fully completed GBA ROM hack made by Jaizu. Embark on an exciting journey through a more challenging Kanto region, redesigned in the Generation 3 style. Hang out with your buddy Pikachu, have fun with the Pokémon you meet, collect gym badges, and take on Team Rocket, featuring Jessie, James, and Meowth.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Nintendo Switch Edition
summary: Grab your Nintendo Switch and experience the everyday life of a police officer by joining the ranks of this fictitious American city's police force. Begin with parking violations and work your way up to shouldering greater responsibilities.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Garage Bundle
Poker Poker Magic
summary: Embark on a magical journey with Caroline and Clovis in "Poker Poker Magic," a delightful 1v1 puzzle/action game for Playdate. Join Caroline, a spirited yet somewhat absent-minded magician-in-training, and her trusty dove, Ceres, as they set out to find a magical hat that could help Caroline ace her end-of-year exams at the Robert Houdin School of Prestidigitation. Little do they know, their adventure will lead them into a whimsical forest filled with colorful characters, including a clown, a four-eared rabbit, and a horse prince, each providing opportunities for thrilling magical duels.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Muckingham Files - Part 3
summary: The third instalment of the Muckingham Files is the ultimate clean-up for aquatic fanatics, expanding PowerWash Simulator’s in-game universe with two free new Bonus Jobs.

name: Pokémon Rising Ruby
summary: Rising Ruby and Sinking Sapphire are modifications of Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire that allow you to play through the main game with all 721 Pokémon obtainable and go through the challenge of a significantly stronger Pokémon League. A huge emphasis has been placed on Pokémon availability, with most areas in the game offering 10 or 11 species that haven't been seen before that point. The mostly equal chance of encountering any of the Pokémon in an area also mean you're unlikely to get the same thing twice on the first encounter, making the game lend itself well to Nuzlocke runs (if you can handle the extra challenge from the trainer battles!).

name: Pong Consoles Simulation
summary:
These are simulations of some of the most popular Pong consoles from the 1970s. The consoles included are:
Atari Home Pong (C-100)
Atari Super Pong (C-140)
Coleco Telstar
Nintendo Color TV-Game 6
Nintendo Color TV-Game 15

name: Ponytone
summary: Ponytone is a browser karaoke game based on the My Little Pony series. The game uses the song list and note data from the game My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic.

name: Poodle Clicker
summary: Free to Play Poodle Clicker is a game full of stylish Poodles and original Music, mostly melodic metal songs, but there are more!

name: Pokémon Corogarena
summary: Pokémon Corogarena is a Japanese exclusive arcade game medal game by Sega.

name: Poetry Pigeon
summary: Fly frantically between fast-approaching obstacles by typing classic poems! Put your skills of both typing and timing to the test in this new spin on an old favorite! Prefer to fly casual? Try relaxed mode instead and take in the beauty of balladry!

name: Poo Pusher
summary: Play the retro console classic as reviewed in "George's Gaming Grimoire". Experience the arcade thrills of shoving other people's dung around on conveyor belts, repeatedly. Quick reactions are a must to avoid a nasty mess! Will you uncover the enriching secrets of bum-based alchemy?

name: Poker Tower Defense
summary: This is a tower defense game played with playing cards, where defensive cards are used to eliminate attacking cards and receive score rewards.

name: Potato
summary: Potato is a clicker game. There are dozens of different kinds of potatoes that you will get every time you click on the potato! You can expand your collection by collecting these potatoes. You can also trade them with your friends or other players in the community.

name: Police Atv Offroad
summary: Welcome back, Lieutenant. Today marks a new chapter in your career as a police officer.

name: PolyDrift
summary: Free demo available with 4 first levels Prepare to immerse yourself in the neon-soaked world of drift racing mastery. Customize your ride, perfect your technique, and chase the ultimate thrill of the drift. The leaderboard awaits - will you rise to the challenge and claim your place among the elite?

name: Poketale
summary: It's been 70 years since Frisk freed the monsters from Underground. However, the monsters are no longer the same: after an event in which a light illuminated all of Ebottia, all the weak monsters were transformed into Pokémon, causing society to have to adapt to the new creatures without intelligence and with powers beyond their control. all understanding. Can you discover the secret of transforming monsters into Pokémon and become the new Champion of Ebottia?

name: Pozionista
summary: Travel through a world surrounded by nature, collect plants and use them to create potions, invent new recipes, sell potions in stores and explore the world.

name: Pole Position
summary: A port of the arcade game to the Atari 2600 that reduces the graphical fidelity and removes the speech, fitting the game into only 8 Kilobytes.

name: Portal Brawlers
summary: Portal Brawlers is a Beat-em-Up set in a vibrant fantasy world. Follow Thunk and friends as they wreak havoc across the land, trying to stop whatever malevolent force is summoning trouble through these portals!

name: Poker Dungeon: Joker's Madness
summary: A combination game between turn-based deck-building and poker rogue-like. Strengthen your stats by combining character cards with poker hands.

name: Ports of Call Deluxe 3D 2024
summary: Ports of Call Deluxe 2024 in 3D Version of the The classic trade- and shippingsimulation. Create your own Shiptrading company and also lern how to navigate. Multiple Players and stereo. created by Rolf-Dieter Klein and Martin Ulrich starting with the classic Amiga Version.

name: Poison is Served!
summary: "Poison is Served!" is a food taster simulator with mix of cozy management puzzle and narrative-driven roguelike in world where almost all food is poisoned. Taste delicious antic meals, analyze you health and try to survive.

name: Polylylyrhythm
summary: Rhythm game to push polyrhythms. Can you play multiple rhythms like 2 beats, 3 beats and 5 beats?

name: Powerplay
summary: Powerplay is an RTS with a focus on resources and industry. Create supply chains, transport, and explore in this thrilling base builder. Grow into a powerful industrial nation, but don't spread too thin! Resources are finite and "the others" can reclaim what is theirs at any time.

name: Pocket Robots
summary: Program your robot in real-time to fight in a nervous 2D fighting game !

name: Pollen
summary: Immerse yourself in a thrilling maze escape game where your sense is limited, and danger lurks around every corner. Can you outsmart everyone and find your way out?

name: Pokémon Online
summary: Pokémon Online was an online Pokémon fangame. The game was an online Pokémon battle simulator which let players to simulator battles across the internet and play online with other players.

name: Porklike: Wurst Comes to Worst Gameboy
PowerWash Simulator: Cruise Ship Sun Deck - Summer 2024
summary: Cool off with sudsy, high-pressured water this summer in PowerWash Simulator’s latest Seasonal Special. Take a vacation from Muckingham’s mainland to clean up the sun deck of Crab Bay’s cruise liner following a messy departure.

name: Police, Open The Door!
summary: Congratulations! You have just been hired by the Benoga Police Department. Investigate the horrible events happening in the city, learn its secrets and stay on the job as long as possible until you are eaten by another monster or something even worse happens....

name: Pokémon Keishou
summary: Kyujitsu Island is in peril. As the aging Lord's power fades, the island descends into chaos. You, a chosen descendant, must embark on a perilous journey to become the new leader, the Keishou-sha. Battle rival clans, conquer the elements, and uncover ancient secrets to restore peace to this once-idyllic land. A shadow clan lurks in the shadows, seeking to exploit the island's turmoil. Can you overcome them and become the island's savior?

name: PowerWash Simulator: Muckingham Files - Part 4
summary: Cool off with sudsy, high-pressured water this summer in PowerWash Simulator's latest Seasonal Special. Take a vacation from Muckingham's mainland to clean up the sun deck of Crab Bay's cruise liner following a messy departure.

name: Popcorn!
summary: A satisfying clicker where you pop and eat popcorn, discovering secrets along the way! Compete for high scores in time trial mode, or just pop and chill in classic mode.

name: Polyphony
summary: A hybrid Standard/Kaizo Super Mario World ROMhack.

name: Population Quiz
summary: Welcome to Population Quiz, the ultimate test of your global knowledge! Do you have what it takes to guess which country or region has a larger population? Put your skills to the test in this fun and educational game that will challenge your understanding of the world's demographics.

name: Pokémon Pisces Version
summary:
A completely new sequel to Pokemon Emerald with 200+ new Pokemon. We hope you enjoy all of the new footage and look forwards to the romhack releasing by the end of the year.

As featured in F3 2024!

name: Pokémon Anniversary Crystal
summary:
Pokemon Anniversary Crystal is an extensive ROM hack created for the second anniversary of the Twitch Plays Pokemon stream.

It contains a new storyline combining parts of Pokemon Red and Pokemon Crystal, with some new elements. The post-game Kanto portion of the original Crystal has been greatly expanded with new quests. The player is able to catch all 251 Pokemon as well.

The gameplay has also been revamped with elements from later games as well. Physical/Special damage split (with new moves from newer games), Fairy Type, Move Re-Learner, EXP for catching have been included. Original game bugs have been fixed, such as with specialty Poke balls.

Of note is that the game optionally includes an “Advanced AI” hack. However, this will require a special emulator setup to install, as it allows an external script to analyze the player and enemy data to pick smarter moves for the AI. As RHDN does not permit emulator-specific hacks, that variation of the patch will need to be download at the authors’ site, / . The standard version of the hack, which uses the original AI, can be applied and run in any emulator.

name: Pokémon Royal
summary: Return to the Galar region in an adventure that rewrites the story of Pokémon Sword and Shield, with new events that enhance it and new faces to meet. Enjoy a beautiful pixel art style, along with all the quality-of-life improvements from the newer generations and every Pokémon available to date.

name: Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire Special Demo Version
summary:
A special demo released originally only via codes previous the release of Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.
It was the only way to obtain some special items in the full game such as megaevolution stones.

The demo had an original story that differs from the full games' one.

name: Pokémon Sun and Moon Special Demo Version
summary:
A special demo released before the official launch of Pokémon Sun and Moon.
It was settled in Hau'oli city and was the only way to obtain some special items and Pokémon, such as a Greninja capable of changing into Ash Greninja.

name: Portal: Google Translate Edition
summary: This mod seeks to take the text, dialogue, and developer commentary of Portal, put it through varying amounts of languages in Google Translate, then put it back into English.

name: Portal 2: Google Translate Edition
summary: As with previous works from BinkusTheTrinkus such as Half-Life: Google Translate Edition and Portal: Google Translate Edition, Portal 2: GTE aims to take all of the dialogue, text, and developer commentary of Portal 2, put it through several different languages in Google Translate, then put back into English. This fills the base game with a bunch of garbled nonsense that makes it nearly unrecognizable.

name: PokerBall
summary: An all new block-based puzzle game, using Poker rules!

name: Portal: A Computer Novel
summary: Home, a biological computer. The final link to the past and the only conduit to the future. But Homer is dying and access grows weaker moment by moment. Will you discover where everyone has one or will the doorway to humanity close forever, leaving you totally alone?

name: Potato
summary: Potato is a clicker Game, in which you click a Potato !

name: Poop
summary: Poop is a funny clicker game. Earn new poops by playing this game and display them on your profile to become the POOPKING!. You can get unique new POOPs by clicking on the POOPs. Get a random POOP every 3 and 12 hours and grow unique POOPs.

name: Pop'n Music: Mickey Tunes
summary: pop'n music MICKEY TUNES is a pop'n music spin-off containing exclusively Disney related music, much like DanceDanceRevolution and its spin-offs. It was later directly ported to consoles as pop'n music Disney Tunes

name: Pop'n Stage EX
summary: pop'n stage ex is an upgraded version of pop'n stage, which includes two new songs, several pop'n music 3 songs, and a brand-new MANIAC difficulty. MANIAC is available for both 6 and 10 Switches mode. However, unlike the other difficulties, 10-Switches MANIAC charts are intended for one player instead of two. In MANIAC, most characters' palettes are changed to their 3P colors. The few exceptions are White day dream and full moon, which switch their characters' palettes to their 4P colors, and A LOVE WE NEVER KNEW which changes its character to Nyami [pns-3P]. BEGINNER and NORMAL MODEs were renamed to NORMAL and ANOTHER MODEs.

name: Poop
summary: Poop is an idle-clicker game where you click poop to get more poop

name: Poppy Playtime Triple Pack
summary: ﻿THREE GAMES IN 1 PACK! Embark on an epic journey filled with mystery, puzzles, eerie environments and the most terrifying toy characters to ever come to life. Over a decade ago, all the employees of Playtime Co. mysteriously vanished, except for you. You must return and discover what really happened at the now abandoned factory of the most popular toy company in history. But beware the toys are now alive, and they may not be as friendly as they seem. Take your first steps into Playtime Co. with the first 3 chapters in the Poppy Playtime saga! Chapter 1: A Tight Squeeze - Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility...and don't get caught. Chapter 2: Fly in a Web - Descend deeper into the toy factory where mind-numbing puzzles and horrific toys await. Grapple and swing your way to safety. Try to escape - and don't let Mommy find you. Chapter 3: Deep Sleep - A decrepit orphanage known as Playcare sits beneath the once magical toy factory. You must make your way through this frightening place, solving new puzzles and avoiding the nightmares that lurk within the dark. Answers lie between the puzzles, characters and clues you encounter...If you can survive.

name: Pokémon Emerald Seaglass
summary:
Pokemon Emerald Seaglass is a romhack of Pokemon Emerald with many alterations.

Notable features include:

- Complete visual overhaul of all game graphics to fit a cozy, GBC-like aesthetic

- All Pokémon from Generations 1-3 are obtainable, along with cross-generation evolutions (ex: Roserade, Mamoswine, Farigiraf)

- Tweaks to many traditionally “bad” Pokémon to make them more interesting and usable (ex: Ghost/Flying Noctowl, Grass/Dragon Sceptile, Water/Fire Octillery)

- Updated battle engine to most recent games (Physical/Special split, Fairy type, etc.)

- New minigames and events to bring life to Hoenn, such as a Scuba Diving competition in Pacifidlog Town and Pinball games used to unlock rare items and Alolan Eggs!

- Follower Pokemon

- The Rustboro City Wishing Well, using Wishing Star items as a currency in a gacha-like system to get random Pokémon! Great for shaking up repeat playthroughs

- Cheat codes accessible in-game via the Player’s GameCube

- Hard Mode (disabled by default), Soft Level Cap toggle (enabled by default), and more settings accessible by interacting with book on Player’s desk

name: Pokemon RE:Call
summary: After becoming a Pokémon Trainer, you come back to Knot Island to reconnect with an old friend, Bill. As the good friend you are, you decide to help Bill with his mission, encountering many problems with the evil Team Rocket. Their boss, Giovanni, has hidden agendas with Pokémon, especially the unique Paradox Pokémon, which have energy from the past and future.

name: Pokemon Tactics
summary:
From a region where Pokémon are feared, you accompany Professor Ceibo, a researcher isolated from society. To the region of Xicadia, a place where humans and Pokémon live in peace, fighting hand in hand... and with each other.
The objective: To investigate on an evolutionary method, which manifests itself with the bonds of humans and Pokémon, an evolutionary method for humans.
For that Professor Ceibo together with 3.... well 4 mercenaries to help you. Brigham, a bard with a face of few friends accompanied by his Chimchar, Lily's older brother. Lily, a girl who supports her cowardly Chikorita from a distance. Murchadh, a berserker with a good heart but who doesn't talk much about his past, accompanied by a friendly Mudkip. Finally Valentina, a thunder mage accompanied by a rather lazy Shinx.

name: Pokémon Consonancia
summary: Pokémon Consonance, inspired by Pokémon Masters, is a game in which you will travel to Passio as a novice trainer, there you will meet different characters from all the official releases together, from Kanto to Paldea, as well as characters brought by the Masters, such as Professor Margarita, You will participate in the WPM, a high level tournament that seeks to determine the strongest trainer of all, to achieve this task, you must improve as a trainer, but also, you must recruit different characters for your team, some of them will do it by history but many of them will depend on a RNG factor: The gachapon mode. It won't be easy to be the best, so testing strategies and team combinations will be fundamental!

name: Pokémon Abismal
summary:
A thousand years ago, a meteorite hit the Kingdom of Celestia. From its interior, an evil being emerged that tried to plunge the world into darkness, but after a bloody war, that being was banished to another dimension... Until now, because it is said that the seal that held him captive has been destroyed.

Live a unique adventure to unravel the mysteries surrounding the Kingdom of Celestia. A radical climate change, the appearance of the mysterious Astral Pokémon and the existence of a sect that worships the Dark Star are just some of the many threats to the peace of the kingdom.

Will you be able to save Celestia from its end or will you be a mere witness to its destruction?

name: Pokémon Sombras de Arceus
summary:
Pokémon Shadows of Arceus is a deconstruction of the traditional Pokémon story, giving it a more strategic touch and offering a real challenge for Pokémon lovers.

The story focuses on exploration, getting all the necessary resources to continue the adventure and is open, you can do it in the order you want.

There will be training facilities to be able to create different combat strategies.

Create your ultimate multicolored team thanks to the random shiny wells!

The story originates in the region of Heria, where a group of scientists manage to develop a whole industry around Pokémon battles.
Their mission is to train Pokémon for competition and sell them to trainers to gain popularity in battles and funding for their projects.
They use the same cloning method they used with Mewtwo. Thanks to him, they started to awaken and capture legendaries to make Pokémon battling a much bigger spectacle.
But something terrible happened when they awakened Arceus and the world as we know it was almost destroyed to ashes.

The story is set 10 years after this event and shows us a post-apocalyptic world, plagued by very strong wild Pokémon and evildoers lurking around every corner.
After suffering an attack, our protagonist receives his first Pokémon and once he overcomes the first challenge of getting his first medal, the destiny that has been waiting for him for so long, finally appears.

name: Pokémon Berilo
summary:
In your region, there's no training for Pokémon trainers, and thanks to Professor Rosa, an acquaintance of your parents, you get a ticket to Nubia. There you get your first Pokémon and can challenge the eight Leaders of the region to challenge the Champion. In your path will cross a completely untraditional Villain Team, what will they want? What will be their role in your adventure? They are up to something and you can be sure it won't be good.

Traversing Nubia will be no easy task, full of story elements, quests, ruins, hidden treasures and colorful NPCs that will help you in your adventure (or not). If you are a person who enjoys exploring everything and looking for the hidden secrets of the game, you will find that the game is not easy.

name: Pokémon Pro
summary:
Developed with Pokémon PSDK for RPG Maker XP, you will enter a new region called Zealon. With your pokémon team and your friends, you will face challenges in which your skills as a trainer will be tested. Get ready for an adventure where the darkness can catch you. But remember: Stars only shine when the sky is dark.

In the past, the Zealon region was inhabited by humans. The pokémon were predominant throughout the region, until one day it was discovered by humans. This caused a great conflict in being conquered by the great powers of that time, causing great wars for the territories of the region.

Not all humans had the same greed to obtain the territory of others. One trainer wanted harmony in the region.
This same trainer created an alliance of a few trainers to help end the wars that the region was suffering, after seeing that the great powers did not want to reach a pact. But even so, the alliance was not enough to stop the wars.

Pharaoh, legendary Pokémon and considered sovereign of life. He had been observing the wars caused by greed for decades. He came to the conclusion that these wars were caused by the conflicts of the humans themselves.
The balance of life among the pokémon was breaking down and Pharaoh ordered Kenaice and Spiwolf, pokémon guardians of the balance between life and death, to stop these wars.

Kenaice and Spiwolf appeared in the battle. Thanks to their power they were able to put an end to the wars, and helped those trainers and pokémon who wanted harmony by giving them some of their energy to recover.

That trainer and his companions, managed that several cultures lived in harmony for many years and thanks to those legendary pokémon the balance between life and death was restored.

Nowadays, during your adventure in exploring the region and overcoming the challenges that await you, you will be involved in the chaotic history that can happen again in the Zealon region.

name: Pokémon Panteón
summary: In an ancient region called Olympia, our protagonist embarks on an incredible odyssey proposed by the philosopher professor Palmiro. Defeat the leaders of the different Agoras of the region and solve their mysteries. Confront the students of the Platena Academy and meet your eternal rivals, Lira and Aulus.

name: Pokémon Z
summary: Discover what happened in the Kalos region 300 years ago.

name: Pokémon Conquerors
summary: The Ransei Region is divided into kingdoms for each elemental type, and these are at constant war. Nobunaga the Warlord of the dragon kingdom of the North has the ambition to conquer all Ransei to destroy it, and you, the protagonist Warlord of Aurora must find a way to stop him by forming your army.

name: Pokémon Hero
summary:
Original Story: Forget about gym leaders and embark on a whole new adventure.
Unique cast: Meet colorful characters with varied personalities and ideals.
Heroism: Each character will see you as a hero or villain in their story depending on your actions.
Pokémon of all generations available.
Challenge to your measure: 3 levels of difficulty and the enemies adapt to the level of your Pokémon.
Bosses both obligatory and optional.
Scripted Battles: Adding strategy and narrative to the encounters.
Hidden Zones: Discover Zorua's illusions, revealing treasures and mysteries.
Missions and Achievements.
Extensive and detailed map that you will be able to travel with Ultraflight.
Battle interface that allows you to see all the information in combat.
Challenges and Riddles that will test your strength and intelligence.
Many more mechanics such as Pokémon following you, see the Pokémon available on each route, Mugshots, etc..

name: Pokémon Evol
summary: Choose your partner and begin your Pokémon adventure in the Dalaris region. Crime has increased and someone close to you has been splashed. Does this mean that an old Team Villain is about to return?

name: Pokémon Existence
summary:
Original Pokémon (only a few families) ranging from Gen 1 to Gen 9. (For now, there is access to 40 families within the fangame).
In total, the game features over 200 Pokémon species, most of them being original to the game, native species.
It features the Mega Evolution mechanics, although the concept has been readapted and is based on the “Divinization” of the species, which are orbs that react to the Vital Particle.
Creation of many new moves with very diverse effects, in addition to a large number of moves per tutor, which gives more variety of attacks to the game.
Within the Gyms, there will be 1 employee who will be able to teach useful moves to the protagonist, beyond those already found as normal with the passage of the adventure.
It does not have mechanics such as Dynamax or Z-Moves, since it does not make much sense for the development of our story. However, apart from the forms by Divinization, there are also several form changes between species, fusions and use of armor (without the need for a final evolutionary phase).
There are several regional forms of existing Pokémon (examples would be Slugma and Sableye).
Improved the probability of finding shiny Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Kanto Origins
summary: Explore a much darker Kanto, face new tougher challenges, and become the conqueror of the region.

name: Powered Platformer Bundle
summary: ~ Bob the Elementalist + NeonPowerUp! + TP Bullet ~

name: PowerWash Simulator: Shrek Special Pack
summary:
Playtime is ogre. Get to work cleaning up five fairy tale maps inspired by DreamWorks Animation’s Shrek. It’ll take more than pixie dust to restore these iconic locales to their former lustre, but thankfully, happily ever after is in your hands!

Like onions, dirt has layers. And boy, this particular brew of filth is potent enough to rival even the Fairy Godmother’s strongest concoctions. A sprinkle of soap, a touch of elbow grease and a large dose of ‘DING’s make for the perfect antidote potion! Wash it all down with a swish of high-pressure water and you’ll have these enchanting locations looking as spotless as the Magic Mirror.

name: Power Star Unleashed
summary: Unleash unrelenting force, wield the might of destruction, obliterate countless Toads, leave Luigi in ruins, and seize control of the Power Stars.

name: Possible One: Lunar Industries
summary: Possible One is the ultimate colony management game set in space, and the only space-related RTS game based on proven or very feasible technologies, avoiding sci-fi.

name: Pompeii: The Legacy
summary: Rebuild the city of Pompeii and climb the social ladder. Roman society is full of intrigues that you have to solve in order to become a powerful ruler.

name: Pokemon Definitive Platinum
summary: Pokemon Definitive Platinum is a definitive version hack of Pokemon Platinum, adding quality of life features from later generations, as well as new story elements, greater wild encounter variety, and much more.

name: Pool Together Bundle
summary: Leave it all behind, kick back, and chill in Pool Together Bundle!

name: Portal to the Cosmobeat
summary: On his mission, to become the very best dancer ever, Gorb challenges incredible dance coaches all around the galaxy. Unfortunately, he is terrible. Can you dance him to the top?

name: Potatostrike
summary: A space shmup featuring the ultimate potato-based space fighter.

name: PolyFight
summary: Duel your adversary and prove your skills to be superior.

name: Pokémon Aragonite
summary:
Pokémon Aragonite is a fanmade project based on the real life island of Sicily, in the South of Italy.
Started by FrankieChatot and Darkonius Mavakar;
This project aim to reimagine Sicily into the Pokémon world by creating the Sylia region, where you will be able to explore many areas and cities based off actual places!
Initially this started as a fakemon dex where we had fun interpreting our culture, flora and fauna into Fakemon, but then we decided to use Pokémon Essentials to turn it into a playable game!

name: Pomeraider
summary: Pomeraider's an arcade game heavily inspired by the classic Mario Bros!

name: Pocket Pusher: The Citadel
summary: "The Citadel" a level made to improve the core mechanics of Pocket Pusher, includes new collectibles.

name: Pollution
summary: This game is a pixelated adventure set in a vast, open world where players pilot a plane using the ASDW keys for movement and the left mouse button to attack.

name: Pokémon Go: Max Out
summary: The 16th implementation of seasons intersected with the Autumn season in Northern Hemisphere and Spring season in the Southern Hemisphere. This season's theme is focused around the Dynamax feature and the Pokémon of Galar.

name: Potion Stand Story
summary: Potion Stand Story is a short visual novel/shop simulator, created for the NaNoRenO game jam in 2024.

name: Pocket Estimation
summary:
Estimation, the most challenging card game is one click away from you!

Not in the mood for a night out? but could use a nice, calm game of estimation? Until today this wouldn't have been possible on an Android device, but now we've got just the thing for you!

name: Pocket Tarneeb
summary: Not in the mood for a night out? but could use a nice, calm game of tarneeb? now we've got just the thing for you!

name: Pocket Arcade: Sudoku for Kids
summary: An LCD Sudoku game released in 2006.

name: Pocket Arcade: Sudoku Electronic
