summary: Pocket Arcade: Sudoku Electronic is an LCD Sudoku game released in 2006 by Westminster.

name: PokéFarm Q
summary: Collect Eggs, hatch them and care for the Pokémon that emerge in this free-to-play online fan-game!

name: Pokémon Scorched Silver
summary: Pokémon Scorched Silver is a fan-made ROM hack of Pokémon Emerald, developed by Sloo, that transports players back to the Johto region two decades after the events of Pokémon Gold and Silver. In this sequel, you assume the role of a young trainer from Cherrygrove City, embarking on a quest to become a Pokémon Master. The narrative introduces a new antagonist group, Team Phoenix, whose nefarious plans involve capturing the mythical Pokémon Celebi. Throughout your journey, you'll encounter both familiar faces and new characters, uncovering hidden secrets of Johto and experiencing a fresh storyline that expands upon the original lore.

name: Pocket Souls
summary: New weapons, armour, items, boss battles, trainer battles and mechanics. Capture creatures from the world of DS3 and use them to vanquish your foes.

name: Poly Plaza: Farmer Pack
summary: Unlock 3 new vehicles and 6 new clothes for Poly Plaza with this awesome Farmer Pack!

name: Pod Jam
summary:
Pod Jam is a retro-inspired puzzle game where you guide alien pods to safe landings through strategic planning. Each level presents unique challenges with arrows that interact differently with the environment, requiring careful sequencing to prevent pods from getting stuck.

Offering 100 increasingly challenging levels, Pod Jam offers a blend of challenge and satisfaction. The ambient sci-fi soundtrack and minimalist retro visuals create an immersive experience. Easy to learn but hard to master, the game is a perfect title for logic puzzle and brain-teaser lovers.

name: Pour Cappuccino 1000
summary:
Solve the puzzle and make a cappuccino.
A puzzle game where you rotate pipes to connect them.

name: Portraits of Doom
summary: Portraits of Doom is a 20 map set for Doom I and Doom II. The first episode takes place in Doom I, followed by a special New Game Plus in Doom II. This NG+ features Doom II weapons and monsters. It also reimagines the first episode, complete with different progression at times. For instance: things that exploded in the first episode now lie in ruin in NG+. All combined into one single Doom II wad file for your convenience.

name: Pork Barrel
summary: Pork Barrel is a political text simulation game where the player takes the role of a member of congress in the House of Representatives. The aim is to get re-elected and thereby be able to continue with the game. Most of the game involves voting on different bills. After showing information on the district's voters and the current unemployment rate, the game starts out with budget hearings where the player votes on how much money each department should receive. For each department there are two amounts to choose between.

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 4 - Safe Haven
summary:
Brace yourself for the darkest chapter yet in the epic Poppy Playtime saga.

You are pushed deeper into the undiscovered depths of the Playtime Co. factory, far below anything the world knew. Here, you’ll encounter terrifying new threats and discover shocking revelations. Can you outwit the unnatural new creations lurking in the shadows? Can you survive here long enough to eventually unravel the mysteries behind the experiments? Every step will test your courage, every puzzle will challenge your mind, and every corner may be your last.

Will you escape the horrors hidden within Playtime Co., or will you succumb to the terror? Survival isn’t guaranteed. Fear is.

name: Portrait of a Torn
summary: As a young soldier returning to an eerily deserted home, you'll explore enigmatic rooms, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover a haunting, tragic story.

name: Porgy
summary: Strange happenings near the coast! Dive deep and get to the bottom of what's fishy in the sea.

name: Post Memory
summary: You are a postman in a remote town. Slowly uncover the secrets that lies underneath the surface... or don't. The choice is in your hands.

name: Pokémon Gratia
summary: As a child of Snowcrown Village you have been selected as the "bearer" for the annual Gratia Ceremony. It is your job to travel around Mosco Island defeating the guardians and earning their respective orbs, so that you can complete the ceremony. However, not everything is quite as straightforward as it seems... This year might be a bit different...

name: Poly Fire
summary: Poly Fire is a tactical multiplayer team 1st person shooter. Using a variety of weapons and characters, you will battle with up to 32 players on Various maps . By managing your skills correctly, you will lead your team to victory.

name: Portrait of a Cornish Woman
summary: Portrait of a Cornish Woman is a Victorian Romance Visual Novel of Manners, capturing the subtle, yet powerful emotions of two women as they fight for their place in each other's lives while living under a veil of discretion.

name: Poco's Maze Adventure
summary: Poco wants to go out and play, but the world just keeps getting in her way! Help Poco navigate the mazes while keeping an eye out for tasty fish snacks.

name: Pocket Necromancer
summary: Assemble a diverse army of minions, each with unique abilities and personalities. From spell-casting mages to sturdy skeletal knights, select your squad and lead them into battle against encroaching forces.​

name: Pomo Post
summary: Pomo Post is a delivery-themed Pomodoro timer!  Pick a destination and set your Playdate to the side, it will let you know when it's time for a break.

name: PopSlinger vol. 2: Loveless
summary: Return to the PopSlinger universe in this coffee-fueled sequel! Join an elite agent and a digital idol on a mission to rescue a lost heroine in a world full of vibrant chaos. Face new enemies, uncover the mysteries of the Purple District, and groove to a freshly brewed beat!

name: Pokémon: Legends of Sinnoh
summary: Pokémon: Legends of Sinnoh is an open world Pokémon Master Trainer board game made within Tabletop Simulator. The game is inspired by the Pokémon Master Trainer board games and Pokémon Legends: Arceus.

name: Pogger's Legends
summary: Pogger's Legends is a turn based 'card' game where you recruit heroes to defeat villains. The battle system is made from the ground up using elements that affect eachother, per-unit stats and unique abilities that can be battle decisive. There are an infinite amount of per-save generated stages and near infinite possible units. Save the day in Pogger's Legends now!

name: Postcodeloterij Deal or No Deal: Het Interactive DVD-Spel
summary: Postcodeloterij Deal or No Deal: Het Interactive DVD-Spel is a DVD game based on the Netherlands version of Deal or No Deal.

name: Port Town: Survival
summary: A deserted port town, missing people, and a dark secret waiting to be uncovered… Dive into Port Town’s open world, collect mysterious photos, and reveal the truth. But be careful… some secrets are meant to stay buried.

name: Pop It!
summary:
Pop It! is an arcade game that consists of exploding the entire batch of vertical balloons with a single shot.

As you explode them, more will appear and it will become increasingly difficult for you to be at the top of the leaderboard!

name: Popit Sanic Goo!
summary: An awesome and colorful Match 3 adventure with lot of characters and powerups, make them pop and unlock new areas and levels, some are relaxing and others are challenging. Ame roes, taels, big da cat , shedew and more are here!

name: Portal Protectors
summary: Take the journey of the Portal Protector as you defend the portals to the divine realm from evil. Use strategy and skill to aid you in your defense against evil using magic, sword skills, and defensive towers. For you are the Portal Protector!

name: Poker Train
summary: Poker Train is a video poker game where you must play scoring hands to keep the wheels turning. Use your best combinations to build steam and run the train as far as you can. Complete quests and find all the secrets the railroad has to offer!

name: Pokémon Lost Silver
summary: Pokémon Lost Silver is a Pokémon fan game based on the creepypasta of the same name created by reidd. The game is a recreation of the haunted game from the original creepypasta story.

name: Pokerrrr 2
summary: Real poker with real gestures! Play all poker variants with players worldwide!

name: Pokémon Covenant
summary: A life of poor decisions has led you to this moment, the moment where you commit your greatest transgression. In the final moment, you are saved by a mysterious figure and given a chance at redemption. Can you, with your memories wiped and true goal unclear, fulfil the terms of your unbreakable covenant and be born anew? You must traverse the ethereal land of Varia and overcome the seven Vices that represent the aspects of your shattered heart, endeavoring to collect the mementoes along the way that will allow you to piece together your forgotten past.​

name: Power Drill Massacre
summary: Power Drill Massacre Arcade is a short adventure horror game developed by Puppet Combo. It is an 8-bit arcade version of Power Drill Massacre.

name: Pogo Knight
summary: Bounce your way to the top and claim victory... How hard could it be?

name: PowerWash Simulator: Halloween Seasonal 2024
summary: Something filthy this way comes in PowerWash Simulator’s latest Seasonal Special. You’ll have to hose off more than a few cobwebs to take the Halloween House from mortifyingly mucky to party-ready perfection.

name: Portrait of a Ghost
summary: A "spirit photographer" learns that ghosts are far more real than he thought.

name: Power Soccer
summary: Power Soccer, also known as Power Challenge and PS, was a massively multiplayer online browser-based sports game, developed by the Swedish developer Power Challenge, the same company that develops ManagerZone (but PS focuses in the sports gameplay instead of management simulation). This game was a browser-based soccer simulator in which users could create a team and play against other users from all around the globe. Additional benefits were offered to those that purchased the Club Membership.

name: Pour Quelques Bonbons...
summary:
Play as a little child in the mysterious village of Enserine.
Collect as many candies as you can and fill your candy book before the other children and win the race !

name: Pope-ye
summary: Bootleg port of the classic Nintendo game

name: Pocket Mystery EP DX
summary: A surreal, short-form puzzle adventure / horror game built for the GameBoy, POCKET MYSTERY EP DX updates the original POCKET MYSTERY EP with full color graphics, re-designed puzzles, updated music and sound effects, and additional content.

name: Pocket Mystery EP
summary:
Explore a strange hotel and try to uncover the truth behind a mysterious murder as Detective Walker Rylance.

Talk to the hotel staff and guests while reliving the final moments of the victim(s) in this surreal horror adventure game. Oh, there are block puzzles too.

name: Pocket Legend
summary: In Pocket Legend, a roguelike deck-builder, you control a hero transported to a world of legendary weapons. Strategically arrange items in your inventory to defeat enemies with unique attack patterns. Customize your setup, unlock powerful cards, and uncover the fate of the dark forces.

name: Portal: Alive & Kicking
summary: Portal: Alive & Kicking is a full remake and re-imagining of Valve's award-winning title, Portal.

name: Portal: Ambition
summary: Portal: Ambition is a semi-story-driven campaign that offers hours of gameplay through puzzles and out-of-bounds tasks. Complete requests by an unknown scientist from a different section of the facility, help retrieve important information and data.

name: Portal: System Failure
summary: Portal: System Failure is a community made standalone modification for Portal 2 built on the Source Engine, set within the Portal universe.

name: Portal: Lost in Aperture
summary: This is a mod for Portal 1. Includes new maps, storyline, a whole new Portal experience. This game take place in an Aperture laboratory in Eastern-Europe.

name: Portal: Singularity Collapse
summary: Explore a new wing of Aperture Science focused on the creation of Portal Guns. Play as a scientist working at this research centre, and traverse it's remains after an unforeseen accident sends you forward in time. Go through never before seen areas with new technology in order to return.

name: Portile
summary: A 2d, tile-based take on narbacular drop

name: Powdergray
summary:
Suffering from a severe heart condition, Satomi Kubodaira's life is prolonged
by a combination of medical progress and miracles...
But he receives the news that he will die by the age of 24.

He starts living with childhood friend Fumiyo Nukui to spend the days left to him...
But one day he becomes lost in an unfamiliar part of town.
In the midst of his helplessness, he witnesses a murder.

Cornered by the lust murderer Some Fujiwara,
Satomi is suddenly on the receiving end of a confession of love...

name: Pokémon Emerald Legacy
summary:
Emerald Legacy is a Pokémon Rom Hack made by TheSmithPlays based on the Pokémon Emerald Disassembly with the purpose fixing and improving the Pokémon Emerald experience while retaining the iconic feel of the original game.

Emerald Legacy is the third and final of three rom hacks that are part of the Legacy Project. The Legacy Project aims to take what is good in a game and improve on it while bringing its flaws up to that same level.

name: Pokémon Go: Dual Destiny
summary: The 17th implementation of seasons intersected with the Winter season in Northern Hemisphere and Summer season in the Southern Hemisphere. This season's theme is focused around the theme of duality and the Pokémon GO Tour: Unova.

name: Portland 2024
summary: FPS inspired by LSD Dream Simulator and Cruelty Squad. Fight your way through each level and explore till you find doorways with moving smiley faces.

name: Polarity Warthog
summary: A sci-fi noir themed horizontal shooter. Somewhere deep in space, battle the dark energy alien forces, while collecting light energy to level up your weapons.

name: PockeDate!
summary: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

name: P.O.S.S.U.M.
summary: Explore the city rooftops and a haunted hotel lobby to find artifacts from the past. Made for the Haunted PS1 2021 Madvent calendar.

name: Pokémon Berserk Version
summary:
The Awakening Phenomenon is a phenomenon we have recently discovered by using the power of the Berserk Gene found from different types of species of Pokémon.

It temporarily increases your stats in battle, although the phenomenon still has a couple of quirks so you may not want to use it all the time, or else your Pokémon may have some... Unfortunate side-effects.

name: Portal done Half-Life Source
summary: Portal done Half-Life Source is a mod in which you are required to play through Portal 1's maps with the weaponry, movement and glitches featured in Half-Life Source.

name: Pool Fever
summary: The classic pool experience, right at home!

name: Pokémon Battle Online
summary: Pokemon Battle Online is an online Pokemon world. Complete with overworld, battles, player vs player and more!

name: Pokémon Amethyst
summary: Standard Pokemon fare, more or less; as an aspiring Pokemon Trainer, beat the League and take down a villainous Team while you're at it.

name: Posshexor
summary:
For a century humanity has fought a bloody war against the evil forces of the Necronomicon Ex Mortis, the Book of the Dead, but now, miraculously, it has been captured and finally the war won...

...Until you read one of its pages and it all went back to hell. Nice one.
Now hexed with powers of possession, you must re-vanquish your path into the begotten depths of hell, cursing your soul with every step taken to once and for all, catch and destroy the Necronomicon Ex Mortis!

name: Pokémon: Lost and Found
summary: A brand new Pokémon fangame to break the mould on conventions and sit somewhere in the middle of Pokémon Mystery Dungeon and Digimon World.

name: Poradora vs. Monsters of the World
summary: Poradora vs. Monsters of the World is a 2.5D action-adventure platformer where you travel across the coolest places on earth to defeat all the monsters and find all the mythological secret there! Now let's jump, shoot, slide, and defeat all the monsters! LET'S GO!

name: Poisonous Abyss
summary: It is a novel and unique math puzzle game with a fresh and elegant visual design

name: Portal Factory
summary: Portal Factory is an open-world factory-building game with exploration and dungeons. You can play alone or with friends, explore the world through procedural dungeons, and uncover mysteries!

name: Polymega Collection Vol.1: Asteroids
summary:
Embark on an intergalactic journey with ASTEROIDS, the iconic arcade game that thrusts players into the heart of a chaotic asteroid field in a frantic fight to survive.

Immerse yourself with lifelike arcade cabinets, complete with multiple zoom and rotation modes that make you feel like you're really standing in front of the machine, as well as new Atari Lynx LCD and Quadrascan Virtual Display Modes, so you can play classic arcade and handheld games that look and feel just like the originals!

Included are foundational influences like LUNAR LANDER, as well as game play evolving entries SPACE DUEL, GRAVITAR, and more to savor your cosmic journey into space.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 2: Karate Champ
summary:
Revisit the origin of one of gaming's most popular genre's with DATA EAST'S KARATE CHAMP, the first one-on-one fighting video game.

Released in 1984, Karate Champ quickly became a worldwide arcade hit, gaining the attention of a growing video games industry with its innovative dual-joystick control scheme and unique emphasis placed on precision movements and timing.

This collection of classic 2D fighting games features the pioneering KARATE CHAMP arcade game, alongside it's action packed spiritual successors FIGHTER'S HISTORY and FIGHTER'S HISTORY DYNAMITE/KARNOV'S REVENGE. This Double Disc Polymega Collection release also includes a bonus disc version of Fighter's History Dynamite compatible with Polymega as well as the original Neo CD system.

name: Pocket Hockey
summary: Pocket Hockey brings the excitement of competitive ice hockey to your mobile device. This PvP game focuses on real-time matches where players can test their skills and strive to climb the ranks. Featuring customizable teams with unique characters, the game offers fast-paced gameplay designed to deliver an engaging hockey experience anytime, anywhere.

name: Poké Floats: Melee
summary: Stage mod for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

name: Pokemon Find The Alphabets
summary: Use your mouse to interact and find all the hidden letters of the alphabet. Be careful, you have to help Pikachu and his friends before the time runs out, so have to work fast, and you have to be precise, each wrong click costs you points.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Ice Rink - Winter 2024
summary: Put all your plans on ice, this is no rinky-dink clean up. With the grand reopening of the Ice Rink just around the corner, and the place nothing short of a glacial grime-fest, you’re the power washer wielding hero Muckingham needs this holiday season.

name: Pop Star Debut
summary: An edited fan translation of the Nintendo Family Computer game Idol Hakkenden. This game seeks to re-translate the game as it may have been translated by people like Ted Woolsey did in the late 80's and early 90's, with less emphasis on accuracy and more on localization.

name: Pokey Ball
summary:
Try to poke and flick your ball as high as you can.

How high can you go?

name: Pokemon Aquamarine
summary:
Pokémon Aquamarine and its eight variants are ROM hacks of FireRed that takes place in Manta, an entirely new region based off South America. The player character mysteriously turns into a Mew, and takes on a journey as a Pokémon trainer to figure out how to turn back to human.

Each variant corresponds with a different Eevee evolution. The differences between versions are minor and mostly aesthetic, so it is recommended you go with your favorite!

These variations include:
Opal - Eevee
Aquamarine - Vaporeon
Topaz - Jolteon
Garnet - Flareon
Amethyst - Espeon
Onyx - Umbreon
Turquoise - Leafeon
Quartz - Glaceon
Zircon - Sylveon

Features:
New Region based off South America
New Subregions based off Hawaii, Galapagos, and Antarctica
Sci-Fi story with a diverging plot depending on gender
All 411 species of Pokémon are obtainable without the need to trade
Certain Pokémon from newer regions up until Paldea will appear
Custom Fakemon include a hummingbird line, a dolphin line, and a tortoise line
Updated mechanics, including the Fairy Type and the Physical/Special Split
Updated Pokémon learnsets to include a more diverse set of moves
Newer gen moves with custom animations
Expanded bag storage
Dynamically changing Pokémarts based off number of badges
Items from newer games include Bottle Caps, Nature Mints, Ability Capsules, and Choice Items
TMs have infinite uses
HMs can be forgotten
HMs and certain TMs can be used by the player character Mew as field effects
AMs (Ability Machines) can be used by the player character Mew as field effects
Key Item that provides hints for next objective, suggests level caps, and spawns unlimited rare candies
Key Items that provide services such as EV/IV checking and Move Tutoring
Color-Coded Natures
Pokédex accurately shows Pokémon locations and stats
Quality of life changes from newer games
Decapitalized most in-game text

name: PowerPoint Osu!
summary: Osu, but its made and runs inside PowerPoint.

name: Portal Balls
summary:
Roll Into Action!

Guide the blue and red balls to their respective portals in a race against time. Use your skill and strategy to ensure the blue ball reaches the blue portal and the red ball finds its way to the red portal!

name: Popotinho's Adventures
summary: Guide a mischievous kid back to his parents in a vibrant side-scrolling adventure!

name: Polysemy‌
summary: This game has won the hearts of many players with its fresh and minimalist design.

name: Pop DS
summary: Pop DS is a match 3 game with a twist, you POP (don't swap) gems to remove them. As you progress you will learn new moves and encounter lots of on grid interactive objects. Enjoy playing the game casually, or aim for a challenge worthy of a gamer and go for 100% completion!

name: Poop on Red
summary: Take the wind! Avoid the buildings! Chasing the red car! Poop! Poop!

name: Politburo Simulator
summary: Politburo Simulator is a turn-based strategy game where you take on the role of the General Secretary in a fictional Communist country. Manage your Politburo, make critical decisions, and navigate a web of political events to maintain control over the nation and defend the Revolution.

name: Post Office Simulator
summary: You are the new postal worker! Serve customers by sending and receiving packages and letters. Check the contents of boxes for prohibited items. Every decision you make has consequences. Decide whose side you're on.

name: Potion Shopkeeper Simulator
summary: Potion Shopkeeper is a cozy 3D game where you run a potion shop, craft potions, set prices, and manage customer reactions. Unlock rare ingredients, experiment with recipes, and manage your reputation to attract more customers and grow your shop!

name: PockeDate!: Pocket Dating Simulator
summary: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

name: Police vs Thief: Violent Chasing
summary: A game where the player controls a police car and has to catch the thief by running their car into the thief's car. It is not possible for the player's car to go backwards when driving. The game features no music or sound effects.

name: Polar Roller
summary: You're a snowman's head trying to get to your body. Collect snowflakes to get bigger and snowman parts (hat, nose, etc) to be more than just a pile of snow.

name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid - Adam Park
summary: This unlocks Adam Park - MMPR Black Ninja Ranger, a full character, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

name: Power Rangers: Battle For the Grid - Jen Scotts: Time Force Pink Ranger
summary: This unlocks Jen Scotts - Time Force Pink Ranger, a full character, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

name: Polywar
summary: Well, you've come to the right place, buddy! Join POLYWAR — the international multiplayer first-person shooter without auto-shooting — enter the war zone and gain your first frag! In this breathtaking 3d shooter game with modern graphics you will find all that you need for the grand battle — various maps, plenty of characters, the possibility of weapon customization, different game modes, marketplace for players and many other cool features.

name: Poppin & Jupa: Pocket Adventure
summary: An action-adventure exploration game in which you play as a pair of young adventurers: The ladybug boy Poppin, and the scarecrow girl Jupa. Using the mysterious Gadget Box, Poppin and Jupa combat baddies, get around tricky challenges, and collect treasure as a team. In this adventure, the pair are traveling up to explore the grandiose Mount Glitteroam; what friends, foes, and secrets will they find along the way? Come and find out!

name: Potion Promise
summary: In a medieval fantasy world, a young witch finds herself inheriting a massive debt from her parents. With only 30 days to repay it, she must rely on her potion-making skills and cunning to gather rare ingredients and fulfill the demands of her customers, while uncovering shocking truths behind.

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Seven Symphonies
summary: From the creator of "Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Special Episode 0" comes another ROM hack which will continue the events of both Special Episode 0 and Explorers' late postgame! This time, the plot will unfold throughout the legendary Destiny Tower, which will have a drastically different nature to the one we already knew in several PMD titles.

name: Poop Killer 8
summary: The poop killer now strikes in the middle of Christmas... smellier and deadlier. Embark on this shitty adventure and try not to end up with poop stuck in your mouth. With three meaningless endings...

name: Pokémon HGSS: Sevii Islands
summary: Pokémon HeartGold & SoulSilver: Sevii Islands is a Pokémon Fan Game created by PurpleZaffre using RPG Maker XP and Pokémon Essentials v16.2.

name: Pokemon: The Hodgepodge Platoon
summary: Hodgepodge Platoon is a Pokemon Emerald ROM Hack featuring 80+ usable Fakemon in a facility very similar to the Battle Factory. You'll be faced with brand new moves, abilities, stat spreads, and more, spanning all 9 generations of Pokemon. All of the playable Fakemon are lovingly designed and sprited by over 20 different artists. Hop on in and try to get the biggest streak, and fill out the Pokedex along the way!

name: Powerup
summary: Connect metal blocks to transfer energy between transformers.

name: Pokémon Puffy Pink
summary: A Pokémon Fire Red ROM hack that replaces all 151 Pokémon with Kirby characters, complete with movesets, abilities, stat spreads, etc.

name: Pokemon Fused Dimensions
summary: Pokemon Fused Dimensions is a GBA ROM Hack by DanteZ.35 based on Pokemon Fire Red. And it is now available to download. It was last updated on September 24, 2022.

name: Powerful Wind, Slicked-back Cabbages
summary: Slice cabbages to the rythim of Powerful Wind, Slicked-back Hair by Yukopi

name: Pomegranates
summary: Set in Gaza, Palestine, travel between the past and the future to restore the community you come from. The game was created to memorialize the Palestinians lives lost since October 7th, 2024.

name: Pokémon Chaos in Vesita
summary:
Vesita, a once-idyllic island paradise, now bears the scars of a cataclysmic past. Years ago, a malevolent force plunged the region into chaos, turning Pokémon against their human companions and plunging the land into an icy grip of despair. Three legendary Pokémon, champions of balance, emerged to vanquish the chaos, but at a terrible cost.

Now, peace is fragile. Team Duplica, led by the ambitious and ruthless Master Ilan, seeks to exploit the region's vulnerabilities. Defeated in the recent presidential election by the popular Alexo, Ilan plots a desperate gamble to seize control, threatening to unleash a new era of chaos upon Vesita. As a winner of a prestigious PokéVentur training experience, you'll embark on a thrilling journey across the breathtaking landscapes of Vesita, encountering unique Pokémon, forging rivalries, and ultimately deciding the fate of this war-torn region. Can you prevent Ilan from plunging Vesita back into the abyss?

name: Pokémon Study: Hikaruze! Pokémon Typing PC
Pokemon RBGenesis+
summary: Re-experience Kanto in an all new light! Pokémon RBGenesis aims to recreate the feeling of playing Pokémon Red and Blue on your Gameboy for the first time. Using the colorful art style of the Gen 2 GSC games; Pokémon from gens 1-8, And all new events and characters, Kanto will feel nostalgic and fresh at the same time! RBG ups the expected difficulty of the Kanto region to bring a new challenge to returning players. Search the region for new wild Pokémon encounters based on the Day/Night cycle, or for the various Mega Stones and battle items scattered across the region! Discover all new areas, such as the River Valley, Deep Forest, or Mt. Moon Summit! Become the Champion of the Kanto region in a brand new way, and explore all new mysteries!

name: PowerWash Simulator: Wallace & Gromit Special Pack
summary:
Enter the wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit in PowerWash Simulator’s next big adventure – coming soon!

Embark on a cracking cleaning adventure that’ll take you from charming British suburbs to cheesy celestial bodies. Watch this space for more info and wishlist for updates, old chum.

name: Pokemon Empire
summary:
What is right and wrong? Who gets to decide? And why does everyone follow so blindly? Welcome to the Telius region, only months removed from a bloody civil war sparked by the actions of the tyrannical King, Tobias II. A once benevolent man who ushered in an era of prosperity and industry, he eventually plunged the region into division and violence. In the end, he was overthrown by his own people. Amidst the ensuing chaos and turmoil, a new council of representatives has taken power, supported by the revolutionaries that overthrew the king's regime. This 'grand council' is now in charge of overseeing the reconstruction of the region and establishing a new Pokemon league. But even under this supposed new stability, old fissures remain. Many Telius citizens detest the new government and how it operates and remain loyal to the longstanding traditions of supporting the nobility. This nobility and their soldiers, now on the outside looking in, has adopted the moniker 'Team Royale'. Operating from the shadows, they are a group intent on restoring the region to its former glory days under a new king. So with the region war-torn and divided, how will Telius move into the future? Enter YOU the player: the child of a noble family, you were sent away before the war began. Now that the war has ended, you, along with your best friend Alanah, return to Telius to fulfill a promise to conquer the Pokemon league and to bring the entire region of Telius into harmony once more. Can you solve the mysteries of the war, work your way through the shadows of the past, and become champion of the Telius League? Will you support the grand council, fight for the Royale loyalists, or take matters into your own hands? How will you define your legacy in Pokemon Empire?

RPG Maker Pokemon fangame with Pokemon up through Generation 9 with several rebalances to both individual Pokemon and the general systems.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Mythical Island
summary: Pokémon TCGP was expanded to include a new collectable set of cards, with a new set of missions.

name: PopSlinger Vol. 1 & 2: Loveless Series Bundle
summary: Two anime-inspired 90's musical shooters in one musical bundle!

name: Portrait
summary: DRAW THE HARPY

name: Pogo Epoch: Impossible 99%
summary: It’s a game where you bounce on a Pogo Stick and try to climb a massive tower full of tricky obstacles. Take on the impossible challenge—one unlucky slip, and you’re back at the bottom. Pure focus solo or chaotic fun with friends

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Space-Time Smackdown
Pokémon Compass
summary: Compass is a complete overhaul romhack of Scarlet and Violet, reworking almost every single gameplay aspect and providing new content in a single, cohesively-designed package. It retains vanilla balance and puts an emphasis on creating deliberate and rewarding moments for the player. It is the definitive ScVi experience.

name: Polish Simulator
summary: In Polish reality, cunning and creativity matter—solve tasks in various ways, save time, and show your neighbor who's in charge. Hunt for deals, organize barbecues, and prove that a true Pole always finds a way to make life easier for themselves and harder for their neighbor.

name: Pokémon: Salt & Shadow
summary:
Pokémon meets Dark Souls.

Defy the perils of Cradle Island in Pokémon: Salt & Shadow. Explore a vast, interconnected world with dozens of possible paths to the end.
Be warned, the challenges ahead are unfair and some may seem truly impossible.

name: Popoposan
summary: 'She' spoke 'something' and chased after me. Back then, running away was the only thing I was good at. At home and at school, I had no place where I belonged, and I always wanted someone to play with. "POPOPOSAN" is an adventure game based on urban legends.

name: Pokémon Emerald Imperium
summary: A ROM hack made in the art style of Pokémon Emerald, containing all of the Pokémon up to Generation 9. New teams are given to trainers, and the difficulty is rebalanced. It also adds Mega Evolutions.

name: Powerball: Monster's Quest
summary: Gameboy color brick breaker with a fantasy theme.

name: Pokémon Red Randomizer
summary:
A randomizer mod for Pokémon Red.

Pokemon Randomizers are a fresh new way to experience your favorite Pokemon games! With wild encounters, trainer pokemon, starter pokemon, field items and TMs randomized anything can happen! Imagine walking into the grass and instead of encountering a Pidgey it is a Mewtwo instead. The possibilities are endless and unique!

summary:
