name: Pony Kart DS
summary: Pony Kart DS is a mod of Mario Kart DS that contains 12 custom characters (each with 1 custom kart), 16 custom tracks (replacing the retro tracks from Mario Kart DS) and has most items edited to fit in more with MLP.

name: Pole Vault
summary: You are a stretchy little newt who loves to pole vault.

name: Polimines: Deluxe
summary: Polimines Deluxe combines Minesweeper and Nonograms for a captivating puzzle experience. Immerse yourself in a difficult game where logical thinking is key, and hidden patterns are everywhere. All levels are designed by hand so that guessing is never necessary.

name: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
summary: The old legends say, that ones upon a time there lived people on Earth, that possessed powers of magic, with the help of which they could change and decorate the world. But one day these people had to fight with mighty powers of evil, called the Underworld. Five courageous people-soldiers, possessing that mighty magic power imprisoned the whole army of evil in the underworld, putting magic seals-spells on the entrance to this world. But the victory was paid dear for - these very warriors were killed or disappeared in this battle.

name: Pokémon/Grand Order
summary: "Pokémon/Grand Order" is a fangame that adapts the story of Fate/Grand Order, using resources from the original game and adjusting them to Pokémon mechanics, based on the Fate system.

name: Pokémon The Pit
summary:
This is a roguelite hack that is inspired by Paper Mario: The Thousand Year Door, in which the Pit of 100 Trials is an optional dungeon with 100 floors of battles. We have translated that concept into Pokemon with some twists.

In this challenge, you start with 3 random Pokemon and must fight through a random trainer gauntlet over 100 Floors. You and each trainer have random mons. There is a singles, doubles, and mixed mode as well as tons of other difficulty and challenge options. The Enemy trainer mon levels are tied to the floor number, with Lvl 1 being the minimum and Lvl 100 being the maximum. At the start of the challenge, there is only one trainer per floor, but as you progress, more of them will spawn (random number per floor, weighted to lower numbers), with a max of four per floor by the end of the Pit. After clearing each floor you will get one to three random item drops and then the next floor warp will activate letting you progress. Every 5th floor is a Heal/Shop floor where you will be able to rest and prepare for the next trial and on every 10 floors a Move Tutor NPC will appear. Every 25th floor, there is a random Boss battle with a harder trainer, if you defeat the boss you will be given an option to gain a party member.

name: Porkshire Hero
summary:
This bundle contains: Porkshire Hero for Xbox One, Xbox Series and Porkshire Hero (Windows) for the PC platform.

Join Porkshire Hero on a delightful yet daring quest to collect all the apples needed to save the princess! In this charming and colorful adventure, you'll meet Pink Pig, a charismatic and brave hero, as he embarks on a journey through vibrant forests and treacherous mountains. Along the way, he'll face formidable enemies and navigate deadly traps, but with courage and skill, he might just succeed in his mission.

name: Powercell
summary: Relax and sit back as you create mesmerizing particle reactions and become a source of infinite power.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 3: Tiger-Heli
summary:
Toaplan produced several landmark 2D Shooting titles in the arcade during the 1980's that today are regarded as some of the earliest and finest examples of the genre. Among those, one title stands out in particular as having established many important ideas that helped define the shooting game genre -- 1985's Tiger-Heli.

You could say that the features which characterize a shooting game today, like the scrolling playfield, screen clearing bombs, weapon upgrade systems, and so on, were probably in some way influenced by one of the titles in this collection.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 4: Drift Out
summary:
VISCO Corporation’s DRIFT OUT series is a celebrated collection of 2D rally racing games that brought the excitement of World Rally Championship Racing to arcades and home consoles. Spanning from the original Drift Out in 1991 to Neo Drift Out: New Technology in 1996, the series was renowned for its innovative use of the isometric perspectives, tight controls, and engaging track designs.

Included in this collection is all four games in the Drift Out series as well as several bonus sports titles from the VISCO Catalogue to enjoy in between races!

name: Pokémon Emerald Slide
summary: In this hack, the entire overworld has been turned into an ice puzzle. The game is able to be beaten (a lot of overworld changes were required to make this happen, carpets and flowers are safe spots), but the path to the end is very different than a normal playthrough.

name: Poopy's Wonderland
summary: The rules of this game are incredibly simple: All you need to do is guide the characters to the goal by giving them instructions. However, each stage is filled with various traps and obstacles. Use the available actions to overcome these challenges and lead the characters to their destination!

name: Pokémon Shinju Adventures
summary: Explore the Shinju region in the world of Pokemon! Explore the mysteries of world around you, discover the secret behind Team Sunset, and become the strongest trainer in the Shinju region!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Special Police Vehicle Pack
summary: Extend your department's roster of police vehicles with 9 patrol cars with 5 new skin sets, including black/white, white/blue, black/yellow, and white/gold paint jobs.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Tropical Taskforce Pack
summary: The sun is calling, what are you waiting for? The Tropical Taskforce Pack has the perfect outfits for a tropical summer, ensuring you always look great while riding the wave of justice. The pack contains six different, summerly undercover uniforms.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Unmarked Police Vehicle Pack
summary: Want to conceal your police identity and go undercover? Add a selection of 9 exclusive unmarked police vehicles with 5 different looks to your fleet.

name: Poltergeist Prodigy
summary:
Poltergeist Prodigy is a single-player, story-focused, puzzle action-adventure game, a first person haunter where you delight in being a mischievous ghost.

You are a new ghost, and to continue existing and uncover how you died you must haunt the living. With guidance from a comedic, more experienced ghost, you will learn to haunt people and animals with a variety of techniques in a range of places. By throwing objects around, conjuring scary aspects, possessing people, and ultilising many more haunting abilities, you will scare your way to becoming a more powerful spirit and trigger memories of how you died and the mysterious circumstances behind it.

name: Power Solenoid: BennyJr
summary: Play with BennyJr on his infinite quest to the sky!

name: Pourdle
summary: A daily challenge game where you try your best to fill a coffee cup as much as possible without spilling.

name: Power Crisis
summary: POWER CRISIS is an unnerving puzzle/resource-management game, where you have nothing but your mind, a light, and your superhuman electrical abilities to help you avoid obstacles, ward off enemies, and progress between test chambers.

name: Pokettohiro
summary: An epic, old-school adventure full of challenges and secrets! The biggest adventures come in small packages!

name: Poem Ex Machina
summary: Anime style, Ride X Fight, fast paced game.

name: Potion Pleasing
summary: How far are you willing to go to be accepted?

name: Pochemeow
summary: Economic strategy about trade war

name: Poly TD
summary: Poly TD is a new type of tower defense game with roguelike elements. Combine heroes in a circular stage and use your own strategy to fend off endless waves of enemies!

name: Pokémon Recharged Emerald
summary: Pokemon Recharged Emerald is a fully completed GBA ROM hack made by Jaizu. Embark on an exciting journey through a more challenging Hoenn region, with a lot of quality of lifes. Hang out with your starter, have fun with the Pokémon you meet, collect gym badges, and take on Team Magma and Team Aqua.

name: Pokénet
summary: Pokénet was a fan-made massively multiplayer online role-playing game based on the Pokémon series. The game was shutdown in 2010 after receiving a Cease & Desist from Nintendo.

name: Pokémon Go: Might and Mastery
summary: The 18th implementation of seasons intersected with the Spring season in Northern Hemisphere and Autumn season in the Southern Hemisphere. This season's theme is focused around the theme of getting stronger, focusing on Galar's Pokémon - like Kubfu and Urshifu - and the Dynamax phenomena.

name: Pokémon Champions
summary: Get ready to experience everything you love about Pokémon battles all in one place—in Pokémon Champions. This new, battle-focused game will feature familiar mechanics such as Pokémon types, Abilities, and moves, creating an environment conducive to rich and varied strategies for new and experienced Trainers alike. It’s not just familiar mechanics—you’ll be able to bring in classic Pokémon from Pokémon HOME, too! Look forward to cross-platform battles alongside your favorite Pokémon on Nintendo Switch and mobile, with a variety of different modes available for your desired experience.

name: Pohinki Simulator
summary: Pohinki Simulator is a survival game set in a polish neighbourhood, where you need to explore the open world in search for trash in order to survive and gain power. Explore the forgotten streets of Tarnow and find the treasures that others threw away in this abstract reality, filled with secrets waiting to be discovered.

name: Pokémon Eterna Emoción
summary: The story of this project is that many will want to take over the world and only you can stop them. The protagonist will turn 18, see a pink thing through the window and enter his room, it is Mew and it will warn him of devastation and that when he reaches the age required to go on a trip, he will have to prove his courage against the dangers of the region. He will have to go in search of Mew to save the world, without it falling into the wrong hands and for everything to return to normal.

name: Pokémon PureRed
summary: This is a purist's enhancement of Pokémon Red. The goal is to enhance the original games for excellent replayability without bringing in mechanics, moves, sprites, visuals, type matchups, or Pokémon that were introduced in later games. The 2.0 version is based on the disassembly and has hundreds of new optional features / fixes!

name: Pokémon PureGreen
summary: This is a purist's enhancement of Pokemon Green. The goal is to enhance the original games for excellent replayability without bringing in mechanics, moves, sprites, visuals, type matchups, or pokemon that were introduced in later games.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Triumphant Light
summary: The Mythical Pokémon Arceus is headlining the exciting new Triumphant Light expansion, descending from Mt. Coronet as it makes its debut as a powerful Pokémon ex—and bringing along with it unique Link Abilities.

name: Pokémon Soulstones 2: Time Wardens
summary: A sequel that stays true to the spirit of the first game, by building on what made it great: Quality of life, mega Pokemon, and lots and lots of regional variants.

name: Pokémon Sword and Shield Ultimate Plus
summary:
A faithful de-make of Pokémon Sword and Shield, playable on GBA!
Requires Pokémon FireRed.

name: Polycar Blitz
summary: Shift into high gear and defend the moon! A top-down vehicle shooter with rouge-lite elements, gun down monsters and upgrade your Polycar to fend off against increasingly difficult waves of alien invaders! Do you have what it takes to win?

name: Positive! Hapili Link
summary: The superpowered transformation phrase is “Positive! Happy Link!”

name: Pop Rock 'N' Roll
summary:
Pop Rock 'N' Roll is a vibrant action game that has you pop balloons with your mouse to prevent enemies from reaching the top. But don't be too trigger-happy: not every balloon should be popped, as they may carry helpful Power-Ups or even friendly Mokos, who will cost you precious candy if you burst their ride!

You're going to need quick fingers and a cool head as you stop hordes of enemies and overinflated bosses.

name: Pokemon HG/SS Golden Edition
summary: This is exactly the same story as HeartGold & Soulsilver, but a 'Deluxe' version with gameplay improvements, additional content and improvements to the stats that should have been in the original version. All the mini sprites were changed with updated sprites from the 6th generation, and the dex contains monsters from the 1st to 4th generation (from Kanto to Sinnoh). The exclusives of each version are now in both versions and the evolutions by trade were also modified. Changes in Portuguese were made by ROM Hacker Luciano Santos.

name: Pocket Room Sanrio Characters
summary: A new Tamagotchi based on Sanrio characters.

name: Polytropos: A Tactical Odyssey
summary: Polytropos: A Tactical Odyssey is a roguelite turn-based strategy RPG. Wield magic and might against legendary foes from Greek mythology. Recruit a synergistic army and cultivate your hero to win Immortal Glory!

name: Postal 2 VR
summary: POSTAL 2 VR lets you loose in the most chaotic sandbox shooter ever, fully reimagined for VR. Survive a week in Paradise, Arizona—buy milk, return books, or go completely POSTAL with an arsenal of absurd weapons and unpredictable NPCs. The choice is yours…but good luck staying out of trouble.

name: Pokémon Emerald BR Deluxe
summary: An improved version of the original Emerald, made by Fire, for Youtuber Stark's series.

name: Pokémon Black/White Redux
summary: The goal of this hack is to offer a more complete but more classic experience of the Black and White versions, so don't expect any changes in the difficulty, types or status of the Pokémon. The goal here is just to make edits that increase the quality of the gameplay. If you are looking for something more challenging, I recommend Blaze Black and Volt White.

name: Pokémon Black 2 /White 2 Deluxe
summary: This is an update of the Blaze Black and Volt White 2 pt-br version, as nowadays there are redux versions that are much more up to date, I decided to make this version a Black and White 2 vanilla or classic, as you prefer.

name: PowerWash Simulator 2
summary: PowerWash Simulator is back, bubbling with fresh locations, soap-erior equipment and splashy features. Effortlessly transform soiled surroundings into clean, serene scenes, solo or with pals. Satisfaction is a spray away!

name: Pool 2
summary: Gather your friends and get ready for a chaotic twist on pool! No more waiting for your turn, each player controls a cue ball, and shots are taken in real-time! Play up to 4 players on wacky pool tables in this physics-based party game!

name: Potion Permit: Lunar New Year Bundle
summary:
Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

Customise your room with:
• Lunar New Year Lantern
• Lunar New Year Lanterns
• Lucky Cat Statue
• Oriental Folding Wall
• Red Flower Arrangements

name: Poop Killer: Flush or Die
summary: Bob and Case just wanted a quiet night… but fate (and a clogged toilet) had other plans. When a clueless friend ignores an important warning and decides to take a dump in a broken toilet, the nightmare begins.

name: Pokémon Old World Dawn
summary:
In Celestia, the floating city, Eve's ordinary school life is suddenly disrupted when she encounters Net, an enigmatic being who leads her on a journey of discovery and adventure. A prehistoric monster, previously imprisoned, has been unleashed and is wreaking havoc on the universe with the destructive power of the Void. With the world on the edge of destruction, Eve finds herself having to go on a journey of searching for the truth, fighting against strong opponents, and learning how to bring an end to the Void before it destroys everything.

This completed fangame clocks in at 40 hours of playtime, from a fresh-new Void type to challenging boss fights with creative mechanics and an abundance of challenges—from crafting and mini-games to side gyms and regional Pokémon evolutions. Throughout your journey, you'll encounter eccentric characters, ride across regions, and gain achievements, all while shaping Eve's story and discovering what it truly means to find one's self.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Shining Revelry
Polarity Remastered
summary: A thrilling, sci-fi puzzle based journey through a hacked computer system.

name: Poop Deck Draw Down
summary: Try the Poop Deck Draw Down game to join SpongeBob and his friends for some rounds of cards! Can you get through every hand without getting zapped?

name: Pocket Stadium
summary: Pocket Stadium is a Sports game, published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Pokémon Ambrosia
summary: Pokémon Ambrosia is a rom hack of Pokémon Crystal featuring 253 Pokémon from the first 6 Generations, an updated world map, new story, wandering Pokémon, and various quality of life features.

name: Pokémon Cope
summary: Pokemon cope is a romhack parody of Pokemon Clover that aims to overhaul the usual fire red experience with a brand new complete dex and a bunch of inside jokes.

name: Pokemon Crystal Clear
summary: An open world Rom Hack of Pokemon Crystal.

name: Pokémon Platinum Redux​
summary: Platinum Redux is a difficulty/enhancement ROM hack of Platinum. It aims to provide a more challenging Platinum experience with focus on teambuilding and battling. As a completed ROM hack, Platinum Redux includes all 493 catchable Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Serene Crystal
summary: Pokémon Serene Crystal is a hack that strives to change up the original Crystal, with new gym leaders and Pokémon from newer generations, alongside new original regional forms! There have been several QOL improvements that, alongside the new dex, makes for a fun experience! While the story remains largely unchanged, there have been a few minor changes to make some characters feel more coherent. Apart from that, it's identical to Crystal's story.

name: Pokemon Shining Opal
summary: Firered Rom Hack with a new region and interactive storyline.

name: Pokémon Velvet: Special Hatenna Edition
summary: A Rom Hack of Pokemon Yellow with new Pokemon and quality of life features

name: Pokémon Mythic Silver
summary: A Rom Hack of Pokemon Heartgold with a completely modified map, unique story, and Pokemon from gens 1-8.

name: Pokemon: Evolved
summary:
Pokémon: Evolved is a hack of Leaf Green where all of the original Gen I pokemon now evolve at least two more times expanding the Pokedex from the original 151 to 354. All new evolutions have custom front and back sprites, pokedex entries, and shiny variants.

Stats, movesets, and even evo levels have been completely reworked to make for a fun challenging experience! Modified route encounters make it so that every single pokemon from Gen I is findable and catchable in a single solo playthrough.

name: Powerstation 17
summary: Pick up the crowbar of research scientist Gordon Freeman, who finds himself on an alien-infested Earth being picked to the bone, its resources depleted, its populace dwindling. Freeman is thrust into the unenviable role of rescuing the world from the wrong he unleashed back at Black Mesa. And a lot of people, people he cares about, are counting on him.

name: Pokémon Lazarus
summary: Pokémon Lazarus is a romhack of Pokémon Emerald with many alterations. Prepare to embark on a journey through the Ilios region, a new setting based on mainland Greece and its surrounding islands. With an original story, many new and improved mechanics, and a distinct Game Boy Color-inspired art style, it delivers a fresh adventure rooted in the spirit of classic Pokémon games.

name: Pocket Thief
summary: Slide your way to becoming a master thief, as you steal from the rich, and keep a little something for yourself; in this criminally fun 2D puzzle game. Navigate barriers and drag other obstructions thoughtfully away until you can successfully guide the loot out of each maze-like level.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 5: Bad Dudes
summary:
Bad Dudes exemplified the popularity of side-scrolling action games during the late 1980s, a genre that was a staple of arcade culture. Its straightforward, action-packed gameplay and cooperative multiplayer made it an accessible and appealing title for players of all skill levels.

Here, we present to you in its original arcade as well as home console editions the original Bad Dudes, as well as Crude Buster, aka Two Crude Dudes -- it’s post-apocalyptic spiritual successor.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 6: Heavy Barrel
summary:
In the late 1980's and early 1990's Data East solidified its reputation in the arcade industry with military-themed run and gun action games that showcased innovative gameplay and memorable characters, many which shared thematic elements with American action movies of the era.

This time, we journey to the underground complex of a nuclear missile site in Heavy Barrel, where its up to one or two players to infiltrate an island base and kill the enemy leader while seeking out parts to the high-powered titular weapon, the Heavy Barrel.

Or, invite two more friends over and blast through Desert Assault, which features four player co-op, pilot-able vehicles, and lots of mayhem to keep you on your toes.

name: Postknight World
summary: Postknight World is a heartwarming 2D open-world RPG about slowing down and savouring the journey. As a Postknight, you travel across Prism, deliver knightmail, and connect with its people.

name: Pocket & Zooom
summary: Pocket & Zooom is a puzzle game in which you give commands to aircraft to guide them to their destinations. Players can give only six kinds of commands. It's more difficult than it sounds. Create a strategy to get the aircraft to their destinations!

name: Pokémon FireRed Deluxe
summary:
This is a Pokémon FireRed ROM hack with the goal of making the game more balanced, challenging, and fun while keeping it flexible for different playstyles. It’s designed to be challenging enough for a Nuzlocke run, but you can play it however you like.

The hack stays true to the feel of Gen 3, without features like the physical/special split, Fairy type, or Pokémon from other regions. New Pokémon, moves, and items have been added, but everything fits within the Gen 3 style and mechanics.

name: PomoFish
summary: Are you ready to level up your productivity? PomoFish is a game that merges fishing and the Pomodoro studying technique! Work hard while Joe catches fish for you! Sell your fish to level up your skills and buy items.

name: Power Guy World
summary: Power Guy World is a 30 exit SMW romhack created by LucasMegaStriker as a tribute to the Vtuber "Power Guy".

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 7: Breaker's
summary: Brace yourself for an epic showdown as you unleash your inner champion with Breaker's and Breaker's Revenge – two of Visco Corporation’s most legendary arcade fighting games. Afterwards, dive into a treasure trove of arcade and home console gems from the legendary Visco Archives including rare and valuable classic games like Cowboy Kid and Bang Bang Busters!

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 8: Captain Tomaday
summary:
Bolster your Polymega Collection with this series of classic Visco arcade classics, including the titular "Cute 'em Up", Captain Tomaday -- a mutant Tomato who packs a serious punch!

Also included -- intense sci-fi shooters Storm Blade, Earth Joker, Galmedes, and Andro Dunos, plus frantic block breaking puzzler Blocken!

name: Poof! Cleaning Services
summary: Clean and organize other people’s homes while uncovering emotional stories through the objects you find. Discover each room’s unique history, dig up secrets, and feel the satisfaction of tidying up the space in this wholesome, casual puzzle game about new beginnings in a foreign country.

name: Port Logistics Simulator: Dockside Harbor Handling
summary: Run the docks. Master the cargo. Rule the port.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Muckingham Files - Part 5
summary: Melt away goop by the scoopful and savour soft-serve satisfaction in the fifth instalment of The Muckingham Files. Restore the Dessert Parlour to its former knickerbocker-glory and indulge in a chill clean-up.

name: Pouch
summary: Pouch is a 3D open-world platformer where you play as a resourceful mouse, scavenging for supplies on your party-planning checklist. Explore the room, collect items, and bring them to your mailbox to get all the items on your list before the party! But be sure to make it back home in time each day-- you don't want to get caught by your giant, unfriendly neighbor.

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Flames of Bravery
summary:
Tranquil Town, a little settlement, is attacked and subjugated by bandits, the situation has made a villager, Quilava, to take action and search for a warrior who once lived there, against the advice of her guardian, Milotic. Her travel made her find a new bravery within herself... Or is it just latent frustration?

Warning:
Some topics on this hack can be delicate such as:
-Explicit Parental Abuse
-Explicit Murderous Intents.

name: Potrick Snap
summary: you clean potrick house but there is something strange in the house but potrick did't want to tell you what happend in this house

name: Potrick Snap 2
summary: You Finally Escape From Potrick but Police man want To Talk With YOU

name: Pocket Vampire Girl
summary:
Take care of a vampire girl in this virtual pet game, feed her every day, and participate in mini-games to earn money that you can use to buy new clothes and hairstyles.

Also, explore the town and meet its strange inhabitants, but make sure to go only at night!

name: Poultry Party
summary: Poultry Party is a 2D arcade-like action game that gets harder as you go. Dodge, jump over, and extinguish hazards to avoid becoming dinner. Need help? Add up to 17 additional players (yes really) to assist you. Survive as long as you can, or beat the game as fast as you can. The choice is yours!

name: Potion in Motion
summary: Brew potions, cast spells, and master alchemy in a fast-paced potion shop where magic and language intertwine. Experiment with weird ingredients, and manage quirky customers while avoiding failures! Every potion is a puzzle, but will you perfect your craft or turn your shop into a disaster zone?

name: Potato Vs. Potato
summary: Potato Vs Potato is a fun and addictive game where you click on potatoes to grow your potato empire! Join us and participate in exciting events, and collaborate with fellow potato enthusiasts. Together, we'll cultivate the ultimate potato paradise and grow into something truly awesome!

name: Popo & Rob
summary: Popo & Rob is an action-packed shooter game that combines dynamic, casual-friendly shooting with a unique twist on movement. Engage in exciting battles where gravity is no limit. Choose your side, Popo or Rob, and immerse yourself in a world that’s bright, bold, and brimming with fun.

name: Poop Rocket
summary: Poop Rocket is a casual sci-fi 2D shooter game. Bomb your way through debris and aliens before the poop power meter runs out. Avoid the debris and aliens, or you'll take damage and die. The game is controlled with your keyboard. Use the arrows to navigate and the space bar to drop bombs.

name: Poofie Plays God
summary: Poofie Plays God is an Indie Open world Puzzle game where you'll have to lower the curse binding you in the forest and escape before he or the others kill you.

name: PolyWar
summary: PolyWar is an online FPS based PvP game that you can play with your friends.

name: PolyTap
summary: Tap to the rhythm based on the shapes that emerge!

name: Poker Clicker
summary: Earn chips by revealing randomly generated poker hands and unlock gems for powerful bonuses. And don't worry if you're not getting any goals or feeling like you're missing a strategy. It's all about the endless clicking, and it's the perfect way to relax and unwind.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Celestial Guardians
summary: First-partner Pokémon Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio make their Pokémon debuts, alongside the mighty Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo and Lunala, and beloved Trainers from Alola. Celestial Guardians features over 200 cards waiting to be collected, including powerful new Pokémon ex and the first immersive Supporter card! Take a sneak peek below at some cards you can expect to see in the new expansion.

name: Pond Abyss
summary: Pond Abyss is a first-person psychological horror game with a length of 25-30 minutes. The action takes place on a secluded forest pond, where the protagonist is tasked with looking after it while his uncle is away. However, the once peaceful atmosphere soon becomes unsettling when eerie and inexplicable events begin to unfold.

name: Poco
summary:
Poco is a 2D/3D hybrid point-and-click adventure game where you play as Poco, a two-inch tall clown who is banished from a giant walking circus, and left to fend for themselves in the undergrowth of the Below World, where they befriend and enlist the help of the local homunculus population to build a rocket.

Explore the beautiful, cluttered Below World... Where everything broken, lost, or unwanted from the Worlds Above comes to decay.

name: Pokémon Awakening
summary:
In the secluded Waerfall Village, ancient Idols guard divine secrets—and the enigmatic grimoire D. Moon, shared between you and your brother since infancy, has begun to awaken. Guided by Sage Addae and joined by your Pokémon team and Pixi, a spirited guardian fairy, you’ll explore Angard’s forgotten ruins and untamed wilds to unravel the grimoire’s ties to a looming Holy War. But as chaos threatens to shatter the world, a pivotal choice emerges: uphold order as the goddess’s champion, or embrace chaos to forge a new destiny.

Tailor your journey with a Class System that unlocks battle strategies, clash with towering Local Legends, and bond with allies through a relationship system that alters the story’s course. With time-based events, overworld encounters, and two stark endings, every decision weaves your legacy. Will Angard find peace—or burn in divine reckoning? The final page of D. Moon awaits your hand…

name: Pole Riders
summary:
Pole Riders is a pole-vaulting polo game for two players only. Vault up to kick the ball into the opposing player’s goal, or kick your opponent off their pole.

I made an updated, much better version of this game called Super Pole Riders, which is part of the Sportsfriends compilation for computers and Playstations. If you like this one, you should check that out – I feel like I fixed a lot of the design flaws in the original game.

It’s a bit silly, this game.

name: Pokémon: Emerald Backwards
summary: Pokémon: Emerald Backwards is a romhack of Pokemon Emerald where you start in the Hall of Fame and then have to play through the entire game in reverse order, slowly losing everything you started with!

name: Poker Solitaire
summary: A fresh fusion of Poker and Puzzle! Arrange cards and complete poker hands!

name: Pool With Me
summary: Pool With Me – The Ultimate 8-Ball Pool Challenge!

name: Poker Rivals
summary: Poker Rivals takes Texas Hold 'Em Poker to a whole new level. Whether you're a newcomer to Hold 'Em or you're an old hand, you'll feel instantly at home in the ultimate poker experience.

name: Pools: Chapter 0
summary: The waters of POOLS just got deeper. Chapter 0 - a brand-new free level, is now available!

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 9: Strikers 1945
summary:
Get ready for nonstop aerial action with the Strikers 1945 Collection, an officially licensed compilation of PSIKYO’s iconic vertical shoot-’em-ups. This definitive set includes the original arcade versions of Strikers 1945, Strikers 1945 II, and Strikers 1945 III, as well as their home console releases for PS1 and Saturn. Experience intense bullet-hell combat, retro visuals, and the unique fusion of historical and sci-fi themes that made these titles arcade legends.

This collection also includes a lineup of classic shoot-’em-ups from Jaleco: P-47: The Phantom Fighter, P-47 Aces, Desert War, and D-Day. Dive into high-speed military action across multiple theaters of war, adding even more explosive variety to this must-have package for retro shooter fans.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 10: Bases Loaded
summary:
Step up to the plate and relive the glory days of 8-bit and 16-bit sports action with the Bases Loaded Collection, a nostalgic compilation that brings together the iconic Bases Loaded series and a lineup of additional classic Jaleco sports games. The collection includes the original Bases Loaded, alongside its sequels Bases Loaded 2, Bases Loaded 3, Super Bases Loaded and Super Bases Loaded 2. Your goal is simple: play the perfect game and master the art of baseball in true retro fashion with fast-paced gameplay, strategic pitching, and cinematic batting action.

But the sports action doesn't stop with baseball. This collection also features plenty of additional 8 and 16-bit Jaleco Sports titles to add to your Polymega Collection. Finally, you’ll get 3 bonus Jaleco arcade classics based on the Mega System 32 hardware: Best Bout Boxing, Big Run, and Cisco Heat. With more than 13 unique games on disc, this collection is one of the most extensive collections we have released to date.

name: Pokémon Rocket Edition
summary: Become a Team Rocket recruit and experience the events that parallel Red's story in Kanto!

name: Pokémon Gamma Emerald
summary: Pokémon Gamma Emerald is a fan-made ground-up Unreal Engine remake of Pokémon Emerald, made by UndreamedPanic.

name: Pogo Stick: Ultimate Challenge
summary: A game that doesn’t believe in you — it tests your patience, stubbornness, and whether you can climb to the top. Think you can?

name: Portrait on Imagined Horizon
summary: a living archive

name: Polygon Survivors
summary: Polygon Survivors is a 2D survivors-style roguelite where you fight off waves of enemies using customizable weapons, powerful abilities, summons, and a variety of projectiles. Experiment with endless synergies to survive the polygonal chaos.

name: Possession
summary: The story begins as the protagonist receives a cursed doll and starts suffering from recurring nightmares. Players explore dark environments and face fear through various horror elements. The game offers two different endings and delivers a short but intense horror experience.

name: Pop Life
summary: You’ve made it all the way through the challenges of the great TV show! But this is just the beginning of the path. For you, a whole new adventure is starting. Teachers, new concerts, you’ve everything to discover. And more than ever you need to make friends amoung the teachers and show biz professionals. Will you be up to the task? Welcome to Pop Life! This game allows you to follow the career of the winner of the ‘Pop Life’ contest through a series of concerts throughout the world. You will need to call on teachers to teach you songs, dance steps and stage effects to create your own spectacular concets. You’ll prepare your concerts in a house you build yourself, while making sure to do the max to please your fans. On to fame and glory!

name: Potion Problems
summary: Potion Problems is a multiplayer party game, combining social deduction and magic. Navigate Pigeonpoint's College for Potion Making as a troublemaker or an apprentice. Collect ingredients, make potions, avoid being turned into a frog, and vote out troublemakers to complete your degree!

name: Pokémon Lazy Green
summary:
A rom hack of Pokémon LeafGreen/FireRed focused on the vanilla experience (no added Pokémon, no Special/Physical split for example) with quality-of-life changes designed to make the game easier and faster.

A few examples include:
• Increased exp from battles
• level caps
• removed trade evolutions
• cheaper items
• all TMs purchasable

name: PokeVoid
summary: A Pokémon fangame heavily inspired by the roguelite genre and PokeRogue. Battle corrupted trainers while gathering stacking items, exploring many different biomes, and reaching Pokémon stats you never thought possible!

name: Pokemon Reloaded
summary: “Pokemon Reloaded” is an Rpgxp Fangame made by F3R. Discover an amazing anime-style battle system similar to Pokemon, featuring movements and actions. Also, journey through the fresh ‘Star’ region, where you can encounter Pokemon from generations 1 to 9, face various villainous teams, pick from multiple main characters, and much more.

name: Pokemon Gamma Emerald
summary: In Pokémon Gamma Emerald, on your way to your new home your trip takes an unexpected turn when a sudden storm appears and your boat crashes on a mysterious, uncharted island situated between the Hoenn and Sinnoh region. With no way to call for help or outside contact, you are forced to explore- but you are not alone.

name: Portal Bagley: Aperture Remote Terminal
summary:
Are you an Aperture Science employee?
Then you NEED this program!

Whether you just want to chat with your colleagues via our secure messaging, control testing rooms remotely, fill out our forms to earn rewards or even store your files* in Aperture Science's massive database!

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Extradimensional Crisis
summary: An Ultra Wormhole is opening in Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket, bringing powerful Ultra Beasts into the fray! With the upcoming expansion, Extradimensional Crisis, arriving on May 29, 2025, at 11:00 p.m. PDT, you’ll be able to collect over 100 new cards, including Pokémon ex, Trainer cards, and mighty Ultra Beasts including Buzzwole, Guzzlord, and more.

name: PolarChaseVR
summary: PolarChaseVR offers a fun gaming experience, a variety of game modes for users to enjoy. Whether you're up for exploring game modes or being competitive in game modes, PolarChaseVR delivers a multiplayer environment.

name: Pocket Army
summary: Play with your friends, build your army and lead them in frantic real-time battle against evils of ever increasing power. Pocket Army brings together army-building, RPG elements, hack and slash action quests, and friend competition, resulting in an engaging gameplay experience.

name: Pop Star Academy
summary: The PC CD-ROM version of Fame Academy is a life and concert simulation game where you manage the winner of the Fame Academy TV show. Progress from wannabe to international superstar over nine spectacular levels. Choose the way your star looks, and then guide them through their career, learning new skills and making the best choices that will take them to super stardom!

name: Polterquest
summary: In Polterquest you play as the "coolcat" exploring haunted places and finding treasures. Game is a 3d action adventure platformer in which you need to solve certain puzzles to progress as well as defeating enemies along your journey.

name: Police Border Contraband Patrol
summary: Patrol. Inspect. Intercept. Justice starts with you.

name: Polygone
summary: Polygone is a low-poly, yet highly visual take on the classic "Zombie Modes" in modern first person shooters. Play with up to four friends to fight off endless hordes of over 50 different zombies and bosses on a massive map that you'll need to unlock areas to explore.

name: Postie
summary:
You've joined the Royal Mail. It's your duty to deliver.

Your life is on the line. Everything depends upon the success of this mission.

Please, I need you to drive the van to the target destination, locate the mailbag, and deliver to all of the mailboxes.

Our hopes and dreams weigh upon your shoulders. Please, hurry.

name: Pocket Oracle
summary: Uncover your destiny in this interactive divination game! Explore ancient Eastern wisdom and complete quests to unlock 64 hexagrams that reveal the mysteries of your destiny in love, career, health, wealth, and more. Embrace the timeless power of fortune-telling and find clarity on your life's path!

name: PowerWash Simulator: Muckingham Files - Part 6
summary: The Muckingham Files is a series of free Bonus Job updates that take you to never-before-seen places from the original universe of PowerWash Simulator, with new characters, locations and stories. Get to know more about your stomping ground and its inhabitants as the most in-demand power washer in town.

name: Pokermon
summary: Pokermon is a full content mod for Balatro, adding content based on Pokemon. There are now 250+ Jokers that have been added alongside many other custom additions. There is also an option to only play with Pokemon Jokers if you want to focus on the new content. (Option defaults to off)

name: Pokémon CrystalDust
summary: A remake of Pokémon Crystal with the engine from Pokémon Emerald by Domoreawesome.

name: PogoPogo
summary: Twist and bounce through dozens of tight single-screen chambers. Splash through rapids, float through space, watch helplessly as your pogo-bound body hurtles into the jagged rocks. Try again, in this frenetic, 1-bit, precision platformer.

name: Polar Star
summary:
Outsmart enemy AI in a row of turn-based duels that work by the rules of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

Blast your way to the top in a deadly tournament of turn-based duels, break the game rules by unlocking various items that turn the power balance upside-down. Calculate all possible outcomes and carefully plan your moves, or just give into the rush and relentlessly gamble with your life on the line.

name: Pool Protocol: Loop
summary: You are trapped in a mysterious swimming pool. Observe the surroundings for any abnormalities and find a way to escape.

name: Pomegranate Housing Complex
summary: Take on the role of a daytime security guard in a cursed apartment complex. Monitor residents, greet guests, and handle strange incidents—just make sure to follow the rules.

name: Portal Foxes TD
summary: Defend portals from hordes of slimes with elemental foxes in this tabletop VR game. Build mazes to thwart adaptive enemy pathing in three dimensions. Collect a variety of foxes and equipment over a 25 level story campaign.

name: Postal: Brain Damaged - These Sunny Daze
summary: POSTAL: Brain Damaged - These Sunny Daze isn’t “just a DLC” - it’s a tropical serotonin collapse packed with juicy carnage, alleged jokes, overbaked new levels, even less appropriate enemies and unhinged guns. This is another mag of SPF-free mockery fired point-blank at modern life.

name: Powerfall
summary: Powerfall, a 3D dystopian platformer set in the year 2500. Your task? Return the power (literally speaking) to the people by parkouring your way to the top of the skyscraper that withholds it all.

name: Pocket Boss
summary: Who says that work and play don’t mix? Not us! Play Pocket Boss, the game where you handle lots of fun data and one not-so-fun boss.

name: Poly Tower
summary: A stylized mix between a Tower Defense and a Tower Offense

name: Pollucean
summary: Pollucean is a 2D storydriven adventure game with management & automation elements. Collect trash, recycle in your very own factory, craft equipment and unravel the true origin of this worlds pollution.

name: Post Apo Tycoon
summary: Enter the world of Post Apo Tycoon, where you will revive a post-apocalyptic fallout landscape after a nuclear explosion. Take on the challenge of exploring, building, and transforming the landscape back into a thriving ecosystem. Get out of your nuclear silo to fill in the grain silo and rebuild the world!

name: Pocket Music
summary: Pocket Music was a cancelled rhythm game for the Game Boy starring Barbara the Bat. It was cancelled and development shifted to Game Boy Music, which would also get cancelled. Barbara the Bat would later receive her debut in Daigassou! Band Brothers, for the Nintendo DS.

name: PolySouls
summary: Polysouls is an open-world action RPG with deep, skill-based combat. Every enemy is deadly, every fight a test of patience and precision. Explore massive world full of hidden paths, powerful enemies, and secret places.

name: Popit Game
summary: Play Popit Game — a massively multiplayer roguelike card game. Сlimb a tower of Blocks. Use game-breaking Popits to defeat other players. Chain strategic combos to boost your score and sabotage your rivals on the live leaderboard.

name: Pokertown: Cheater's Paradise
summary: Step into Pokertown, a seedy underworld run by gangs and mobs filled with loan sharks, laundered money, and Texas Hold'em Poker. Learn to cheat your opponents by marking cards, stacking the deck, and other underhanded techniques. Just don't get caught...

name: Polyglock
summary: POLYGLOCK combines flash-cards with FPS aiming mechanics to create ridiculously fun, satisfying and productive gameplay. Create and share your own decks, or play through the curated content to learn anything you like.

name: Pogs: Power of Golden Slammer
summary: A sandbox simulation featuring skateboarding, 90s toys and fashion, authentic turn based pogs battles, mini quests and fun wearable items.

name: Pogo Stadium
summary: POGO Stadium is a rhythm-based territory control battle game inspired by Go. Players bounce across futuristic arenas using pogo sticks, strategically placing blocks to capture territory in real time. The game features solo challenges and local multiplayer for up to four players, with customizable characters, gear, and dynamic music-synced visuals.

name: PowerCharge
summary: Take to the stars in PowerCharge, a revolutionary new card game. Assemble your crew of over 100 possible cards. Position your workers strategically on the board to combo with beacons you place. Increase your power and deal massive damage to your enemy all at once. Will your crew rule the galaxy?

name: Postal 2 Redux
summary: A ground‑up overhaul of 2003’s infamous open‑world shooter. Part modernization, part love‑letter, POSTAL 2 Redux will hoist every original asset out of the creaking Unreal 1.5 engine and slam it into today’s Unity—delivering the same familiar week in the POSTAL Dude’s life with a merciless glow‑up and a bucket of new toys.

name: Pokemon Kanlara Ultimate
summary:
Pokemon Kanlara Ultimate is the sister game to Kanlara Adventures. It is supposed to provide the most enjoyable way of exploring the region of Kanlara yet.

Kanlara is the region where you were born. You spawn here, and you meet up with your childhood friend and rival. You are informed that the Professor wants to see both of you.

At the Lab, Professor Woke lets you know that apparently, Kanlara is under attack by a group known as Team Rocket.

You receive your first Pokemon, and together you and your rival set out on your adventure.
Your goal is to become the best trainer you can be, but also to put a wrench in Team Rocket’s plans and make sure they’re put in their place.

Later, it becomes apparent that Team Rocket is gaining too much power, and the entire fate of Kanlara will rest on your shoulder as you embark on your path towards the final battle, which will decide it all…

name: PossiblyAxolotl's PlayPack
summary: PossiblyAxolotl's PlayPack is a small collection of 3 arcad-ey titles, originally created for the PlayJam game jam.

name: Poxel.io
summary: Poxel.io is a fast paced first person shooter game where players battle in various game modes like Free-for-All, Team Deathmatch, Kill Confirmed, and Domination. The game features a pixelated art style as well as numerous weapon and player model skins.

name: Pocket Farmer
summary: A simple and charming farming sim for Playdate. Plant, harvest, upgrade — at your own rhythm.

name: Pocket Dictator
summary: Pocket Dictator is a first-person puzzle game set in a distant future. An abandoned prison is inhabited by many robots. Friendly and not so much.

name: Polyrose
summary: A rotation puzzle game. You rotate cubes to connect colors.

name: Pork 1: The Great Underground Sewer System
summary: A parody of the classic Zork, consisting mostly of goofy situations based on the original, and extensive commentary on the the inadequacy of adventure games from the late 70's and early 80's.

name: Poker Adventurers
summary: Forge permanent combos and conquer freely! Build outrageous poker hands × insane multipliers to defeat each realm's Guardian. Collect Mythic Fantasy Joker cards as loot and blast through psychedelic dimensions. — Dive in now and rack up sky-high scores on your thrilling journey!

name: Potato Cop
summary: An action game, where you avoid flying projectiles like spring onions. Get ready to smash your keyboard whilst you peel potatoes over and over.

name: Pocket Lint
summary: A deceptively hard little game of deduction. I’m now thinking of a specific combination of pocket items. If I give you hints about what you’ve got wrong, can you guess it in as few guesses as possible?

name: Potionworm
summary: The game offers the role of a herbalist to collect different plants and bones from monsters. To make potions according to recipes and sell them to the villagers. Monsters can kill you, so hire warriors as guards. Warriors will kill monsters, and you must collect money to leave the village.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Eevee Grove
summary: This expansion includes over 100 new cards to collect that highlight the ever-popular Pokémon Eevee and its many beloved Evolutions. You can show off your collection in style with a new display board and binder cover featuring the Evolution Pokémon.

name: Pokitaire
summary: A poker and spider solitaire hybrid where you reveal and remove cards by playing poker hands! Turning the classic puzzle game into a score chasing arcade puzzle game.

name: Poker Game: World Poker Club
summary: With millions of players worldwide, numerous in-game events to choose from, and the certified Fair Play guarantee, the World Poker Club is the ultimate go-to poker game that offers much more than just tables and bets.

name: Pochard Jamie
summary: "Pochard Jamie" is a platform action-puzzle game. The diving duck Jamie encounters numerous difficulties during migration. Unlock new levels, scenes, and items to help Jamie complete his mysterious migratory journey.

name: Pokémon Channel-e: Paint Pattern Card - Poké A La Card
Port Shipping Tycoon
summary: Flip tiles to grow your shipping empire. A relaxing maritime logistics idle game.

name: Pool
summary:
Play 8-ball pool on your mobile device against your friend.

The object of the game is to pocket your set of assigned balls (solid or striped) and finally pocket black ball to designated pocket.

name: Pokémon Recharged Pink
summary:
Pokémon Recharged Pink is a fully completed GBA ROM hack made by Jaizu, and a sister release to Pokémon Recharged Yellow. Embark on an exciting journey through a more challenging Kanto region, redesigned in the Generation 3 style. Hang out with your buddy Pikachu, have fun with the Pokémon you meet, collect gym badges, and take on Team Rocket, featuring Jessie, James, and Meowth.
This is, functionally, the same game as Pokémon Recharged Yellow but with some extra changes for people that don't mind about compatibility with generation 3 games. This version gives up things like connectivity to other games for features like a dedicated cheat menu available in the player's PC.

name: Pokémon Edición Team Rocket
summary:
Pokémon Edición Team Rocket is a full-length ROM hack of Pokémon FireRed developed by Dragonsden. Unlike traditional Pokémon games, this fan-made adventure puts the player in the role of a Team Rocket grunt, offering a completely new storyline, characters, and objectives.

Set in the Kanto region, the game features custom events, modified maps, unique dialogues, and original gameplay progression. Later versions include access to the Sevii Islands and even the Johto region, making it a large-scale expansion with dozens of hours of new content.

The game is entirely in Spanish and is one of the most ambitious Team Rocket-themed hacks available. It is not affiliated with Nintendo or Game Freak, and is intended for non-commercial, fan-made purposes only.

name: Populous
summary: Populous is a strategy game where players act as a deity, shaping the land and guiding followers to expand and defeat rival gods. Gameplay involves altering terrain, managing populations, and using divine powers to influence battles and control territory.

name: Pokémon Red & Green: Nintendo Space World '97 Maboroshi no Mew Present
Pokémon Celebrations
summary: Pokémon hack containing remastered versions of Pokémon Red, Blue and Green with many quality of live improvements, better AI and side contents.

name: Poolcore: Submersion
summary: Immerse yourself in poolcore-inspired vibes as you explore a vast complex of mind-bending liminal architecture straight out of your dreams. Navigate through a facility filled with obstacles and puzzles, venturing into depths that descend far below the rippling, chlorinated waters.

name: Possession Game
summary:
Possession
Team up. Uncover the unknown. Survive the haunting.

Possession is a 1v4 co-op horror game where one player takes on the role of a malevolent ghost, while a team of four investigators must work together to uncover its identity—and banish it before time runs out.

name: Pokémon Channel-e: Line Art Card - The Pikachu Star
Pokémon Channel-e: Line Art Card - Jirachi
Pokémon Channel-e: Line Art Card - The Kyogre Constellation
Portal Pinball
summary: Guide Chell and Wheatley through test chambers by navigating portals, using aerial faith plates, defeating turrets and facing other obstacles. This is a standalone mobile version of Zen Studios' Portal Pinball.

name: Pokémon Dark Rising II
summary: Sequel to Dark Rising, continues the game story.

name: Pollinarium
summary: A minimalist, turn-based farming strategy game. Draw cards, place plants and appliances, and adapt to each procedurally-generated garden. Plan for synergy, adapt to each layout, and collect your harvest!

name: Pogo Addiction Solitaire HD
summary: Join Tiki for a wild romp through the world of Pogo as you line up your suits, win minigames and unlock new buddy bobbleheads.

name: Pogo Daily Sudoku
summary: Take on four new sudoku puzzles every day in easy, medium, hard and expert difficulties. Overcome obstacles with helpful power-ups and unlock fun new themes as your wins add up.

name: Pogo Mini-Golf
summary: Slice your way through a forest full of fun obstacles. Take on challenging courses as you hone your hole-in-one skills.

name: Pogo Sudoku
summary: This logic game challenges you to get the highest score possible by solving puzzles fast and accurately.

name: Poppit! Bingo
summary: Spike is back for a balloon-bursting blowout. Pop your way around the world, unleash powerful power-ups and rack up wins in this explosive bingo game.

name: Poppit! HD
summary: Team up with fun-loving cactus Spike to pop all the balloons away and win all the prizes.

name: Poppit! Party
summary: Build the ultimate costume collection for Spike, a balloon popping phenom. Don colorful outfits like astronaut, gardener, pirate and cowboy, each with a unique set of power-ups.

name: Pokemon Dreamstone Mysteries
summary:
Pokémon: Dreamstone Mysteries is a fan-made RPG that drops players into the unexplored region of Cormoria. The place is packed with wild environments—think freezing peaks, lava-filled craters, and shadowy wetlands. The goal? Track down the missing Professor Tenebris while fending off Team Somber, a shady group after the powerful Dreamstones.

This isn’t just another Pokémon game. The story digs deeper, mixing classic monster-catching with mystery and exploration. There are around 300 Pokémon from different generations, plus smoother battles and cleaner visuals. Whether you’re new or a longtime player, it blends nostalgia with fresh twists.

name: Pokémon Battle e: 08-A002 - Ninja Boy Goro
P.O.N.
summary: P.O.N. is a 1–4 player co-op horror-heist. Take on encrypted jobs from a crime syndicate: plant bombs, steal intel, kidnap VIPs—then escape before cops or something worse arrives. A shadow entity hunts you in silence. Stay low, stay sharp… or vanish like those before you.

name: Pokémon Battle e: 08-A015 - PKMN Breeder Candice
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A017 - PKMN Ranger Clayton
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A021 - Ruin Maniac Logan
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A023 - PKMN Breeder Wilson
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A024 - Ruin Maniac Zuril
Pokémon Battle e: 08-K003 - Eggant Berry
summary: The Eggant Berry is a special item introduced in Generation III, exclusive to Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire via the e-Reader system. This berry is featured on card 08-K003 from the Pokémon Battle e: Series 1 collection.

name: Pokémon Battle e: 08-A025 - School Kid Mandy
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A026 - Parasol Lady Sofia
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A030 - Bug Maniac Irvin
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A031 - Battle Girl Natalie
Pokémon Battle e: 08-A036 - Pokéfan Justine
summary: Pokémon Battle e: 08-A036 - Pokéfan Justine is part of the Cordial Bond subset from Series 1 of the Pokémon Battle e cards. Designed for use with the e-Reader and Pokémon Ruby & Sapphire, this card allows players to battle Pokéfan Justine, who commands a team of Pikachu, Golem, and Gengar. Each Pokémon is equipped with unique items and moves, offering a strategic challenge in a simulated trainer battle.

Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc
summary:
This disc contains a preview of Pokémon Colosseum, a sneak peek for movie Jirachi: Wish Maker, as well as a Jirachi Special Gift.

To receive Jirachi, a Nintendo GameCube–Game Boy Advance cable, an English copy of either Pokémon Ruby or Pokémon Sapphire, and an empty spot in the party is required. With everything connected properly, Jirachi will appear and be transferred to Ruby or Sapphire.

name: Pokémon Battle Card e+: Kogoeru Hikari
Pokémon Battle Card e+: Osou Doku
Pokémon Battle Card e+: Kakusareta Iseki
