Post Finem
summary: Post Finem is an alternate history modification for Europa Universalis IV that overhauls many things, including the entirety of Europe, western Asia from the Urals to Persia and Arabia, as well as north Africa. This mod explores a scenario in which Carthage was victorious in the Punic Wars against the Roman Republic, dismantling it after the third conflict, and pursuing economic hegemony in the western Mediterranean.

name: Polariball
summary: Prepare to master magnetism! Polariball is an arcade action game where you must wield the power of polarity to smash targets, grab power-ups, and keep time at bay. Keep an eye out for those pesky sawblades!

name: Pokémon Friends
summary: Solve brainteasing puzzles and make in-game Pokémon plush with Pokémon Friends, available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and iOS and Android devices.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Wisdom of Sea and Sky
summary: Two Legendary Pokémon from the Johto region change the tide of battle and brighten the skies in Wisdom of Sea and Sky, the latest expansion for Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket releasing on July 29, 2025, at 11:00 p.m. PDT! The mighty Lugia and Ho-Oh debut alongside adorable first-partner Pokémon Chikorita, Cyndaquil, and Totodile and famous Trainers from the Johto region. Wisdom of Sea and Sky features over 200 new cards to collect, including powerful new Pokémon ex and a plethora of stunning artwork. Take a sneak peek below at some of the cards you can expect to see in the new expansion.

name: Pokémon Quetzal
summary:
Pokemon Quetzal is a Game Boy Advance hack-ROM inspired by Pokémon Emerald, featuring an amazing multiplayer mode where you can enjoy new characters, new environments to discover, and numerous new events.

Immerse yourself in the Hoenn region, explore a magical world with a truly amazing soundtrack, and do your best to find Shiny Pokémon up to Generation VIII. Enjoy a unique experience!

name: Pokémon Stadium Club
summary: PSC acts as a "hub" to select the minigame to play. All the minigames were made from scratch in Unity Engine supporting PvP (1 vs 1, 2, or 3 players), PvE (player against AI) and EvE (AI vs AI). There are 4 difficulties available: Easy, Normal, Hard and Hyper Hard. Every playthrough ends winning either 1 coin if the player loses, or 1 * difficulty coins if the player wins. These coins can be spent in the Gachapon machine to obtain a Pokémon-toy. There are +700 collectible Pokémon toys available in PSC in regular and shiny forms, so filling the Toy-Dex won't be easy. There are more than 1500 collectibles! If you are only interest in throwing to the gacha machine, you can use the code "I WANT GACHA" to gain 2 throws for free. In addition, you get 10 coins every day!

name: Polytopia
summary: Survive, craft, and thrive in Polytopia, an open-world sandbox adventure where exploration and resourcefulness are the keys to survival.

name: Polar Shift
summary: Polar Shift is a puzzle-based escape room game where you must break out of an alien prison after an unexpected crash landing, all while you decode a foreign language, evade capture, and make bad decisions.

name: Portal: Divinity
summary: Portal: Divinity is a free community-made mod for the Valve title Portal 2, episodically released and telling the story of an alternative Aperture branch situated throughout different locations in Asia.

name: Poppet Quest
summary: Poppet Quest is an exploration based 3D Metroidvania. Play as Poppet, a murdered woman returned to life as a doll. Trapped in a toy store, cursed, and losing your sanity, you must battle through legions of toys driven mad. Can you break the curse? Can you save yourself?

name: Poligons
summary: Poligons is a strategy game, tower defense style and roguelike. Defend your Crystal from enemies, buy upgrades and fight bosses to complete the levels, unlock new Crystals with different units and abilities.

name: Polygon War
summary: In this roguelike, idle and strategy game, you're in the middle of a polygonal war, with a turret and countless enemies. Are you ready to overcome the challenges ahead?

name: Possess War
summary: We don't make games, just link new worlds. Possess War is turn-based strategy shooter game. Each player can spend turn points on each turn to take an action (move, attack, build etc). Defend the various terrains and buff areas well and eliminate all of your opponent's characters to win.

name: Popcorn Popstars
summary: Build a team of three heroes worthy of the big screen! Popcorn Popstars is a rhythm autobattler where you tap the drums to keep the beat alive. Drop the spotlight on your squad, get the crowd pumped and put on a show-stopping performance.

name: Police Officers Simulator
summary: Step into the uniform and protect the city you serve!

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 11: Adventure
summary:
Step into the primordial mists of video game history with this specially curated Polymega Collection, celebrating the groundbreaking roots of the adventure game genre. Headlined by Adventure for the Atari 2600—a pioneering title that brought the mechanics of pen-and-paper RPGs to the screen—this collection explores the eerie, imaginative, and often mind-bending early days of interactive storytelling.

Also included are other moody and quest-driven classics from the Atari 2600 era, such as the flickering fear of Haunted House, the mixed-media storytelling of the SwordQuest trilogy, and the sci-fi tension of Secret Quest, each pushing the limits of narrative and atmosphere on limited hardware. Rounding out the collection is Dracula: The Undead for the Atari Lynx, a richly animated gothic thriller that shows how the adventure genre matured by the early 1990s. Featuring Fully playable Immersive Atari 2600 and Atari 7800 retail Kiosks, this disc is more than a game collection—it’s a living museum of early digital storytelling.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 12: Tempest
summary:
Few early classic arcade games have withstood the test of time as well as the iconic TEMPEST and it continues to entertain today with its tight controls and fast paced action. This collection of early digital masterpieces features the groundbreaking arcade classic TEMPEST, playable in Polymega's special Quadrascan Vector Display mode, as well as its impressive port TEMPEST 2000 for the 64-bit Atari Jaguar, a new system now playable for the first time on Polymega.

Volume 12 also features a curated selection of other notable Atari arcade titles including Major Havoc, Black Widow, and Quantum. Or, have a taste of intense run-and-gun action with Berzerk and Frenzy, each playable with full immersive arcade mode support. For the true afficionados, there's I, Robot, an arcade game from 1984 that pushed visual boundaries for its time with its innovative polygonal 3D graphics and tight gameplay which pre-dated the 32-bit era by at least a decade.

name: Pokémon Peach Version
summary: Welcome to the Celto Region, the setting of Pokémon Peach Version, which is inspired by Ireland! The goal of our rom hack is to capture and emulate a familiar, yet new Gen 3 experience. You will journey throughout Celto, completing the gym challenge, meeting various characters, and venturing through all four seasons along the way. Some will aid you on your journey, while others may stand in your way to the top!

name: Pokémon Lime Version
summary: Welcome to the Celto Region, the setting of Pokémon Lime Version, which is inspired by Ireland! The goal of our rom hack is to capture and emulate a familiar, yet new Gen 3 experience. You will journey throughout Celto, completing the gym challenge, meeting various characters, and venturing through all four seasons along the way. Some will aid you on your journey, while others may stand in your way to the top!

name: Pokémon Blooming Beast
summary: One year ago, your gym leader title was revoked and you were forced into an early retirement. But when a new opportunity brings you to the Hallio region, you'll find yourself enveloped in a region-spanning conspiracy. Just like in any mainline game, you'll catch Pokemon and battle gym leaders, but you'll also ask questions, team up with characters, and investigate the history of the region to figure out Hallio's biggest secret: Who is the Beast?

name: Pokémon Duelist
summary: A Pokémon fan game inspired by the likes of various trading card game-based shonen anime like Yu-Gi-Oh!, Yu-Gi-Oh! GX, and Duel Masters.

name: Pokémon Potassium
summary: Pokémon Potassium is a Fan-Made game in RPG Maker XP and Essentials based around Pokémon, where a streamer makes the game. At the same time, the chat does every decision, like what New Fakemon, new items, new moves, etc. This takes place in the Banerica region and joins us in the wacky lore of the lucky Chatters that got picked to be in the game. Every chatter or viewer contributes to the game, whether you are just watching the game grow or helping with Sprites, Art, Music, and such.

name: PostScriptum
summary: Follow the steps of the protagonist, a melancholic young adult stricken by unemployment and paralyzed by a chronic care-free and lethargic attitude. His redemption-seeking and guilt-averting efforts are eventually met with a job interview, at none other than the Pokemon Couriers, a prestigious, esteemed, and highly regarded organization. Setting his sights on the future, he attempts for the last time to begin anew.

name: Pokémon Coda
summary: Pokémon Coda is a short plot-driven game focused on narrative and world-building.

name: Pokémon Beyond DX
summary:
On a planet far, far away, lies the galaxy's greatest mystery... a collection of hermetic tombs that seemingly defy all logic.
10 Standard Years ago, the tombs began to open... Unbeknowst to the people of the Pangalactic Empire, the fate of the galaxy was about to change forever.

name: Pokémon Lost World: Echoes of Eternity
Pokémon Ageless
summary: A grand adventure set in the diverse Muzon Region! At the heart of the conflict lies the sinister Team Umbra, an ancient organization obsessed with achieving immortality. Their failed attempts to harness the power of the legendary Ho-Oh resulted in the creation of Corrupted Forms—feral Pokémon mutated by experimental exposure to chemicals found in the region’s Flabébé population. Team Seraphs is a resistance group fighting to protect Muzon’s ecosystems and its people, aiming to stop the spread of these dangerous mutations. You’ll take on the role of either Carter or Grace, twin siblings from the wealthy Salone family who receive rare Pokémon from Professor Agerwood and begin a journey across the region’s eight gyms. Along the way, you'll face rivals like Micah, meet allies such as the former Hoenn Champion Raisen, and unravel the truth behind Team Umbra’s century-long legacy.

name: Pokémon: A Star in the Desert
summary: A new adventure heats up in the world of Pokémon, with yourself starring as one!

name: Pokémon Decay
summary:
Pokémon Decay is supposed to be a best of the first four generations.
It's intended to give the player as much nostalgia as possible by referring to the storylines of the old games.

Due to natural disasters the four regions Kanto, Johto, Hoenn and Sinnoh collided and became one big Region, the Talem Region.
The player wakes up and can't remember what happened. He has to find out what caused those natural disasters.

name: Pokémon Sors 2
summary: The International Police has set its foot in Hupest after the events of Pokémon Sors. Siara's staff was arrested and the organization was disbanded, Asher's group wasn't safe from law either. While Asher and Valora did not face any charges, Jackson (Asher's father) and Prof. Ivo were facing charges, however due to a deal between Asher and the IP they were given a pardon, in return of their knowledge of Eclipsing, support in research and Asher's Eclipsing related artifacts. 3 years later in Aclyn (the International Police's main HQ's location), the IP is organizing a new ITP Group after the collapse of the trio from Pokémon Saiph 2. Micah left the police and his location is unknown, and Darlo was laid off due to the Regris incident. Lori is tasked with organizing and leading a new, larger ITP Group. Around the same time Asher decided to break his deal with the IP and raided Aclyn's HQ to steal the artifacts. His reasons and motives are unknown to the police. Due to these turn of events, a young citizen of Aclyn, Rene/Haru decides to become a cadet in Lori's new ITP Group at the International Police, and a year later they become an official cadet. Will they be able to climb the ranks? Will they become part of something bigger than what they ever imagined? Find out in Pokémon Sors 2!

name: Pokémon HeartGold Generations
summary: Hack-Rom of Pokemon HeartGold, a project featuring Gens 1-9 Pokemon, modern mechanics like nature changing, and other QoL features using HG-Engine

name: Poly Plaza Ultimate
summary: An open-world entrepreneurial sandbox game. Sell resources, purchase properties, become rich. Includes all the DLC's and new content from Poly Plaza!

name: Podvodsk
summary: A game about building an underwater city. Drag & drop building schematics in the top right corner to build them, each schematic costing different number of points. Try to get as deep as possible!

name: Poker Crush
summary: A fast-paced 2D puzzle game where you swap cards horizontally or vertically to form poker hands like pairs, straights, and flushes. Cards clear when matched, new ones fall from above, and you can chain combos for massive points and multipliers.

name: Potionomics: Boss Finn Content Pack
summary:
Meet the handsome shark of Rafta in a whole new way.

This DLC includes the following new content for Boss Finn:

・A new dedicated relationship path

・New cards for Sylvia to use when haggling with her potion shop customers

・New "life coach" vendor that grants various timed haggle buffs and debuffs

"I'm just a bunch of hot air in the form of a sexy, sophisticated shark man!"

name: Ponchyo: A Platypus Adventure
summary: Ponchyo: A Platypus Adventure is a charming 3D platformer collectathon full of adventure - and a hint of nostalgia! Play as Ponchyo the platypus and journey through a variety of vibrant worlds. Collect coins and discover new furniture to decorate your home.

name: Polyopolis
summary: Stamp out a thriving city by fitting shapes into a ever-changing grid to attain the most resources. Chain buildings to boost energy, people and products, gain gold coins, and unlock rare stamps in this zen-meets-strategy city builder.

name: Pokémon Royal Sapphire
summary:
Pokémon Royal Sapphire is a Heavy Enhancement-Reimagined Version of Pokémon Sapphire
Pokemon Royal Sapphire has the same Generation 3 Mechanics and General Dex, as well as the Story beats remaining in a similar path to Sapphire. All maps, encounters, trainers, learnsets, and the general story are changed.

name: Possum Boy!: The Ballad of Joey Virginia
summary: POSSUM BOY! is a romantic comedy visual novel about finding friendship, finding yourself, and maybe even finding love... when you're the only animal person around!

name: PowerWash Simulator: Ultimate Satisfaction Bundle
summary:
With 100 levels combined, this bundle is sure to keep you washing for a while! The Ultimate Satisfaction Bundle includes every level released for PowerWash Simulator to date – from in-universe content to collaborations with other beloved franchises, such as SpongeBob SquarePants, Wallace & Gromit, Shrek and more! It’s a real hum-ding-er!

Huge, Expanded Campaign

Explore everything Muckingham has to offer with over 50 levels set in the messiest town around. As well as the base game campaign, there are Bonus Jobs, Seasonal Specials and several instalments of ‘The Muckingham Files’ to relax and unwind with. Clean up the town, uncover its mysteries and get to know the local clientele!

Wash and Explore Iconic Locations

Plus, immerse yourself in campaigns set within the worlds of SpongeBob SquarePants, Back to the Future, Warhammer 40,000, Alice in Wonderland, Shrek, Wallace & Gromit, Tomb Raider and Final Fantasy. With environments lovingly recreated in immense detail, you’re sure to discover new details and lore from your favourite fictional universes beneath the muck.

name: Pokemon Azure Platinum
summary:
This game makes you rediscover the Sinnoh Region while incorporating elements of the anime series and by making the game harder to give a bigger challenge to the player.
In this new adventure, you play as a Pokémon trainer that has the goal of becoming the Pokemon Master of the Sinnoh Region.
During your adventure, you will meet many friends, rivals and enemies as well as stronger and rarer Pokemon.

name: Power of the Horde
summary: Power of the Horde is a single-player RTS with RPG elements. Its key feature is that hero equipment is permanently retained, so the goal isn’t just to destroy the enemy base. Players can loot new items in each skirmish or campaign — like playing an RPG within an RTS.

name: Poolside Boys Kiss: Passion Fruits Hotel Dating Sim
summary: Flirt at the pool and unlock exclusive images. Jump in and start the fun!

name: Pogoman
summary: POGOMAN is a fast-paced physics platformer where you navigate tough, nerve-wracking levels on a pogostick. Master cool maneuvers, unlock abilities, and survive intense challenges as you bounce through unique biomes. Precision and timing are everything. Oh, and don`t get hit in the head.

name: Poolside Girls Kiss: Passion Fruits Hotel Dating Sim
Pokerchinko
summary: Pokerchinko is an old-school pachinko game. Your goal is to use your skills of precision to snag the card that makes the best poker hand. The better the hand, the better the rewards. Feel the tension as the balls bounce wildly around the playfield and the exhilaration of landing a fantastic hand.

name: Polychrome
summary: Turn-based RPG on which you have to find the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Secluded Springs
summary: Dive into the Secluded Springs in the upcoming Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket expansion, where you just might encounter the Legendary Pokémon Raikou, Entei, and Suicune—or many other Pokémon originally discovered in the Johto region. Some Pokémon from the Hoenn region will be popping up as well. Find as many as you can when Secluded Springs launches on Wednesday, August 27, 2025, at 11:00 p.m. PDT.

name: PolyRoyale
summary: Jump, Land, Fight! Immerse yourself in the world of Battle Royale and Endless Deathmatch on diverse PolyRoyale maps. Whether you play solo, as a duo, or in a squad, you have a plethora of weapons at your disposal. However, in the end, only one can emerge as the victor!

name: Pop'n Music Jam&Fizz
summary: Pop'n Music Jam&Fizz is the 30th main installment of the Pop'n Music series, featuring a vibrant festival theme with new character designs and upbeat rhythm gameplay.

name: PotDuckRun
summary: Escape from the pot by eating as many apples as you can. Bonk the trees to make the apples fall down, but look out for the sly hedgehog.

name: Portal Advance
summary: Portal clone for Game Boy Advance.

name: Pokemon Roulette
summary: Try to become a Pokemon Champion in this pure luck-based game.

name: Pogo Up!
summary: All you have is a pogo stick. You must reach the top. There's no reason. But go up anyway.

name: Pocket Nook
summary:
Build your dream nook — one pixel at a time!
Ever wished you could turn a tiny room into a perfect little hideaway?
In Pocket Nook, you design charming spaces in cozy pixel art — shifting the layout, placing furniture, and keeping everything neat and clean!

name: Pokemon Lightning Yellow
summary: Mod of Pokémon Fire Red altered to be like Pokémon Yellow for the original Game Boy

name: Pocket Spouse
summary: Choose From Eight Unique Spouses. Explore Your New Luxury Homestead And Farmland. Explore Your New Island Home. Complete With Guilds And A Castle. Explore The Deep Woods And Open Beaches. Seek The Hunters Guild And Their Fabled Bestiary. You Never Know What You might Find!

name: Poppy Kart 2
summary: Poppy Kart 2 is a galactic racing game in a pixelated world!

name: Polku!
summary: A marble popper for the Playdate console

name: Polyjump
summary: Polyjump is a fast-paced indie platformer where you play as a small sphere jumping through different low-poly worlds. Master 3D and 2D levels, beat the clock, and climb the leaderboards with your best runs.

name: PokeNade Monster Ball
summary: A virtual pet modeled around a Poké Ball with many different Pokémon to be taken care of.

name: Pokémon Pokopia
summary: Pokémon’s first life simulation game, Pokémon Pokopia, will release on Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026. Playing as a Ditto that has transformed to look like a human, you can collect wood, rocks, and other crafting materials to create a cozy home. Ditto can learn moves from other Pokémon and utilize those moves to help build your very own Pokémon paradise. For example, Ditto can use Bulbasaur’s Leafage to add greenery to the landscape or Squirtle’s Water Gun to hydrate plants. By creating a lush, welcoming environment, more Pokémon will visit.

name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A - Mega Dimension
summary: Mysterious distortions have appeared without warning in Lumiose City. They seem to connect to a space known as Hyperspace Lumiose...and the mythical Pokémon Hoopa might have some part to play.

name: Potion Permit: Christmas Tree
summary:
Customise your room with:
• Christmas Tree

name: Potions of Veldenkeep
summary: Run your own alchemist shop in the fantasy City of Adventurers! Grow plants, brew potions, set prices, and serve curious villagers. Earn gold, build reputation, and expand your craft in this cozy first-person herbalist simulator.

name: Pong Pong Crows
summary: Pong Pong Crows is a brick breaker game, featured a squad of bouncing crows and Chinese zombies. Complete stages with power-ups, beat other players on leaderboards, create and share levels using workshop!

name: Pokémon Añil: Definitive Edition
summary: Is an updated version of the popular fan game Pokémon Indigo created by EricLostie. This enhanced version was created by DPertierra and Skyflyer, and brings numerous improvements to the game.

name: Pocket Garden
summary: Pocket Garden is a super cute little indie game where you can build the coziest gardens and have the best time ever! No worries about resources, fighting, or health. Just sit back, relax, and enjoy!

name: Pokemon Masters Stadium
summary:
Overview
Pokémon Masters Stadium is a comprehensive gameplay overhaul that blends modern Pokémon mechanics with the classic first-generation style. The goal is to deliver a more balanced, competitive, and feature-rich experience while keeping the authentic Stadium feel.

Key Features
Updated Battle Mechanics

Gen-1-style EVs and IVs with refined balance

Ghost-type moves categorized as Special

New moves imported from later generations

Steel and Fairy types fully integrated

Sleep and Freeze status reworked (Freeze now has a 40 % thaw chance)

Full paralysis chance reduced to 10 %

Rental & Difficulty Enhancements

Balanced rentals for fairer match-ups

Elite Four and Champion battles upgraded to 6-vs-6

Overall difficulty improved for a true endgame challenge

Mew and Mewtwo available in all rental modes

Interface & Quality of Life

Redesigned UI with detailed menu information

Type and attack sprites for better visual feedback

Quick-scroll rentals: Press L to jump to the start, R to jump to the end

Additional Tweaks

Ditto transforms automatically

Custom type-effectiveness chart

Custom base-stat adjustments for better balance

Guest appearances from well-known Pokétubers and trainers from other generations

Enjoy a fresh, modern take on the classic Stadium battles—whether you’re challenging the Gym Leader Castle, climbing the Elite Four, or testing the new mechanics in free battle modes.

name: Poly Puzzle: Birds
summary: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with birds.

name: PolClash
summary: This is a 2D Brawler. Select from up to 3 iconic Australian locations for you and a friend (co-op) to brawl it out with past prime ministers. Select from past prime ministers such as Julia, John, Kevin and Tony.

name: Poor Piggy Pirate
summary: Oink Oink, Sailor! Steer your cute piggy (and many other critters) through wild waters and watch out for the wild bunny pirates! Oh, and don't forget to collect as many delicious fruits as you can. Arrrrrr!

name: Poly-Vinyl Pests!
summary: Poly-Vinyl Pests! takes place many years in the future, where humans are long gone but plastics still litter the earth. Play as two ants from rival colonies in this twin-stick shooter to both squash plastic-laden pests and to prove the superiority of your colony!

name: Posledniy Den' v Uryupinske
summary: The Last Day in Uryupinsk is an atmospheric walk through the post-Soviet courtyard to depressive music. Here, as in reality, there is nothing fun. Your only activity is walking. You will slowly walk from side to side and explore this completely ordinary, but still amazing place in its own way. An authentic Russian apartment with wool carpets, an uncomfortable bed and an old TV is waiting for you. After getting out of the apartment, you will find yourself in a classic Russian courtyard, with a destroyed playground, rusty garages and crooked fences.

name: Power
summary: POWER is a moddable multiplayer FPS. Our community can create, share, and play endless content using the full power of Unreal Engine 4.

name: Poker Loafer
summary: A Blackjack game that amuses you in working hours. Its game interface will remain fully transparent unless hovered by mouse. No full-screen, no BGM. Win high scores, and don’t get caught. Good luck.

name: Potyguara Verse
summary: Explore Natal in an immersive way! Discover iconic tourist spots, participate in cultural events, and connect with players from around the world in an interactive and engaging Virtual Reality experience.

name: Power the Future
summary: Power the Future is a strategy game that allows you to take control of Germany, the USA, China, India, Australia, Japan or the UK and guide them into the future. You will work to satisfy each nation's power needs and growth by developing technology and harnessing power from around the world.

name: Potato Game. Trilogy
summary: It's the Screaming Potato Head against other-worldly creatures in the loudest adventure ever conceived!

name: Porn Pizza Delivery Boy
summary: Become a pizza delivery guy and go through an adventure known only from adult movies.

name: Polycore
summary: Certainly not another rage platformer.

name: Polyarmory: High Calibre Love
summary: The world's only fully-loaded conspiracy theorist gun-nut dating simulation.

name: PongBang
summary:
PONGBANG is a digital board game inspired by Russian roulette, reimagined with a fun and strategic twist. Players take turns surviving high-stakes rounds while using item cards to prank, sabotage, or protect themselves. The last player standing wins the game.

A thrilling mix of luck, bluffing, and backstabbing — PONGBANG is perfect for parties and chaotic game nights.

name: Potion Permit: Lunar New Year Lantern
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Potion Permit: Oriental Folding Wall
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Potion Permit: Red Flower Arrangement
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Poetic Trio
summary: A game about rain, a game about snow, and a game about wind. All in one.

name: Port Authority
summary: Port Authority is a real-time harbor management game where you draw routes guiding cargo ships to color-matched docks. Navigate increasingly chaotic traffic through harbors inspired by real-world locations as more vessels arrive. One collision ends it all. How many containers can you deliver?

name: Pokémon: Advanced Adventure
summary: In Advanced Adventure, Gary Oak is a tyrannical overlord and you must stop him by defeating his 8 subordinates, genetically modified Pokemon called tyrant Pokémon. You can play as either Ash Ketchum or Misty.

name: Pose Crush: Waifu Edition
summary: Fast-paced pose-matching game. Test your reflexes in provocative and charming visual challenges.

name: Potatogeddon
summary: Take on the role of a potato and become a hero! Explore generated levels, develop skills, fight against enemies. Play solo or gather a team. The potato revolution is waiting for you! Take up the challenge in Potatogeddon and prove that the potato is king!

name: Pop! Slots
summary: A social slots app unlike any other, POP! Slots is as good as it gets. Group games, shared jackpots, and personal avatars make this fan-favorite app endlessly engaging—while vibrant graphics, an energetic look-and-feel, and features like a virtual Vegas Strip take the gaming experience to the next-level. If you love to spin, play, and win with friends, POP! Slots is the game for you.

name: Polyglot Language Learning Quiz
summary: Learn French, German, Italian, Lithuanian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese & Korean like a polyglot!

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Deluxe pack ex
summary: Get ready to get fancy—the Deluxe Pack ex expansion is coming to Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket, and it’s introducing a new pack that is guaranteed to include one card with a rarity of ♦♦♦♦ or higher from previous expansions, from Genetic Apex to Wisdom of Sea and Sky. You’ll also be able to collect “parallel foil” cards with a unique shine effect and previously released cards with brand-new artwork!

name: Poem for the Caged
summary: You wake in a monster’s cage with no memory and 30 days to act. Choose to escape, obey, or become its favorite.

name: Poppidemic
summary: A fast-paced action-roguelike. Quickly identify and eliminate the infected balloons, draft new hazards between rounds, and spend your gold wisely to build a strong roster.

name: Powerful Courses
summary: A good game for learning and self-development. Here you will find a lot of interesting and useful things.

name: Poket Legion
summary: This game is a battle simulator. You can freely place hundreds of characters and have them fight automatically. There are three types of characters in total, and you can create up to four teams. You can freely set attack mode and defense mode.

name: Potion Permit: Rudolph Plush
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Potion Permit: Snowman Plush Toy
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Poo Poo War
summary: This is a combat shooting game, but it also has AI monsters. You can also create your own host to pass the level alone. The way to win is to defeat the enemy and reach the designated location.

name: Police Chase Simulator: Highway Racers Pursuit
summary: Get ready for thrilling chases and intense moments in Police Pursuit Highway Cop Patrol Interceptor— a game where law and order clash with crime! Become part of an elite police unit and dive into a world filled with adrenaline, speed, and mind-blowing maneuvers.

name: PointWorks
summary: In the world of PointWorks, you play as a biped robot named 'Robot 27', your only goal is to navigate through a series of 7 obstacles, and complete this parkour test in a grey, neon and geometric dimension called 'The Grid'.

name: Pollution Game
summary: Pollution Game is a simulation game in the vein of Hamurabi. The player has been elected premier of the Setats Detinu, a small communist island. It's up to the player to make decisions on the country's budget so that it can be distributed to countrymen and the treasury. The player must try to keep the country running for eight years without being kicked out of office.

name: Pondemonium
summary: A puzzle-platformer where three ducks (Chuck, Mac, and Peggy) combine their unique abilities to recover eggs, cleanse poisoned ponds and outsmart traps across handcrafted levels.

name: Pohmielisko
summary: A grotesque retro-style FPP horror set in a typical Polish apartment block from the 90s. A pixelated shader blends with Lumen’s realistic lighting to create a one-of-a-kind atmosphere. Absurd humor intertwines with macabre moments and choices you’d never want to make.

name: Pocket Math
summary: In Pocket Math you are given 4 numbers and 4 functions. You must use all the numbers and 3 functions to create equations resulting in 1 and 20.

name: Potion Permit: Lucky Cat Statue
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Pond Guardian
summary: Pond Guardian is a vertically scrolling shoot'em up feauturing dodging, shooting, and a parry/deflect system.

name: Potat
summary: Potat is a quirky, physics-based 3D adventure where you play as a sentient potato trying to escape a house before you get cooked alive. Roll, flip, and flop your way through a bizarre home filled with deadly traps, chaotic layouts, and unexpected obstacles.

name: Pokémon MarioRed
summary: A romhack of Pokemon Fire Red that replaces the Pokemon and some characters with Mario characters!

name: Pokémon LuigiGreen
summary: A romhack of Pokemon Leaf Green that replaces the Pokemon and some characters with Mario characters!

name: PonPonTown
summary: A pachinko-style idle game that stays on the side of your screen while you are doing other things. Unlock and collect more marble creatures to earn coins, continually upgrade your village and pachinko tables to accelerate growth. Build the beloved Village!

name: Pomelo & Friends: Sevilla
summary: Pomelo and his friends have hidden away in sunny Seville! Explore five iconic hand-drawn locations and find 101 different dogs in this colorful hidden object game.

name: Poly Frenzy
summary: Poly Frenzy is a fast-paced roguelike shooter: 5 classes with perks and progression, 10 maps, Classic & Survival modes. Loot pistols, rifles, shotguns, flamethrowers and grenades, upgrade your stats, and fight solo or in coop for leaderboard glory!

name: Powwow Bound: A Menominee Homecoming
summary: Experience the story of a Menominee family reconnecting with their tribal culture and language through the lens of the Menominee Annual Contest Powwow.

name: Pogo Panic
summary: Pogo Panic is a difficult, Parkour Adventure. Bounce on a pogo stick, ignite a fleeting jetpack, and vault through space. One slip-jump takes you back to the start—no checkpoints. Fail, rebound, and master the sky one desperate hop at a time.

name: Portal Hunter
summary:
Portal Hunter is a fast paced, side scrolling, arcade-style space-shooter webgame with
Solana integration from Flux Inc.

Disclosure for HuntingPortals.com: HuntingPortals.com incorporates optional blockchain-based gaming features, including NFTs and cryptocurrency rewards. These allow players to earn and trade digital assets, but participation is entirely voluntary. There is no obligation to use a wallet or engage with crypto—a free-to-play mode is available for all users who prefer a traditional gaming experience.

Users should be aware that digital assets may fluctuate in value and are subject to market risks. Ownership of NFTs does not guarantee utility or value outside the game. Additionally, the regulatory landscape around crypto gaming is evolving, and users are responsible for managing their own wallets and security.

name: Pond
summary: Build. Customize. Relax. Create your own peaceful fish pond and watch it come alive, piece by piece. Shape the terrain and decorate your pond the way you like. Place fish and see them swim around in their new home. No stress—just a soothing world where you can enjoy the beauty of nature.

name: Poppy Playtime 5
summary:
Face off against the deadly puppetmaster behind the horrifying events of Playtime Co.

In the latest terrifying chapter of the Poppy Playtime saga, you are propelled further into the gruesome depths of the factory, with Playtime’s security system Huggy Wuggy in hot pursuit.

Abandoned by your only allies, your fight for survival gets all the more challenging as you race further into the abyss that is His domain.

Here, shadows whisper, and the puppet master who lords over this realm pulls the strings of madness. Can you stand against evil and finally put an end to this nightmare? Every bloody move forward will test your resolve as you uncover secrets years in the making.

name: Polybomber
summary: Drop bombs. Survive. Extract. Upgrade. Repeat. Polybomber is a fast-paced arcade game packed with increasingly chaotic polygon battles.

name: Polandball: The Black Apocalypse
summary: This game blends Polandball's dark humor with psychological horror and survival combat. Scavenge limited resources (food, medicine, weapons, parts) to stay alive, fend off monsters with diverse arsenals. Every second of survival is a hard-won luxury – survive until you unveil the truth.

name: PooPig
summary: Shoot, dodge, and chase your acorns in this absurd, cartoon-style Bullethell filled with humor and visual gags.

name: Pocket Gecko
summary: A cute gecko lives on your screen! Capture bugs, keep them for special bonuses or sell them to buy upgrades and customize your gecko. Watch it wiggle while you work or play!

name: Potting Paradise
summary:
Live out your gardening dreams in this micro-greenhouse vegetable-clicker game.

Potting Paradise is your personal 'lil greenhouse. that fits perfectly snuggly on your desktop or web-browser. Watch the plants grow and throw the pots around till they align perfectly in they way you want them. This is your space to do whatever you want with, handcraft the perfect little digital garden till your heart's content!

name: Polaria
summary: Polarium is a relaxing idle game set in the serene world of Antarctica. Discover peaceful marine life, learn about polar ecosystems, and find comfort in nature. Inspired by real research, the game blends healing gameplay with subtle messages on climate and biodiversity.

name: Polterparty
summary: Spooky McGee invites you to the Polterparty! Polterparty is a 4 player online co-op horror game with minigames. A haunted mansion filled with deadly entities awaits, and it’s up to you and your friends to survive the night by outsmarting supernatural.

name: Pone
summary: A co-op survival horror game where you and your closest friends must work together to survive in an upside down world crawling with the infected.

name: Post Apocalypse Microbe Lab
summary: Leave the game on and watch Lyse work in a post-apocalyptic world on the corner of your desktop. Her job is to collect microbe samples; your job is to lend a hand when you can.

name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A: Additional Story Content
Pony's Sky Journey
summary: Fly through rainbow skies and chase the stars! Guide a cheerful pony across dazzling rainbow tracks, dodge clouds, and soar toward the highest score in this colorful endless runner!

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Mega Rising
summary: Get ready, Trainers! Mega Evolution Pokémon ex debut in Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket’s upcoming expansion, Mega Rising, launching on October 29, 2025, at 11:00 p.m. PDT! The expansion features three booster packs: Mega Gyarados, Mega Blaziken, and Mega Altaria, each including powerful Mega Evolution Pokémon ex cards with illustrations that feel like they pop right out of the screen

name: Polandball Go
summary:
Collect and recruit countryballs, gather resources, and claim real-world territories. Build your alliance, upgrade your nations, and explore your city!

Polandball GO – Collect, Explore, Conquer!

Step into a location-based adventure where the world becomes your playground. In Polandball GO, you’ll explore real-world locations, gather resources, and recruit your favorite countryballs to build the ultimate collection.

name: Pokedex-Accurate Dual-Type Pokemon Personality Test
summary: A first-of-its-kind personality test to discover your Pokémon dual typing, powered by Bulbapedia.

name: Pokémon Heart & Soul
summary: Pokémon Heart & Soul brings the classic Johto Region and its iconic story to the world of modern GBA decomp hacking. Built on the Modern Emerald decomp, this project offers a fresh take on the GSC/HGSS experience, blending key aspects of the Gen 2 and Gen 4 games, while incorporating many modern QoL features, as well as some familiar Gen 3 mechanics. Not only is Heart & Soul (HnS) a first-of-its-kind, fully completed, playtested, and largely faithful GSC remake / HGSS demake, it's also completely open source, and is intended to be a base for a new generation of Johto rom hacks.

name: Pot
summary: Pot!: Random adventure game. Move/roll to avoid dangers, navigate levels. Start with a unique pot to break obstacles, defeat enemies. Choose routes, collect modules/Bo Coins for items, strengthen your pot and win!

name: Poorer Art
summary: An arg puzzle horror game that starts inside a Patreon account

name: Pokémon Hearth
summary: Pokémon Hearth is a cozy vanilla-like adventure through an ancient Japan inspired setting. Explore the Toku region and save it from a mysterious spreading decay, traveling through forests, oceans, mountains and volcanoes! Pokémon Hearth is a rom hack of Pokémon Emerald by Doodle.

name: Pokémon Goita
summary:
Pokémon GOITA is a mobile game based on the traditional Japanese board game "GOITA".
Featuring first-generation Pokémon, the game's objective is to teach how to play GOITA.

name: Poly Plaza 2
summary: Buy properties for passive income, explore a thriving city for rare resources, and hustle through jobs to build your empire in this open-world business RPG with idle game progression.

name: Pokémon Thief Ruby
summary:
Play through the original Rubystory with a twist--you can steal trainers' Pokémon.
This project was made using the the pokeruby decompilation project, and its source code can be found here: https://github.com/huderlem/pokeruby-thief

Rules:
1. Poke Balls, Great Balls, and Ultra Balls are now named Thief Balls, Robber Balls, and Burglar Balls.
2. You can capture trainers' Pokémon using those balls. (Stealing is not allowed in Double Battles.)
3. You cannot capture wild Pokémon.
4. Your Pokémon do not gain experience.

name: Pocket Lord
summary: Pocket Lord is a strategy RPG for mobile devices.

name: Poker Battle
summary: Origin & Inspiration‌: Derived from the Chinese fable "‌The Race of Tian Ji's Horses‌". Light strategy 3D card game. Top-down perspective. Turn-based gameplay. Compares poker card numbers. Players control all actions through ‌mouse clicks‌. Offers a joyful gaming experience.

name: Pop Pop Potato
summary:
Pop Pop Potato is a rage game + 2D platformer where you blast yourself up the level with explosive corn kernels instead of jumping.

You lose control in the air, so wherever you land, that's it, even if it's the bottom of the level.

name: Popucom: Too Many Clothes Pack
summary: Fashion Without Limits!

name: Popucom x Arknights Collab Outfit Pack
Pogui
summary: Pogui is a short and charming platformer about a dreamy pug trapped in a nightmare. Travel through 5 worlds filled with creative levels, dozens of different enemies and unique mechanics to help Pogui wake up, if he can escape the entity that imprisoned him in his own dream!

name: Pongerground
summary:
Pongerground is an arcade game that blends classic Pong mechanics with pinball-style elements and environmental obstacles. Players control Sunset as they progress through 13 levels, each featuring unique layouts, bumpers, hazards, and gameplay twists.

The game offers two sides, Side A and Side B. Completing Side A unlocks the more challenging Side B, providing increased difficulty and new patterns to master. Pongerground also supports achievements, encouraging completion and skill-based goals.

After finishing a run, players can view their score, run time, and attempt to beat their previous records through replay. The game is designed for short, replayable sessions with a focus on precision and progression.

name: Poko's Artic Quest
summary:
Join Poko on a frosty and challenging adventure!

Winter is coming, and the little penguin Poko needs to gather enough fish to survive the cold! Use your logic and planning to push blocks, open paths, and collect all the fish across 30 carefully designed levels inspired by classic puzzle games.

Travel through two charming environments the icy Iceberg and the snowy Forest each bringing new challenges that will test your reasoning and warm your heart.

name: Poolscape
summary: Poolscape is a retro reimagining of the Poolrooms, evoking the nostalgia of classic PSX games by immersing players in the iconic liminal space with authentic ’90s-styled visuals and atmosphere.

name: Pop to Win
summary: In this Plinko-style roguelike, you'll send your ball through a board of pegs to rack up points. Harness the magical powers of a variety of unique items to boost your score output. Use these items to craft diverse and creative strategies, pushing your scores beyond limits.

name: Pokémon Super Mystery Dungeon: Echoes of Yesterday
summary:
There exist many different organizations in the Pokémon World, one of these being the Expedition Society from Lively Town. They go on expeditions all around the world, scouting up unknown places, filling the World Map and helping Pokémon in need.
One day, a certain rumor reaches Ampharos's ears, and soon thereafter the whole group embarks on an expedition to the Grass Continent. Archen, their newest member, is both excited and nervous.
What challenges will be waiting there? Will they have what it takes to solve the mystery? They will have to work with new and old friends.
Join the members of the Expedition Society on this little adventure taking place before the events of Super Mystery Dungeon!
(You can try this hack even if you haven't played it, it's spoiler free!)

name: Polaris
summary: Polaris is a casual game, where you tasked to overcome the level, using 2 synchronously moving circles and sent to the next level!

name: Postal: Bullet Paradise
summary: Postal: Bullet Paradise is a cooperative bullet-hell shooter set in the Postal universe where players select characters from throughout the series. Players collect makeshift weapons, enhance their arsenal, and face waves of enemies either solo or with others online in fast-paced, chaos-driven combat.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 15: Body Harvest
summary:
Rediscover a bold era of experimentation with this Polymega Collection, headlined by Body Harvest—the ambitious N64 action-adventure from the studio that would eventually perfect open world game design with legendary GTA franchise. Long celebrated for its ahead-of-its-time blend of open-world exploration, vehicle-hopping chaos, and sprawling sci-fi storytelling, Body Harvest stands here as a fascinating milestone in the evolution of modern game design.

Complementing the main attraction is a curated selection of 32-bit gems that showcase the energetic, anything-goes creativity of the era, including the futuristic combat racer S.C.A.R.S., the high seas vehicular combat game Dead in the Water, and the high-speed racing game Burning Road. Together, they form a compact but evocative snapshot of late-’90s gaming—colorful, experimental, and refreshingly unpolished in all the right ways.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 16: A Boy and His Blob
summary:
Bite into a slice of gaming history with this Polymega Collection DVD, highlighted by A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia, the whimsical puzzle-platform classic that taught an entire generation the art of jellybean-based problem-solving. This offbeat adventure—following a young boy and his shape-shifting companion on a journey to liberate the candy-colored world of Blobolonia—earned lasting admiration for its imaginative setting, gentle storytelling, and the clever, almost storybook logic behind every transformation.

Rounding out the collection is a varied lineup of classic titles licensed by Ziggurat Interactive: the post-apocalyptic real-time strategy and hybrid mech-shooting action of KKND2: Krossfire and Uprising X on PS1, the tactical naval skirmishes of Gunboat for TG16, and the mesmerizing charm of Super Solitaire for the SNES. Together, these titles create a compact, multi-era selection that adds meaningful variety and depth to any Polymega Collection!

name: Polygun Arena: Online Shooter
summary:
Polygun Arena is a casual first-person multiplayer 3D shooter with cartoon graphics and fun gameplay.

Play an addictive online first-person shooter action game with friends and other players online!

Fight in thrilling battles & frag pro enemies in this online FPS Polygun Arena shooter.

The best casual shooting war games experience in the arena. Call your best shooter and combat on the war.

If you like Online Shooter, Multiplayer PVP ,Single Player FPS and to be a sniper, so this Multiplayer Shooting game is for you

Perfect stylized graphics and high quality optimization for every mobile device.

DOWNLOAD now for Free!

name: Pou 3D
summary: Do you have what it takes to take care of your very own alien pet?! Feed it, clean it, play with it and watch it grow up!

name: Pokemon Jupiter
summary: Pokémon Jupiter Version is a project that has been in the works since July of 2008. It is a hack of Pokémon Ruby and it is my first hacking project, however, I've made substantial progress in the months working on this hack.​

name: Potions, Please!
summary: A cosy alchemy shop sim with a hint of RPG, a spoonful of sentient mushrooms, a dash of naughty llamas and a generous helping of morbid humour thanks to your late Aunty, who is patiently awaiting her resurrection from six feet under.

name: Poubelle City
summary: Poubelle City: Dive into a vibrant and offbeat metropolis where the raw energy of the streets meets authenticity! Explore iconic locations and feel the rhythm of the legendary night with DJ Aye-Aye!

name: Police Detective: Tokyo Beat
summary: Gather evidence, interview suspects and send your case to trial. Have you got what it takes to be Tokyo's top detective?

name: Pollinate or Die
summary: Pollinate or Die is a fast-paced action roguelite set in the hazardous wastelands left behind by humanity. As one of the last surviving bumblebees, you alone can revive Earth's flora. Fight through swarms of enemies as you search for flowers to pollinate and bring life back to the planet.

name: Porters
summary: Porters is a hilarious 2-4 player co-op platformer! As porters, carry crates, furniture, and quirky items through obstacle-filled levels. Work in sync, don’t lose your arms, and try to deliver everything intact. Can you handle the chaos?

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Crimson Blaze
summary: Are you ready to welcome more Mega Evolution Pokémon ex to your collection, Trainers? Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket’s upcoming expansion, Crimson Blaze, launches on Tuesday, December 16, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. PST. Mega Charizard Y ex leads the charge, with Mega Venusaur ex and Mega Blastoise ex also making their Pokémon TCG Pocket debuts with cards featuring illustrations that feel like they pop right out of the screen.

name: Pokémon Relict
summary:
A SHORT RPG Maker project that combines the gameplay of Mystery World with the official battle system.
The main theme revolves around Arceus and its tables.
Originally developed in English alongside a Spanish version

name: Pokemon: Too Many Types 2
summary: Too Many Types 2 is a sequel to our silly little reskin hack, Too Many Types. This time around, the Hoenn region has undergone many different changes to make this a unique experience!

name: Power Chips
summary: Power Chips is a love letter to classic 2D 16-bit platforming and shooter games where every boss you beat gives you a new ability

name: PokéPath TD
summary:
PokéPath TD is a Pokémon Tower Defense game! Manage your team and defend against waves of enemies across 9 different routes.

Level up your Pokémon and evolve them to make them stronger and survive even tougher waves. Your Pokémon’s progress is saved even if you lose, every defeat brings you one step closer to victory. Explore different paths freely without losing progress on your current route, and use Auto Mode to farm while you’re AFK.

Try different team setups in different areas. If you get stuck on a map, switch up your strategy and bring out those Pokémon that have been gathering dust in your PC box.

Complete all the paths and take down every Legendary Pokémon!

name: Pop Pixie
summary: Infiltrate the Mentoes Tower, avenge the death of your father, and bring Mr Mentoe’s dark secrets to light in this top-down, story-driven shooter.

name: Poker: Texas & Omaha Hold'em
summary:
Your Handheld Casino Experience
No matter if it's your first time playing poker, or you’re a seasoned veteran, with this game you will sharpen your skills and experience the thrill of winning big at the poker table!

You can play with AI or up to 6 players in local multiplayer mode. There are five difficulty levels, and lots of customization features:

- Custom Blinds
- Round time limit
- Shop with over 20 different tables, floors, and table materials
- 10 card artwork styles to choose from
- Player avatars

… and more! Check it out and enjoy a crash course in probability, psychology, and game theory.

name: Powerwash Simulator 2: Adventure Time Pack
summary: What time is it?! The new Adventure Time Pack is set to bring the Ooo to PowerWash Simulator TwOoo. Grab your friends and blast away grime from distant lands or clean up the wreckage of the world as a solo adventurer in five jobs from the world of Adventure Time the fun will never end!

name: Poobo
summary: A fast-paced action roguelike where you play as a tiny and adorable poop fighting off bacteria. Upgrade your weapons and items to escape the toilet and claim victory!

name: Portal Hopper
summary: A story-driven 2D JRPG–platformer about a lost squid navigating a fracturing multiverse, guided by a mysterious voice and forced to confront fate, and the cost of breaking an endless cycle.

name: Poly Memory: Furries 2
summary: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with furries.

name: PokAidle: The Everfall Chronicles
summary:
The Kanto Region... Reimagined as an Infinite Dungeon.

Dive into a nostalgic yet fresh experience where Generation 1 meets Idle RPG.
The "Everfall" phenomenon has twisted the world, turning familiar routes into endless gauntlets. Can you build the perfect team to conquer infinity?

name: Poolside Vigil
summary: Based on a true story. Navigate through ever-changing pools where the path can never be memorized. Solve puzzles with physics-based interactions and survive the entity on your trail. Experience the grim consequences of phone addiction. Can you solve the mystery of that fateful day?

name: PolyGunner
summary: PolyGunner is a simple single player FPS game. You have 2 weapons, but a limited amount of ammo. Battle with incoming enemies, collect ammo from enemies, prepare for the next battle to come.

name: Pocket Waifu: Desktop Pet
summary: Elevate your desktop experience by adopting a desktop waifu! Similar to a tamagotchi, she will keep you company on your desktop while you work or play other games! Pat her head, feed her snacks, give her plushies, or go fishing. Bring a little joy and cozy vibes to your daily routine!

name: PokéPlunder
summary:
Face wild Pokémon in a challenging turn-based roguelike adventure!
Equip items, learn new moves, and upgrade your strategy to survive through 9 dangerous areas filled with wild encounters, events and powerful bosses.

name: Pokemon Kaisen
summary: Pokemon Kaisen is an RPGXP FanGame by SwaggyHere made using Pokemon Essentials & RPG Maker XP in English. And it is now available to download. It was last updated on February 23, 2022.

name: Pokémon Cerulean Aquarium
summary: Pokemon Cerulean Aquarium is a GBA ROM Hack by yoshord based on Pokemon Emerald in English. It was created for the Team Aqua ROM Hacking Competition and is now available to download. It was released on September 9, 2024.

name: Poop Right Now
summary: "Poop Right Now" is a puzzle game. Players play the role of "Courier" who have just entered the industry here to transport "Poop" to the right place. Please carefully arrange the transportation route to ensure that the "Poop" can be transported safely and accurately to its destination.

name: Pool & Snooker Fever: 2 in 1 Bundle
summary: Two Classics, One Cue – Master Pool & Snooker on Nintendo Switch!

name: Power Punch
summary: Power Punch is a local multiplayer (max 4 players) party fighting game where the longer you charge you punch the strong and faster it becomes when you release.

name: Pollywog
summary:
Pollywog is an arcade game devoted to raising tadpoles for the Apple II.

The player's goal is to raise up 12 frog eggs into adulthood, and ultimately produce their own offspring. These tadpoles must eat algae to get larger and turn into frogs. These frogs can then lay their own eggs in turn. One of these eggs will be a prince egg, which will grow up into a frog prince. The player controls the direction of the tadpole swarm, and whether they scatter or congregate. When a tadpole reaches adulthood, the player can also control their tongue and choose when to lay their own eggs.

name: Power Inherited
summary:
Incremental meets dungeon crawling.

Can you reach the 22nd room and defeat the dungeon boss?

"Your family is cursed. Each generation inherits greater power, but dies young. Descend the dungeon, try to reach the origin of the curse, and cleanse your bloodline."

name: Postcards from the Apocalypse
summary: A stylish post-apocalyptic road trip with a killer soundtrack. No stats. No puzzles. No progression. Just drive.

name: Pool Room Billiard
summary: Enjoy moody gameplay with motion controls using two Joy-Con 2 controllers.A full-fledged 3D billiards game where you can battle players worldwide online!

name: Pocket Playground
summary:
Pocket Playground turns your mobile device into a highly customizable handheld to play with friends & family in less than 10 seconds across many gamemodes. It includes an infinite-levelling singleplayer mode, many challenges to complete, and a boutique full of styles and characters to unlock.

Works with touch, keyboards, gamepads and Android handheld devices. Available on the Play Store (Android) and App Store (iOS).

name: Population Control
summary: The first-ever tower defence with massive physical hordes. Survive the chaotic flow of 10,000+ squishy Jellings. Crack them with towers, physical powers, and broken combos.

name: Polymega Collection Vol.17: Gunbird
summary:
Blast off into the golden age of arcade sci-fi shooters with this Polymega Collection DVD, headlined by PSIKYO’s legendary GUNBIRD. First unleashed in arcades in the mid-’90s, GUNBIRD helped define the studio’s signature style: fast, vertically scrolling action, razor-sharp bullet patterns, and a cast of eccentric characters brought to life with humor and personality. This collection lets you experience GUNBIRD in both its original Arcade form and its Saturn home release, alongside fan-favorite sequel GUNBIRD 2 (Arcade), preserving the intensity and charm that made PSIKYO a name synonymous with hardcore shoot-’em-ups.

Rounding out the package is a thoughtfully curated lineup of classic arcade and console titles, all playable on Polymega. Take to the skies with Exerion, Cybattler, Skyfox (Exerizer), and E.D.F., test your reflexes with the puzzle-shooter hybrid Gunbarich, and explore deeper sci-fi action in Second Earth: Gratia. The collection also bridges the arcade and console worlds with Earth Defense Force / Super E.D.F. and Operation: Logic Bomb (JP: Ikari no Yousai) for the SNES / Super Famicom. Grab a friend and blast your way into sci-fi shooting heaven!

name: Polymega Collection Vol.18: Rival Turf!
summary:
Step into the raw, side-scrolling intensity of RIVAL TURF! and the legendary JALECO beat ’em up lineage—known in Japan as Rushing Beat—with this Polymega Collection DVD. Built around the street-fighting spirit that defined an era, this collection traces the series’ evolution from gritty urban brawls to more expressive, mechanics-driven combat, capturing Jaleco’s distinctive approach to arcade-style action across both home and coin-op releases. Fans of the beat ’em up genre will find plenty to enjoy throughout this collection, especially when played with a friend.

The collection is rounded out by Jaleco's NINJA KAZAN and Psikyo's DARAKU TENSHI: THE FALLEN ANGELS, the latter of which is a visually striking and unconventional fighting game whose influence extended well beyond its original release. Members of the Daraku Tenshi team were even rumored to have later gone on to work at SNK, with character designs and visual sensibilities that would echo in later KOF series games.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Fantastical Parade
summary: Fantastical Parade includes the debut of the elegant Mega Gardevoir ex. We’re sure you’ll be champing at the bit to see Mega Mawile ex making its Pokémon TCG Pocket debut and uncovering that green thumb as Teal Mask Ogerpon ex joins the parade too.

name: Pocket Lint Zero
summary: Play for free! A deceptively hard little game of deduction. I’m now thinking of a specific combination of pocket items. If I give you hints about what you’ve got wrong, can you guess it in as few guesses as possible?

name: Potion Knight
summary: Potion Knight is an intense and up-tempo first-person shooter that combines the need for speed with tactical potion throwing. Set in the harsh snow ridden village of Cronenberg where an unorthodox alchemist has been fusing animals with weapons to fight under his command.
